48006015	Yááŋa anyía bú tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ buúse bukime, ta ɔɔcɔ á bá ɔbɛ́ácánɔ́ ta waá bá iindú. Bɔkɔ a bɔ́ ŋɔ yɔɔ́lɔ áŋa hú anyía ɔɔcɔ á bá yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ.
48006016	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á sáyábákɛ́na baacɔ bekime a bá ŋa bɔ́ látɛ́na ohónyí oócí ne eebe a bá bɔ́ŋa taaká cɛ́ baacɔ bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; wé beébe iínjíékíne tɔ́na mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi.
48006017	O otúme aámbáya ɛ tɛ ŋá háná ámɛ áamba anyía ɔɔcɔ é mi yébíki tɔ́na. Yááŋa anyía ɛndɔ́lá a cíáŋa aámɛ a cɛɛ́tɔ ŋo tóŋínyi anyía ya mɛ́ŋa bɔkɔ bú Yésus.
48006018	Báámɛ benyíinyí, Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís á banɔ́ sayábákɛ́na banɔ́ bekimeʼo. Híáná yááŋa.
49001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá mɛ táfá anyía yámɛ bámɔ́kɔ́na ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma u Yésus Kilís. Yaŋɔ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, banɔ́ belumitinine Kilís ebé nú me nú bíínjie e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís [banɔ́ ebé nu ŋe bú líhe a bálɛ́ka cɛ Ɛfɛ́ɛsɛ].
49001002	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bata ne Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís anyía bá banɔ́ sayábákɛ́na, bá banɔ́ iínjíékíne mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi.
49001003	Nuúmi á bá ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Síkíne ci uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís. U ŋaá basɔ́ iínjie bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsaya bí Elilé bikime bɛ́ Ɔmuaná anyía tua sɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Kilís.
49001004	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na maá basɔ́ táfáka buáyá ɛ́cɛ u tɛ ŋáá bɔ́tá na ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔmuaná anyía túásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na befúúménénú e nyimónjóló ne Kilís, tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma eeyé eé buúse. A asana ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ lénéké,
49001005	u ŋaa cáŋa ɔsɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́na anyía tuásɔ́ bá e elime ci Yésus Kilís bááyɛ́ baáná bá ɔfana, bú ŋeé wuúci bílénékíne ɔkɛla aáná.
49001006	Yaátɛ́ asana túásɔ́ nyɛmána tu o wuúci nyemiki a asana na yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo yí nuúmi. U ŋaá basɔ́ bóosi etémbí ne etémbí anyía tua sɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u ɔtɛ́má.
49001007	U ŋaá basɔ́ háŋɔ́náká a buɔ́lɛ́ bɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́ o owé ú uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ oócí, yɔ́ basɔ́ nyɛanakɛnɛna maasɔ́ maabɛ́. Aáná u ŋaá basɔ́ tóŋínyi anyána yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo áŋa yaáŋá ɔ ɔhɔla a yáásɔ́ aháŋá;
49001008	yɔ́ basɔ́ nyióyísíkínyi ne injiŋé ikime na ambányɛ yí omenyi ekime a nyíáyɛ́ nyɛtákɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana.
49001009	U ŋaá basɔ́ námbɔ́nɛ́na nyíáyɛ́ nyɛtákɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana eényí a nyɛ́ ŋaá bá nyɛnámbánɔ́ buáyá; nyiínyi u ŋaá sɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́ná anyía u káá hɔ́lɛ́na né Kilís o o nyiínyi kɛla.
49001010	Nyíáyɛ́ nyɛtákɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana eényí áŋa anyía: Ayɛ́ ekúlú káá nyɛmana, u káá bándáka bɛnyɛ́ma bikime na bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ na bɛ́ ɔmuaná anyía Kilís é biíbi téŋgínyi bikime.
49001011	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaa kɛla bɛsana bikime háyɛ bú ŋeé wuúci bíléníne. Aáná u ŋaa caŋácáŋa ɔ basɔ́ táfáka buáyá a nyíáyɛ́ nyɛtákɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana anyía tua sɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Kilís; yɔ́ basɔ́ iínjie núásɔ́ nuafa anɔ́ u ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́tánɛ́na,
49001012	ananyía tuésú nyemiki búáyɛ́ buáŋá, basɔ́ abá tu ŋa sɔ́ cáŋa ɔháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís.
49001013	Banɔ́ tɔ́na, ekúlú ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká taaká cɛ ɔtáŋa, wuúci wáŋa Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma a yɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ nóhi, nu ŋa nɔ́ hákɛ́ná mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís. Aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ háyá hííyé hibílícínyínyí hɛ́ bɛ́muátá; híáŋa Efúúménénú yí Elilé ayɛ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ bɛ́tánɛ́ná o otóŋínyi anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bááyɛ́.
49001014	Efúúménénú yí Elilé eéyé áŋa náásɔ́ háyɛ afacɛ́ e yí ŋoó tóŋínyi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá basɔ́ iínjíékíne bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bí etémbí abɛ́ u ŋaá batɛ́ákɛ́nɛ́ná a búáyɛ́ Bunɔŋɔ, ɛ́cɛ ekúlú yɛ́ nyíásɔ́ nyɛkɔmba maá nyɛmána bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ. Tue nyemiki aná buáŋá bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
49001015	Yaátɛ́ asana i ŋeé mi iínjie Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti a yáánɔ́ asana. Ɛ ŋaá mɛ lɔ́kɔ́máka bá banɔ́ lémbíki anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ cɔba ne buúse ɔ ɔháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus, nu lénéke tɔ́na belumitinine bekime.
49001016	Aáná i ŋeé mi iínjie Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti, ɛ tɛ tɔmbɔ, ekúlú ekime eyí i ŋe mí wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na eenú eé buúse.
49001017	Ɛ ŋaá mɛ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Síkíne ci nuúmi ewú uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís ŋaá bá weé nyémiki; i ŋe mí wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na anyía wá banɔ́ íínjíé injiŋé, mbá u bítóŋínyi náánɔ́ o o wuúci menyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ;
49001018	yɔ́ banɔ́ hákɛ́na eese ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi anyía nuénu ményi, nuɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na tɔ́na na nyɛnamá nyɛ́ mɔŋɔlɛ́ anyɛ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ eé nyiínyi, núó ményi tɔ́na bɛnyɛ́ma biéŋí bí nuúmi abɛ́ u ŋaá batɛ́ákɛ́nɛ́ná bááyɛ́ baacɔ.
49001019	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba tɔ́na anyía núénú menyi mááyɛ́ makɛ́nda a má ŋa hɔ́la na anyána me ŋe bítóŋínyi náásɔ́, basɔ́ abá tu ŋa sɔ́ hákɛ́ná mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá; makɛ́nda eémé Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋoo tóŋínyi bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ ne Kilís,
49001020	ekúlú eyí u ŋeé wuúci heényi e biwéewé, yó wuúci limisinyi a aháŋá yí úúye ɔɔbɔ́ ú manɔ́mɛ ɔ Ɔmuaná noómi.
49001021	A haátɛ́ haála eéhé Kilís áŋa oliménénú o otéŋínyi ne metéŋí mé bililé bikime bɛ́ ɔhuálɔ́, na báábɔ́ betéŋí áyá; ta maabɔ́ makɛ́nda, ta búábɔ́ bɔɔcɔ, ta cáábɔ́ olokí áyá. Nyíáyɛ́ nyiínyi ŋo yóómo ɔ ɔhɔla eénye ekime a cáŋa cé owoómóko bɛhaála bikime a hɛɛya hɛ́ aámbáya, ta a tɔɔya a tɔ́ ŋa fáakɔna.
49001022	Aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé wuúci bééti Otéŋí u bɛnyɛ́ma bikime, yɔ́ kɛla anyía Kilís é biíbi límékíníne bikime a bɛɛtɔ́, nyi wuúci télímínyi eényí Otéŋí u hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine.
49001023	Hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine eéhí áŋa háyɛ cíáyɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ, bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bíáyɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma áŋa hɔ́á noómi hú mbiɔ́kɛ; bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bikime áŋa binyíóyókónú tɔ́na nááyá hú mbiɔ́kɛ.
49002001	Nu ŋa nɔ́ bá buáyá háyɛ biwéewé eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a asana na cáánɔ́ anana na maanɔ́ maabɛ́,
49002002	nu látákɛ́na bɛɛsɔ bɛ́ baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci; nɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na mɔmbálɛ, mutéŋínyi bililé bí mehúne. Wuúci wáŋa elilé a yɛ́ ŋa nyɛ́kɛtɛna baacɔ ɔ ɔkɛlɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ aatɔ́ ɔnata.
49002003	Basɔ́ bekime tu ŋa sɔ́ bá bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ háyɛ beébe. Tu ŋa sɔ́ bá tuesú líhéke e nyibíléníne nyí cíísú imehú, tu kɛlaka bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana e nyiléne nyɛ́ na ciasɔ́ cɛɛ́tɔ ne uúsu ɔtɛ́má, ananyía tu ŋa sɔ́ bá baacɔ háyɛ beébe. Aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa nyɛ́mána wu ɔ basɔ́ lóbísíkínyi a asana na maasɔ́ maabɛ́.
49002004	Mbá ta híáná, wáŋa na mahana meéŋí, yaátɛ́ asana u ŋaá basɔ́ lénéke buéŋí,
49002005	basɔ́ abá tu ŋa sɔ́ bá háyɛ biwéewé, tu kɛlaka bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana. Ta híáná, u ŋaá basɔ́ iínjie yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe ɔlɔŋɔ ne Kilís anyía u ŋaá basɔ́ lénéké. A asana na yaála yí nuubo yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ nua nɔ́ŋa bɔnɔhɔ́kɔ́nɔ́.
49002006	E nyimónjóló anyɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa ne Yésus Kilís, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ heényiki o owé ɔlɔŋɔ ne Kilís, yɔ́ basɔ́ iínjie nyilimíné ɔ Ɔmuaná o otéŋínyi ɔlɔŋɔ ne wuúci.
49002007	U ŋaá basɔ́ kɛ́láka bɔmbányɛ, yɔ́ hɔ́lɛna né Yésus Kilís ananyía wó tóŋgínyi baacɔ bekime bá tɔɔya a tɔ́ ŋa fáakɔna anyána yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo áŋa yaáŋá ɔ ɔhɔla bɛnyɛ́ma bikime.
49002008	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ nóhí a asana ne úúnú olumitinine, tɛ́ cáŋa a asana na bɛsana bɛ́ búánɔ́ buólí, mbá a yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo;
49002009	tɛ́ cáŋa a asana na yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na anyía ɔɔcɔ ti bíbéétíki.
49002010	Tua sɔ́ŋa buólí bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, wuúci u ŋaá basɔ́ kétíki e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís anyía túásɔ́ kɛ́láka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana; biíbi u ŋa cáŋa ɔ basɔ́ tábɔ́nɛ́na anyía túésú biíbi kɛláka.
49002011	Yaátɛ́ asana ánɔ bɛ́tááka anyána nú ŋa nɔ́ bá buáyá: Nu tɛ ɔ́mɔ nɔ́ bá Besuif e nyibíbíéne. Baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́ácáka ŋa bɔ́ kɔɔna anyía bá bɔ́ŋa baacɔ bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; bá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ anyía benduéndue, yiíyi anyía hú bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bé ŋe bú beébe aacáka; tɛ́ cáŋa Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
49002012	Yaátɛ́ ekúlú eéyé nu ŋa nɔ́ bá ɛ́cɛ nu tɛ ŋá nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís ooci awɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋɔ lɔ́tɔ; banɔ́ tɛ́ka biéti bí Islayɛ́l. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa látákana membénú na baacɔ bá búáyɛ́ bunɔŋɔ, yó beébe bɛ́tánákɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ u ŋa nyɛmána wu ɔkɛlaka. Mbá banɔ́ nu tɛ ɔ́mɔ nɔ bá hɔ́á, nu ŋa nɔ́ bá nuenú líhéke ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci tɛ́ka na bɔkɔ bɔ́ ɔháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ eé buúbu, nu ti menyi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
49002013	Mbá aámbáya, banɔ́ abá nu ŋa nɔ́ bá buáyá haaca na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nú me nú bíkósíti nááyá e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís a asana ne uúyé owé eenú eé buúse.
49002014	Yááŋa anyía Kilís wuúci bɛ́muátá u ŋaá basɔ́ héléníné mbuumu. U ŋa kɛ́lá anyía ne Besuif na mɔnɔŋɔ me etémbí á bámɔ́kɔ́na bunɔŋɔ búmɔtɛ́, u ŋaá basɔ́ látáka basɔ́ bekime na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋa yaáŋíá muliŋenene a mɔ́ ŋaá bá aasɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ háyɛ nyɛmámá nyí ciíbe, u ŋa yaáŋíá ekúlú eyí u ŋeé wé.
49002015	U ŋeé témbúsíki ne bikotí bí Besuif na cáábɔ́ esúŋe na cáábɔ́ abɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a caabɛ́ áyá e uúyé owé. U ŋa kɛ́láka aáná anyía mɔnɔŋɔ ma baacɔ eémé méfendí á hálɔ́mɔ́na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yɛ́ bunɔŋɔ hú ɔ́mɔtɛ́ a nyɛlatana ne wuúci. Aáná u ŋa kɛ́lá anyía túásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na e mbuumu noómi.
49002016	A asana ne úúyé owé ɔ ɔmbásá ɔ ɔmuaná, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ Kilís ŋe ményísi muliŋenene, yɔ́ látaka bífendí bɛ́ mɔnɔŋɔ eémé bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́, bá lɔ́kɔ́mákána na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
49002017	Yááŋa anyía Kilís ŋaá faáya na ɔ ɔkɔɔ́ banɔ́ húlinyi Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí mbuumu, na ná banɔ́ abá nu ŋa nɔ́ bá haaca na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ne né Besuif tɔ́na a bá ŋa bɔ́ bá hoóhi ne wuúci.
49002018	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ basɔ́ bekime tua sɔáŋa tú ɔtálɛ́mɛ́na aámbáya eé buúse bú Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, túɔ́ hɔ́lɛ́na né Kilís a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé ɔ́mɔtɛ́.
49002019	Yaátɛ́ asana nu tɛ anɔ́ bá tɔ́na bekenyí mbá te biliminyi e bí ŋe húle haaca. Nua nuáŋa aámbáya biéti bɛ́ bunɔŋɔ bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; nua nuáŋa baacɔ bé hííyé hɛnyɛ́nɔ́.
49002020	Nua nuáŋa banɔ́ tɔ́na háyɛ imbiŋe cí ciíbe ɔ ɔfalɛfa a wáŋa oketíkínyí e buólí bɔ́ na baacɔ bá ɛndɔ́ma ne behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Yésus Kilís wuúci bɛ́muátá áŋa nukúse a nɔ́ maá bɛ́túáhɛ́na ɔfalɛfa oócí;
49002021	wuúci u náŋa weé kíndísíki ciíbe, ɔfalɛfa cɔ́cɔbaka ne buúse, mbá cɛ́ ká bɛ́cáŋa ciíbe e cifúúménénú, ciíci ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá noómi.
49002022	A nyɛlatana anyɛ́ nua nɔ́ŋa ne Yésus Kilís, ú maá banɔ́ óofinyi ɔ ɔfalɛfa oócí ɔlɔŋɔ na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bekime anyía núánɔ́ bɛ́cáŋa ciíbe ecí Elilé yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé líhe noómi.
49003001	Yaátɛ́ asana, yaŋɔ́ Bóol ɛ naŋa yámɛ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná eé buúse bú Yésus Kilís a yáánɔ́ asana, banɔ́ abá nu tɛ anɔ́ bá Besuif.
49003002	I ŋe mí menyi bɔmbányɛ, nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka bé bíkétíki anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi iínjíé buólí eébú a yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo anyía yámɛ banɔ́ nyiɔkɛna.
49003003	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi tóŋínyí nyíáyɛ́ nyɛtákɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana anyɛ́ ú ŋa námbɛ́na baacɔ háyɛ yámɛ cáŋa ɔ kɔtɛtɛna ɔ ɔwɔɔ́ŋɔ nufule eenu.
49003004	Núénú nuúnu fanáka, nu ŋa nɔ́ cɔ́ba ɔ ɔlɛca anyía i ŋe mí menyi bɛsana a bɛnambákánɔ́ a bɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca Kilís.
49003005	Buáyá, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ti ómo tóŋínyi baacɔ asana eéyé. Aámbáya ú meé yiíyi námbɔnɛna na ná bááyɛ́ baacɔ bá ɛndɔ́ma na ná bááyɛ́ behémúnyi bɛsana e befúúménénú a makɛ́nda ma yááyɛ́ Elilé.
49003006	Asana yí indiitie eéyé áŋa anyía baacɔ a bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá Besuif á bɔ́áŋa na nuafa a bɛnyɛ́ma abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá batɛ́ákɛ́nɛ́na bááyɛ́ baacɔ; bá búáŋa háyɛ maláŋá ma cɛɛ́tɔ ɛ́mɔtɛ́, beébe tɔ́na ɛ ɛndána noómi acɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá hɔlɛna né Yésus Kilís o o beébe bɛ́tánɛ́na. Bɛsana bikime eébí áŋa anyía bé me bú lúmitekinine Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma.
49003007	Aáná ya mɛáŋa muhulisi Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma eéyé a yaála yí nuubo ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi iínjíé a maayɛ́ makɛ́nda.
49003008	Yaŋɔ́ ooci awɔ́ ɛ tɛ amɛ́ bá ta bɔkɔ eé buúse bú belumitinine bekime; ta híáná, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi boósíki, yɔ́ mɛ táfa anyía yémí hulíkínyi baacɔ a bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá Besuif Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí injibí a yɛ́ a hɔ́la; yí ŋeé húle né Kilís.
49003009	U ŋa mɛ́ kɛ́lá tɔ́na bɔmbányɛ anyía yémi hembúlékíne bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ baacɔ bekime anyána Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa cɔba ɔ ɔkɛla bɛsana abɛ́ u ŋa batɛ́ákɛ́nɛ́ná bááyɛ́ baacɔ indiitie. Wuúci Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɛ́muátá, Muketi bɛnyɛ́ma bikime, wuúci u ŋa námbaka bɛsana eébí bikime o otúme buáyá ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma aámbáya ayɛ́ ú meé biíbi nambɔnaka.
49003010	U ŋa kɛ́láka aáná anyía ne metéŋí na makɛ́nda ma bɛnyɛ́ma a bɛ́áŋa ɔ Ɔmuaná noómi á nyɛmána omenyukune e elime ci hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine anyána Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa ne injiŋé a anamánamá cá bɛnyɛ́ma ekime.
49003011	Aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa kɛ́láka háyɛ u ŋaá sɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́ná ɛ́cɛ ɔmɛsɛ́ tɛ ŋáa bá. U ŋa hɔ́lɛ́na né Yésus Kilís uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá anyía wá kɛláka aáná.
49003012	A asana ayɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa a nyɛlatana ne Yésus Kilís, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa tu obíkósíti ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ɛ ɛtɛ́má hú mbiɔ́kɛ anyía tu ŋe sú meéme háya nááyá.
49003013	Aáná ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ laana anyía nɔtɛ kásáka a asana anyía ɛ ŋaá mɛ lɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé a yáánɔ́ asana, mbá muamɛ muuyé eémú á banɔ́ iínjíé yáaŋa nuúmi.
49003014	Yaátɛ́ asana í meé mi túmékíne Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ eŋéndu ɔ ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na,
49003015	anyía wuúci u ŋaá bɔ́táká tɔnyɛ́nɔ́ tukime na tɔ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ na tɔ́ ɔmuaná.
49003016	A asana ayɛ́ núáyɛ́ nuúmi áŋa nuáŋá ɔ ɔhɔla, wuúci na bɛnyɛ́ma bikime, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ i ŋe mí wuúci batá anyía wé kíndísíki cíínú ɛtɛ́má a makɛ́nda ma yááyɛ́ Elilé.
49003017	Híáná Kilís kéé límekine e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá, núɔ́ kɛ́ndáka ne nulénéne na háyɛ bɔɔtɛ́ e bú moó yóofikinyi bɛkaŋá ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ noómi, na háyɛ ciíbe a cɛ́áŋa itúmékénú na makɛ́nda.
49003018	Aáná nu ká nɔ́ bá na makɛ́nda me omenyukune bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ ɔlɔŋɔ ne befúúménénú bé etémbí bekime anyána nulénéne enú Kilís ŋa basɔ́ léne áŋa nuáŋánáŋána, tɛ́ka ne iŋetí: Ta a mabahɔ́, ta a bucaha, ta ɔ ɔtányɛ́, te i injibí.
49003019	Ta ayɛ́ núáyɛ́ nulénéne áŋa nuáŋánáŋána tɛ́ka ne iŋetí, baacɔ ti nuúnu menyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ láana anyía énu nuúnu líhéke bɔmbányɛ; aáná cíínú ɛtɛ́má kóó nyióyíki hú mbiɔ́kɛ na bɛnyɛ́ma bikime a bɛ́áŋa ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
49003020	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bímuócí wáŋa wu ɔkɛlaka ɔ ɔhɔla bɛnyɛ́ma bikime ebí tu ŋe sú wuúci báta ta abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́táá o wuúci báta a makɛ́nda e mé ŋeé bítóŋínyi náásɔ́.
49003021	Wuúci wá nyɛmana ne nuúmi na a asana na hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine na a asana ne Yésus Kilís bikúlú bikime ne bikúlú bikime, híáná yááŋa !
49004001	Yaátɛ́ asana, a bɛsana eébí bikime, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ báta anyía énu búle kɛ́la bɛsana a bɛ́ ŋaá bá bíé bílénékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ o otúme ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́. Énu menyí anyía yaŋɔ́ ooci aámbáya eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná noómi anyía ɛ ŋa mɛ́ nyiɔnɔ Otéŋí a Waáŋá buólí.
49004002	Énu bílóósíki bikúlú bikime; núɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na mbuumu cɛ baacɔ, nu eéhíkínyínyi banɔ́ na banɔ́ e nulénéne noómi.
49004003	Efúúménénú yí Elilé yɛ́ ŋa banɔ́ iínjie mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi, mbuumu eécí ŋaá banɔ́ láta e nyimónjóló noómi. Aáná nuánɔ́ nyɛmana nú ɔbɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na o búle kuline nyɛlatana nyí nyimónjóló eényí aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́.
49004004	Yááŋa anyía, cɛɛ́tɔ ci Kilís áŋa hú ciíci ɛ́mɔtɛ́, ɛ́cɛ anyía hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine; Efúúménénú yí Elilé áŋa hú yiíyi ɔ́mɔtɛ́, híáná tɔ́na bɔkɔ abɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́ anyía nuánɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ eé buúbu áŋa hú bɔ́mɔtɛ́.
49004005	Otéŋí a Waáŋá áŋa hú wuúci ɔmɔtɛ́; ɔháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís áŋa hú wuúci ɔmɔtɛ́, aáná tɔ́na obíótíne áŋa hú wuúci ɔ́mɔtɛ́.
49004006	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa hú wuúci ɔmɔtɛ́, wáŋa Síkíne cɛ baacɔ bekime, u ŋee téŋínyi ɔhuálɔ́ okime, u ŋa bɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na baacɔ bekime, wuúci tɔ́na náábɔ́ eé beébe bekime.
49004007	Yááŋa anyía Kilís ŋe yíínjie ɔɔcɔ okime aá basɔ́ hú náányɛ́ nyíáyɛ́ nyɛnamá nyí buólí a yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo.
49004008	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ yááŋa yɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ anyía: «Ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋaá báátáka ɔ Ɔmuaná ɔ ɔhɔla ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná, u ŋaá báátákána baacɔ ebé u ŋe tíŋéke, yó wiínjíékíne baacɔ moólí.»
49004009	Mbá aátɛ́ yááŋa anyía «u ŋaá báátáka» e? Bú ŋe bíhémbúle anyía u ŋa cáŋacáŋa ɔlɔ́ɔ i injibí cɛ ɔmɛsɛ́.
49004010	Ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋɔɔ́ lɔ́ɔkɔ, wuúci tɔ́na u ŋáa báátáka ɔ Ɔmuaná ɔ ɔhɔla ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná anyía mbá weé téŋgínyi a bɛhaála bikime bɛnyɛ́ma bikime.
49004011	Wuúci u ŋa kɛ́láka anyía baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ á bámɔ́kɔ́na baacɔ bá ɛndɔ́ma, a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ behulinyi bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma, ɔ bɔ́mɔtɛ́ tɔ́na bootonono ta anyía beékúnyi bɛsana.
49004012	U ŋeé télímíkínyí baacɔ eébé aáná anyía bábɔ́ bá na makɛ́nda me o wuúci nyiɔkɛna buólí, bó óombisiki cɛɛ́tɔ ci Kilís ɛ́cɛ anyía hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine.
49004013	Tu ká sɔ́ bá balatákánɔ́ e nyimónjóló basɔ́ bekime, anyía tua sɔ́ŋa bɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ ne o olumitinine noómi ne e nyimenyi nyɛ́ Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Aáná tu ká sɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na baáŋá bá baacɔ bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́, bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ háyɛ Kilís.
49004014	Yaátɛ́ ekúlú, tu tɛ ká háná asɔ́ bá háyɛ banásɛ́; beébe, baacɔ ŋe bú néŋe ne eékúnyi cá bɛfala, bé beébe ndéŋelisiki i iŋetí cɛ ɔkɔkɔ́ ayɛ́ na bɛahɔ́ bí menyífé ne ehúne ŋé ndéŋelisi bɛhaála bikime aá nuɔmɔ́.
49004015	Mbá yááŋa anyía mbɔ́kɔ tú naŋa túásɔ́ kɔ́ɔnaka taaká tu lénékénéne basɔ́ na basɔ́, tu ká sɔ́ ɔ́ɔmbɔ́kɔ bɛháŋá bikime, tɔ́ cɔcɔbaka né Kilís a wáŋa aatɔ́.
49004016	Wuúci u ŋa kɛ́la anyía baacɔ bekime ábɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na balatákánɔ́ e nyimónjóló háyɛ cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ ɔɔcɔ áŋa ɛlatákánɔ́ na ɔɔŋɔ na tulaŋá. Aáná ekúlú ayɛ́ bɔláŋá bɔ́ cɛɛ́tɔ bukime ŋo nyíóyísínyi buólí háyɛ yɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́ámba, cɛɛ́tɔ ikime ŋa kɔ́ma bɔmbányɛ. Híáná yááŋa tɔ́na a hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine: Ekúlú eyí belumitinine ŋe bú lénéne beébe ne beébe, hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine hikime ŋa kɔ́ma, hɛ́ ááŋánáka.
49004017	Asana ayɛ́ míɔ cɔba ɔ ɔ banɔ́ laana o owoónyísínyi eé nyiínyi nyí uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá íyéeye: Nɔtɛ háná líhéke háyɛ be-ti-menyí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; beébe bá náŋa bábɔ́ bɛ́tááka hú ɔkɛla bɛsana bí etémbí ne etémbí.
49004018	Ciíbú injiŋé áŋa i ibíne noómi; bá tɛ abɔ́ bá na nuafa ɔ yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe yíínjiene, anyía bé ti ŋé bú menyi ta bɔkɔ, beébe na bɛnatákánɔ́ bɛ́ ɛtɛ́má.
49004019	Bá tɛ ŋá háná abɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma aatɔ́ ɔlama, bó bíínjíékíne ɔ ɔkɛla na mafala na anamánamá cá bɛsana cá mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ ekime.
49004020	Mbá náánɔ́, tɛ́ cáŋa aáná nú ŋa nɔ́ áákɔ́nákɛ́ná a asana a yɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca Kilís,
49004021	anyía nú ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká bé bíkétíki bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ bɛsana bikime e bí ŋe wuúci lɛca, bɔ́ banɔ́ eékúnyíki taaká cɛ́ bɛsana a cɛ́áŋa né Yésus.
49004022	Nu ŋa nɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔnyɛanaka aná bíánɔ́ bɛɛsɔ bɛ́ buáyá, biíbi bɛ́ ŋaá bá bɛ́ a banɔ́ cáŋgɛna a asana na bɛɛbɛ́ bí ibíkéti a bɛ́ ŋaá bá bɛ́ a banɔ́ néŋéke.
49004023	Nu ŋa nɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔbámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ bɛɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ bɛ́ baacɔ na ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi na ɔ ɔbɛ́táá noómi.
49004024	Ánɔ látákɛ́na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na anyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe kéti; nyɛ́ ŋaá hɔ́á nyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Nyɛ́áŋa taaká, nyiínyi nyɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́, nyiínyi nyifúúménénú tɔ́na.
49004025	Yaátɛ́ asana ánɔ nyɛanáka munéŋéne; hú naányɛ́ á laákɛ́na sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ taaká, anyía basɔ́ bekime tua sɔ́ŋa maláŋá ma cɛɛ́tɔ ɛ́mɔtɛ́.
49004026	Yáa háma anyía nuánɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma olóbi, énu bíkékényíki ɔkɛla asana a yaabɛ́. Ɔɔ́cɔ́ tɛ ka fianɛna ɛ́cɛ nua nuanáŋa ɔ ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma olóbi.
49004027	Nuti iínjíé Musɔ́mɛ́na ohónyí.
49004028	Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u náŋa we yeébéke, tɛ háná éébe; mbá wé búle lɛca muuyé ɔ ɔnyiɔ buólí na cááyɛ́ aabá, u hɔ́máka mɔɔnyɛ́. Aáná u káá bá na bɔkɔ bɔ́ ɔwɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ basɔ́kásɔ́ka.
49004029	Nuti hémúkúnyi bɛahɔ́ a cáánɔ́ eété, mbá maanɔ́ mehúnyi ŋá nyɛmána me okíndísíki olumitinine, ma ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ ba-banɔ́-lɔ́kɔ́ma.
49004030	Nuti líŋísíki Efúúménénú yí Elilé; yiíyi yááŋa hibílícínyínyí ahɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ háyá o otóŋínyi anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bááyɛ́; hibílícínyínyí eéhí áŋa afacɛ́ e yí ŋo tóŋínyi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ háŋɔ́náka buúse bukime a bɔɔbɛ́ e ekúlú a yɛnyɛmánánɔ́.
49004031	Ánɔ nyɛánáka ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma na ɔtɛ́má ɔnua, ne tuliŋéliŋe, ne tulóbi; ánɔ nyɛánáka tɔ́na na ɛsáká na muɔ́mbɔ́nána; ánɔ nyɛánáka nyɛnamá nyɛ́ nyɛŋána nyikime.
49004032	Mbá ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na na nukasa ne nuubo aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́; nu nyɛánakanana tɔ́na háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ nyɛánákɛ́nɛ́na e elime ci Kilís.
49005001	Nua nɔ́ŋa baáná bá ɔtɛ́má bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Yaátɛ́ asana ánɔ bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na ɔlátɛ́na nyíáyɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na;
49005002	énu líhéke, nu lénéke bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ i iŋetí ci Kilís. U naŋa waá basɔ́ lénéke, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ u ŋeé wé a yáásɔ́ asana háyɛ abɛ́sámbá yɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma te yí etúké eyí bé ŋe lúli o oocó; yááyɛ́ ambányɛ yí enumbé bílénékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
49005003	Nua nɔ́ŋa baacɔ bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ bɔ́ tɛ a kɛ́la bɔmbányɛ anyía bá bɛ́káná ɔcamba buúse bukime ta ɛnjɔkɔ́nɔ́nɔ, ta bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́, te olénéke mɔɔnyɛ́ buéŋí aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́.
49005004	Bɔ́ tɛ ŋáá hɛ́ka anyía núénú túmékénéne bɛahɔ́, nu kɔɔ́nákána bɛsana ta bɛ́ buála ta bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́; mbá bɔ́ ŋa hɔ́la ɔhɛka anyía núénú íínjíékíne bu íínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti.
49005005	Énu menyí bɔmbányɛ anyía na bakɛla ɛnjɔkɔ́nɔ́nɔ, na bakɛla bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́, na baacɔ e bé ŋe bú léne mɔɔnyɛ́ buéŋí, ɛ́cɛ anyía nyinyemi nyɛ́ bɛbɔ́kɔ́bɔ́kɔ, tɛ ábɔ́ bá na nuafa buúse bukime e Butéŋí ne bú Kilís na bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
49005006	Nuti humé ! Ɔɔcɔ tɛ banɔ́ nénísi ohónyí na bɛsana bɛ́ bɛfala: Yááŋa anyía a nyɛnamá nyɛ́ bɛsana eényí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋó lóbísínyi baacɔ e bé ti ŋé bú wuúci lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na.
49005007	Nɔtɛ latána bukendinyi na nyɛnamá nyɛ́ baacɔ eényí a asana a yɛ́mɔtɛ́.
49005008	E ekúlú yɛ́ buáyá, nu ŋa nɔ́ bá nuenú líhéke i ibíne noómi; mbá aámbáya nua nuáŋa o olíhe e eese noómi anyía nua nuáŋa e nyimónjóló ne Kilís. Yaátɛ́ asana énu líhéke aná i iŋetí cɛ baacɔ a bá náŋa bébú líhéke e eese noómi.
49005009	Eese eéyé ɛ́ náŋa yé yiínjíékíne baacɔ makɛ́nda ma ɔkɛlaka na bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana bikime, na a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ áyá, yí beébe íínjíékíne tɔ́na makɛ́nda ma ɔkɛlaka taaká cɛ́ bɛsana.
49005010	Ánɔ bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na ɔwaákɔ́nɛ́na omenyi bɛsana e bí ŋe bíléníne Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
49005011	Nɔtɛ latána na baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛ́la bɛsana bí ibíne; bɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ. Mbá ánɔ bándɔ́náka bɛsana eébí bí a lɛcákána a miányɛ́.
49005012	Yááŋa anyía, bɛsana abɛ́ baacɔ eébé ŋa bɔ́ kɛla a nyɛnamba ŋe yiínjie aatɔ́ ɔlama te o o biíbi bíkéti.
49005013	Aáná ekúlú eyí bó ŋo tóŋínyi bɛsana eébí bikime a miányɛ́, baacɔ ŋe bú ményi aátɛ́ yááŋa taaká.
49005014	Yááŋa anyíaʼo, asana ekime eyí bó ŋo tóŋínyi a miányɛ́ a yáaŋa eese bɛ́muátá; yaátɛ́ asana bá ŋa kɔɔna anyía: «Haányúá, kuɔŋɔ́ mɔhɛ́ta hiiné, hatɔ́na ɛndánáka ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cí biwéewé; aáná Kilís kéé númisiki eese nɔ́ɔ́wɔ.»
49005015	Háyɛ yááŋa aáná, énu bíkékényíki e úúnú olíhe, ánɔ nyɛánáka olíhe háyɛ be-ti-menyí bɔkɔ, mbá énu líhéke háyɛ bemenyi bɛsana.
49005016	Nɔtɛ cáŋgɛ́na etémbí ne etémbí bíánɔ́ bikúlú bɛ́ ɔkɛlaka bɔmbányɛ, anyía mɔɔ́sɛ́ eeme áŋa maabɛ́.
49005017	Yaátɛ́ asana nu tɛ ɔ́mɔ nɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔkɛlaka buála, ánɔ bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na yáaŋa o omenyi aátɛ́ Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋa yáamba anyía nuánɔ́ kɛ́láka.
49005018	Nuti híólóko meluku, anyía maáŋa bunyímé. Mbá ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na bonyíóyókónú ne Efúúménénú yí Elilé,
49005019	nu kíndísíkínyínyi ɛtɛ́má na maŋana ne me nyinyemi na ma ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na ne emé Efúúménénú yí Elilé ŋaá banɔ́ tóŋínyi ɔhákɛ́na. Ánɔ hákɛ́nɛ́na uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá maŋana eémé, nu wuúci nyemiki ne uúnú ɔtɛ́má okime.
49005020	Énu iínjíékíne ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti a bɛsana bikime a bɛ́ ŋa bɛ́kɛ́la, nɔ hɔlakɛna bikúlú bikime né uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
49005021	Énu kékékénéne ananyía nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na Yésus Kilís.
49005022	Banɔ́ beénjú bá ɔtɔ́nɔ́, énu kékéke báánɔ́ banɔ́mɛ, aáná Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋa yáamba.
49005023	Yááŋa anyía ɔnɔ́mɛ ŋeé téŋínyi oónyí i iŋetí ecí Yésus Kilís ŋeé téŋínyi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine. Kilís áŋa Munohi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine; híáŋa háyɛ cíáyɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ.
49005024	Yaátɛ́ asana beénjú bá ɔtɔ́nɔ́ ábɔ́ nyɛmána bé okékéke báábɔ́ banɔ́mɛ a bɔkɔ bukime háyɛ hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine ŋeé kéke Yésus Kilís.
49005025	Banɔ́ banɔ́mɛ, énu lénéke báánɔ́ beényí i iŋetí ecí Yésus Kilís naŋa weé lénéke hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ u ŋgaá bɛ́sɔ́mbɛ́ná a yááyɛ́ asana.
49005026	U ŋa kɛ́láka aáná anyía mbá hííyé hiɔ́bɔ á bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na hifúúménénú eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, u ŋeé hiíhi fúúmínyi ne menyífé na búáyɛ́ buhúnyi.
49005027	U ŋaá bá weé lénéke anyía hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine eéhí á bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na ne nuúmi, hifúúménénú eeyé eé buúse, tɛ́ka ne ehíŋe ɔ́mɔtɛ́, ta na bɔkɔ a bɔɔbɛ́ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́, ta na hɛkɔma a hɛ́mɔtɛ́ hí o hiíhi kákálákɛ́na.
49005028	Híáná banɔ́mɛ ábɔ́ nyɛmána bé olénéke báábɔ́ beényí a nyɛnamá enyí bé ŋe bú léne cííbú cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ́ bɛ́muátá. Ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ŋeé léne oónyí ŋo tóŋínyi baacɔ anyía u ŋeé léne cíáyɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ bɛ́muátá.
49005029	Ta ɔɔcɔ ti ŋée líŋine ta buɔ́sɛ́ cíáyɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ bɛ́muátá, mbá u náŋa weé ciíci túkéke, u ciíci sókóbíki i iŋetí ci nyisókóbi enyí Yésus Kilís náŋa weé sókóbíki hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine.
49005030	Yááŋa anyía basɔ́ bekime tua sɔ́ŋa maláŋá má ciayɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ.
49005031	Yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ anyía: «Aáná ɔnɔ́mɔcɔ́ náŋa waá hátɔna a maabána me ne iinyí ne síkíne, yɔ́ kɔ látana ne oónyí; bífendí eébí bɛ́ɔ́ kɔ hálɔ́mɔ́na ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́.»
49005032	Asana eéyé áŋa taaká ci injibí cɛ asana. Yaŋɔ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ kɔɔna aáná anyía yɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca ne Kilís ne hííyé hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine.
49005033	Híáná yɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lɛ́ca tɔ́na: Ɔɔcɔ okime aá banɔ́ ŋá nyɛmána wu olénéke oónyí háyɛ u ŋeé léne ciayɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ bɛ́muátá. Oónjú u nyɛtɔ́nɔ́ okime é kékéke tɔ́na ɔnɔ́mɛʼoo.
49006001	Banɔ́ baáná, [nua nuáŋa e nyimónjóló ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus;] ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na bíánɔ́ bibíényi, anyía yááŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ asana.
49006002	Okotí yí buúse ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa látɛ́nɛ́na ɛndána ɔ ɔmuaná áŋa anyía: «Lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na na ɔɔtɛ́ na ɔɔnyia,
49006003	mbá ɔ kɔ́ɔ́ bá na bɔmbányɛ, we olíhéke mɔɔ́sɛ́ meéŋí ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́.»
49006004	Banɔ́ síkíne, nuti liŋísíki báánɔ́ baáná; mbá énu beébe sókóbíki, nu beébe éékúnyíki, nu beébe hɔŋɔnaka háyɛ Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋa yáamba.
49006005	Banɔ́ bɛɔ́lɛ́, ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na báánɔ́ baáŋá bá ɔmɛsɛ́, nu beébe kékéke, nu beébe béétíki, énu beébe nyiɔkɛna buólí na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ háyɛ anyía Kilís nú ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na.
49006006	Tɛ́ cáŋa hí ekúlú ayɛ́ bá bɔ́ŋa hoóhi na banɔ́ ɔ ɔ banɔ́ nyiósi anyía bábɔ́ banɔ́ lémbíki mbá, énu bíínjíé na ɔtɛ́má okime ɔ ɔkɛla bɛsana e bí ŋe bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bɛɔ́lɛ́ bí Kilís.
49006007	Énu beébe nyiɔ́kɛ́na na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime háyɛ anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá bɛ́muátá nu ŋa nɔ́ nyiɔnɔ, tɛ́ cáŋa baacɔ bímuócí.
49006008	Énu menyi anyía Kilís káá námaka ɔɔcɔ okime a bíáyɛ́ bɛmbányɛ bí monyiókínyí; ta yɔɔ́lɛ́ te ooci awɔ́ u tɛ a kɛ́la yɔɔ́lɛ́.
49006009	Banɔ́ bemuútí bɛɔ́lɛ́, énu líhéke tɔ́na aáná bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ na bíánɔ́ bɛɔ́lɛ́; nuti beébe siséke, nu menyukune anyía na banɔ́ ne beébe nua nɔ́ŋa na Waáŋá ɔmɔtɛ́ ɔ Ɔmuaná. U tɛ á bá na mutáfána mu baacɔ.
49006010	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba okuenyinyi ɔ banɔ́ laána anyía ánɔ aámbáka ohónyí wú ɔbámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na balatákánɔ́ e nyimónjóló ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá, nɔ kɛ́ndáka a mááyɛ́ makɛ́nda noómi a má á hɔ́la.
49006011	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ iínjíékíne meléfényí mekime me onuusiki Musɔ́mɛ́na; énu meéme hiítéke mekime, aáná nu ká nɔ́ bá na makɛ́nda ma ɔyákáka mááyɛ́ menjiŋé.
49006012	Yááŋa anyíaʼo: Tɛ́ cáŋa baacɔ bá cɛɛ́tɔ tu ŋe sú núúsi, mbá tu ŋe sú núúsi makɛ́nda ma bɛɛbɛ́ bí bililé bí iisí cɛ ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná ikime, tu núúsiki tɔ́na ne metéŋí mekime na báábɔ́ betéŋí na ɛkɛ́nda eeci cí iisí ci ibíne.
49006013	Yaátɛ́ asana, énu hiítéke aná meléfényí mekime amá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ iínjíékíne; aáná nu ká nɔ́ bá na makɛ́nda ma ɔtámba Sátan ɛ ɛcálɛ ekúlú ayɛ́ buɔ́sɛ́ a bɔɔbɛ́ ká kaá háma, núo weéhínyínyi ɔnua ɛcálɛ eécí, nuɔ yákáka Sátan ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma a nyɛmana, banɔ́ hú ɛndánáka.
49006014	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ ánɔ bɛ́tábɔ́náka bɔmbányɛ, nu limekine ɛnɔ́mɔcɔ́nɔ́mɔ́cɔ́ hoóhi na ɔnua biité: Taaká á bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na náánɔ́ cíɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ háyɛ kandá ecí bé ŋe bísúŋe a nɔsɛ́ŋá; nyɛlátɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ háyɛ bɔlaka bú eléŋú e bú ŋe tétényi cɛɛ́tɔ.
49006015	Nyíánɔ́ nyibíínjie e nyiwééné o ohulinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí bumbénú á bámɔ́kɔ́na háyɛ bɛkandɛ́na abɛ́ nú ma nɔ́ bɛ́hákɛ́na a akɔlɔ́.
49006016	Hɔlákáhɔ́láka, ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na ne olumitinine ɔ ɔtɛ́má noómi háyɛ asakɛ́ yí biité ɔ ɔɔbɔ́. Ú káá banɔ́ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ o o búle káha tuŋányɛ tɔ́ Sátan, ta tú á lɔ́laka háyɛ oocó, ú kéé tuútu nyímísíki tukime.
49006017	Énu lumítíne ɔkɔnɔ́hɔ́kɔ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ú káá bá háyɛ yáánɔ́ atamba yí biité; ánɔ bɛ́hákɛ́na Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ e eetú, biíbi háyɛ nɔsala nɔ́ ɔhána enú Efúúménénú yí Elilé ŋe yíinjiene.
49006018	Ánɔ kɛláka bɛsana eébí bikime ɔ ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na noómi, nu bataka Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía wá banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́lɔ́kɔ. Ɛ́ɛ, ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na aná bikúlú bikime e nyitóŋínyi enyí Efúúménénú yí Elilé ŋaá banɔ́ tóŋínyi. Yaátɛ́ asana, ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na bɔɔ́sɔ, ánɔ bɛ́tááka baacɔ bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bekime ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na.
49006019	Ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɔ́na a yáámɛ́ aháŋá yɛ́ bɛ́muátá anyía wé mi iínjíé mehúnyi amá ɛ ŋa mɛ́ cɔba o ohémúkúnyi, mbá i hulikinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí indiitie na bɔɔcɔ bukime, i ti líkíme ta bɔkɔ.
49006020	Ya mɛ́ŋa ohényíhényi u yaátɛ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma eéyé, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná aámbáya. Ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na aná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía yámɛ táŋáka háyɛ yɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́ámba na bɔɔcɔ bukime, i ti líkíme ta bɔkɔ.
49006021	A bɛsana bikime a bɛ́ ŋa mɛ́ lɛ́ca, Tisíke, uusú onyíinyí u ɔtɛ́má, káá banɔ́ biíbi laakɛna anyía nuénú ményi anyána ya mɛ́ŋa. Wuúci u ŋɔɔ nyiɔnɔ Kilís buólí na ɔtɛ́má ɔ́mɔtɛ́.
49006022	Yaátɛ́ asana ɛ́ ma mɛ́ banɔ́ wuúci tɔ́mɛ́na, anyía wá banɔ́ láákɛ́na anyána tua sɔ́ŋa, yɔ́ banɔ́ hélúmúkúnyi ɛtɛ́má a tɔɔna.
49006023	Baláamɛ, na cíásɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís bé iínjíékíne benyíinyí bé olumitinine bekime ne mbuumu, ne nulénéne, na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi.
49006024	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á sáyábákɛ́na baacɔ bekime e bé ŋe bú léne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís ne nulénéne a nɔ́ tɛ ŋáá mána ta buɔ́sɛ́.
50001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, na yaŋɔ́ ne Timoté; tua sɔ́ŋa bɔnyiɔnɔ bé Yésus Kilís. Tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, na banɔ́ belumitinine Yésus Kilís bekime [bé nyimónjóló ne wuúci]; ná báánɔ́ bekendisi belumitinine na báánɔ́ batiákɛ́lɛ, banɔ́ bekime ebé nu ŋe nú líhe e Filibí.
50001002	Na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ciasɔ́ Síkíne ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís bá banɔ́ sayábákɛ́na, mbá bá banɔ́ iínjíékíne mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má.
50001003	Ɛ naŋa yemí iínjíékíne ciamɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ bɛ́táá.
50001004	Aáná ya mɛ́ŋa ne obíléne ɔ ɔtɛ́má ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́nɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́
50001005	a nuafa enú nu ŋe nú hiíte o ohulinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma, o otúme buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma aámbáya.
50001006	Ya mɛ́ŋa na mɔŋɔlɛ́ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kéé kúényikinyi ɔnyiɔ ambányɛ yí buólí eyí u ŋeé túme aanɔ́ ɛ ɛtɛ́má ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma buɔ́sɛ́ ebú Yésus Kilís ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́.
50001007	Ɛ ŋá mɛ́ nyɛmána wu ɔbámɔ́kɔ́na na nyɛnamá nyɛ́ ɔbɛ́táá eényí anyía ɛ ŋaá mɛ banɔ́ léne buéŋí. Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ sayábɛ́na banɔ́ bekime bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ háyɛ yaŋɔ́, te ekúlú ayɛ́ ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná, te ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ kamɛ́na Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma, i yiíyi óónyísíkínyi ɛ ɛtɛ́má cɛ́ baacɔ.
50001008	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa uumi ɔmbasɔ́mbásɔ anyía ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ léne, banɔ́ bekime, buéŋí ne nulénéne e nú ŋeé húle ɔ ɔtɛ́má ú Yésus Kilís.
50001009	Aáná ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́nɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía núánɔ́ nulénéne á ááŋánáka bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ a nyɛnamá anyɛ́ nua nɔ́ŋa nú omenyi taaká cɛ́ bɛsana cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nuó ményi obúlúne bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ bɛ́ bɛsana,
50001010	ananyía nyíánɔ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na á bámɔ́kɔ́na nyɛmbányɛ ɔ ɔhɔla. Aáná nu ká nɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ, tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma buɔ́sɛ́ ebú Kilís ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́.
50001011	Yésus Kilís káá banɔ́ íínjie makɛ́nda ma ɔkɛlaka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana; aáná baacɔ ké bú iínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne nuúmi ne nyinyemi a nyíánɔ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na eényí.
50001012	Banɔ́ báámɛ benyíinyí, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba anyía nuénú menyi anyía mɔɔhɔ amá ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bɛ́nyíá aaha ŋaá kɛ́la bɔ kɛla anyía Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma á cɔcɔ́báka bu cɔcɔbaka ne buúse.
50001013	Yááŋa anyía ne bicénji bikime bí ciíbe cɛ kɔ́mɛ́na na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bé etémbí bekime áyá ŋe bú ményi anyía ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná ananyía ɛ ŋa mɛ́ nyiɔnɔ Kilís.
50001014	Yááŋa tɔ́na anyía mɔɔhɔ amá ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bɛ́nyíá aáná ŋe kíndísi buéŋí ɔmbana ú baacɔ weéŋí ú benyíinyí bé olumitinine, anyía bábɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Otéŋí a Waáŋá aámbáya ɔ ɔhɔla, mbá bé húlikinyi baacɔ Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bé ti líkíme.
50001015	Aá taaká baacɔ ɔ bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋe bú húlinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí Kilís, bé mí liŋekine háyɛ anyía tua sɔ́ŋa e biseŋinyinyi ne beébe; mbá a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ tɔ́na ŋe bú húlinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma eéyé na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime.
50001016	Bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛla aáná anyía bé ŋe bú mi léne, anyía bé ŋe bú menyi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi télímínyi ɔ ɔkamɛna Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí Kilís.
50001017	Mbá eebe e bé ŋé bú húlinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí Kilís háyɛ anyía biseŋinyinyi bɛ́áŋa, bá bɔ́ŋa na aabɛ́ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má; bé ŋe bú bíkéti anyía bá bɔ́ŋa bé o mi solikinyinyi muuyé aaha e ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná.
50001018	Ɛ́cɛ anyía, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá na aabɛ́ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, ta anyía na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, bú tɛ ŋá mɛ ɔɔmbɔ ta ɔbaca. Bekime eébé ŋe bú húlinyi baacɔ Kilís; yaátɛ́ asana i ŋeé mi bíléne buéŋí. I ké túné émi bílénéke buéŋí ɔ ɔhɔla;
50001019	ɛ́cɛ anyía i ŋe mí menyi nyɛkɛla eényí káá kɛ́la anyía yamɛ́ nɔhɔ́ na a asana ne úúnú ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na na a asana na nyiɔ́lɔ nyí Elilé eyí Yésus Kilís ŋe iínjiene.
50001020	Nyɛnamá enyí i ŋeé mi léne anyía asana eéyé á bɛ́kɛ́láka aáná, yaŋɔ́ tɔ́na na ɛcaná ɔ ɔtɛ́má, ŋa kɛ́la anyía ɛ tɛ lɔ́kɔ́ma aatɔ́ ɔlama a bɔkɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́. Mbá, i ŋeé mi menyi bɔmbányɛ anyía ta aámbáya te e bikúlú bikime ya mɛ́ŋa na mɔŋɔlɛ́ anyía nyiámɛ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na nyikimekime káá kɛla anyía baacɔ ébú nyemiki Kilís, ta yaŋɔ́ wɔɔ́sɔ ta yaŋɔ́ owéénú.
50001021	Aá yaŋɔ́, i ŋeé mi líhe anyía yémi nyemíki hú Kilís; owé áŋa bíámɛ bɛnamá.
50001022	Mbá, mbɔ́kɔ a asana eyí i ŋeé mi líhe ya mɛ́ŋa wu ɔwɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ baacɔ aáná, i ti ŋé mí menyi aátɛ́ yámɛ́ nyɛmána wu ɔtáfa.
50001023	I me mí eéké ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ bɛháŋá bífendí: I ŋeé mi léne owé anyía yamɛ́ bá ɔlɔŋɔ ne Kilís, buúbu búáŋa bɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔhɔla;
50001024	mbá, ɔlɔbɔ wɔɔ́sɔ áŋa ɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔhɔla a yáánɔ́ asana.
50001025	I ŋe mí menyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ aáná; buátɛ́ bɔkɔ yamɛ́ nyɛmana wu ɔlɔbɔ o olíhe ɔlɔŋɔ na banɔ́ bekime anyía nuánɔ́ kɔ́máka, nu bílénéke o olumitinine noómi.
50001026	Aáná, ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ ká mɛ́ háma eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná, míɔ háná ɔbá aanɔ́ a maabána, nu ká nɔ́ bá na bɔɔcɔ buéŋí o onyemiki Yésus Kilís aámɛ a asana.
50001027	Bɔkɔ abɔ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ hɔla ɔwaamba áŋa anyía nuénú líhéke háyɛ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí Kilís ŋo tóŋínyi, ananyía bú káá kɛ́la anyía, ta ɛ ŋa mɛ́ faáya náánɔ́ ta ɛ tɛ ŋá mɛ faáya, yamɛ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka bé bíkétíki anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ o olumitinine, banɔ́ okelú ɔ́mɔtɛ́, nu nuaka tɔ́na ɛcálɛ ɔtɛ́má ɔ́mɔtɛ́ o ocubisiki Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ne buúse.
50001028	Nɔtɛ bɛ́nyíánáka anyía báánɔ́ beliŋine á banɔ́ bémbíki. Aáná bé ké bú ményi anyía bá bɔ́áŋa benyíménú; mbá banɔ́ bɔnɔhɔ́kɔ́nɔ́. Nyɛkɛla eényí ŋeé húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́,
50001029	anyía nua nɔ́ŋa na ɛbɔla ɔ ɔnyiɔkɛna Kilís buólí, tɛ́ cáŋa hú ɔ ɔháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá, mbá na ɔ ɔlɔ́kɔ́máka tɔ́na muuyé a yááyɛ́ asana.
50001030	Ɛ naŋa nuanɔ́ lɛ́caka ɛcálɛ acɛ́ ɛ na maá mɛ támba. Aámbáya nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma anyía ya mɛ́ánaŋa o o ciíci nua, i ciíci cɔbakana ne buúse. Nua nuáŋa tɔ́na o o ciíci nua ɔlɔŋɔ na yaŋɔ́.
50002001	Isíʼo, tɛ́ka nyimónjóló na banɔ́ ne Kilís ŋáa banɔ́ kíndísi ɔ ɔhɔla e? Tɛ́ka oléne awɔ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ léne ŋaá banɔ́ kíndísi tɔ́na e? Tɛ́ka nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló na banɔ́ ne Efúúménénú yí Elilé anyía nu ŋe nú lénéne banɔ́ na banɔ́, nu ɔ́ɔ́lɔ́kɔ́nɔ́nɔ́ e?
50002002	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba aná anyía nuénu nyíóyísí úúmi ɔtɛ́má ne obíléne hú mbiɔ́kɛ, ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na balatákánɔ́ ɔtɛ́má ɔ́mɔtɛ́, nu lénékéne bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́, banɔ́ nyɛbɛ́táá nyɛ́mɔtɛ́.
50002003	Nu tɛ ɔ́mɔ nɔ́ nyɛ́mana nú ohiiteke nuúmi nɔ́ ɛkata, nuti séŋgínyínyi; mbá énu bílóosiki ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́, nu lɛcaka bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ anyía bá ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ hɔ́la buéŋí.
50002004	Ɔɔcɔ okime náánɔ́ ŋá nyɛmána wú ɔ caŋa aambaka bɔmbányɛ bɔ́ bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ na anyía wá yaámbáka búáyɛ́ bɔ́ bɛ́muátá.
50002005	Ánɔ kɛláka aáná a banɔ́ na banɔ́ háyɛ eebe a bá bɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís.
50002006	Ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía u ŋaá bá bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ ne wuúci na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, u ti ómo bíkétínyi anyía bábɔ́ nyɛmána ne wuúci.
50002007	Mbá, u ŋaá bɛ́yúata nyíáyɛ́ nyɛbá nyikime anyɛ́ u ŋaá bá ne nyiínyi, yó lumitine ɔbɛ́cáŋa munyiɔnɔ ekúlú eyí u ŋe ke bíbíéne ɔɔcɔ ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́, yɔ́ hɔ́áka baacɔ.
50002008	Aáná u ŋe bílóósi wuúci bɛ́muátá, yɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na buéŋí Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma eyí u ŋe lumitine owé, owé ú mahana ɔ ɔmbásá ɔ ɔmuaná.
50002009	Yaátɛ́ asana Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé wuúci béétisi, yó wuúci límísínyi a nɔkɔná a nuáŋá a nɔ́ á hɔ́la, yó wuúci boosiki ne nyiínyi nyí nuúmi a nyɛ́ á hɔ́laka eénye ekime,
50002010	-
50002011	ananyía bú káá kɛla anyía bukime ne e bú ŋé líhe na a bɔ́ ŋá táŋa ta ɔ Ɔmuaná noómi, ta ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́, te i injibí cɛ ɔmɛsɛ́ noómi ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ bú káá lɔ́kɔ́ma bá cámbaka nyiínyi nyí Yésus, bú kɔɔ́ cɔŋɛma o o wuúci nyemi, bú kɔ́ɔnaka ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ baacɔ anyía Yésus Kilís áŋa Otéŋí a Waáŋá, bú iínjíékíne tɔ́na cíáyɛ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ nuúmi.
50002012	Yaátɛ́ asana, baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, nu ne me nú túme ɔ mɛ lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bámɔ́kɔ́ná aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́; aáná búáŋa bɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔhɔla anyía nuánɔ́ cɔbaka ne buúse ɔ ɔ mɛ lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na te ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ tɛ ámɛ bá aanɔ́ a maabána. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ nóhi; yaátɛ́ asana nuanɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔbɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na o wuúci nyiɔnɔ buólí ne nyikéke nyiéŋí.
50002013	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋa banɔ́ kéndisi ekúlú ekime ne o oléne na ɔ ɔkɛla bɛsana a nyíáyɛ́ nyiléne.
50002014	E buólí bukime ebú nu ŋe nú wuúci nyiɔnɔ, nuti bícúcúléke, nɔtɛ sááka ɛsáká,
50002015	ananyía mbá nuanɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na bíáyɛ́ bifúúménénú bɛ́ baáná, tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma, ta na hɛkɛ́bɛ́lɛ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ baacɔ bá hɛɛya hɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci. Énu numísíki eese aabɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ i iŋetí ci tunjoti a tɔ́ ŋa nɔ́ma ɛ ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná,
50002016	nu beébe hulikinyi ɛsɔ́ma e cí ŋe líhísi baacɔ. Mbɔ́kɔ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛla aáná, buɔ́sɛ́ ebú Yésus Kilís ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na ɛ káá mɛ bá háyɛ nyitíne nyí bilúŋe aanɔ́ a aháŋá, bú tóŋgínyi baacɔ anyía buólí abɔ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ nyiɔ́kɔ na makɛ́nda meéŋí tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ bá bú nubókó.
50002017	Mɔŋɔlɛ́ amá nu ŋa nɔ́ háya né Yésus áŋa háyɛ abɛ́sámbá eyí nu ŋe nú iínjie ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ta bá ŋá mɛ ɔɔ́nɔ́, maamɛ manɔ́ŋɔ́ kéé bísólínyi háyɛ nyiínjie a yáánɔ́ abɛ́sámbá. Ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá aáná, i ŋeé mi bíléne buéŋí, i ŋeé mi bíléne buéŋí ɔlɔŋɔ na banɔ́ bekime.
50002018	Híáná tɔ́na, nuanɔ́ nyɛ́mana nú obílénéke buéŋí, énu bílénéke buéŋí ɔlɔŋɔ na yaŋɔ́.
50002019	Mbɔ́kɔ Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus ŋeé lúmítíne, i ŋe mí bíkéti anyía hikúlúkúlú ɛ ká mɛ banɔ́ tɔ́mɛ́na Timoté ɔ ɔkɔɔ́ banɔ́ láakɛna háyɛ ya mɛ́ŋa, anyía cíínú ɛtɛ́má á hálɔ́mɔ́kɔ́na a tɔɔna; ɛkákɛ́la yámɛ lɔ́kɔ́máka háyɛ nua nɔ́ŋa, uúmi ɔtɛ́má wɔ́ hálɔ́mɔ́na tɔ́na a tɔɔna.
50002020	Wuúci wáŋa hɛ́mɔtɛ́ hɛ́ ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mána bɔmbányɛ aaha, u bɛ́ákákɛ́na taaká e úúnú olíhe.
50002021	Yááŋa anyía baacɔ bekime bé etémbí ŋa bɔ́ áamba hú búábɔ́ bɔmbányɛ bɔ́ bɛ́muátá, tɛ́ cáŋa bɔmbányɛ bú Yésus Kilís.
50002022	Banɔ́ bɛ́muátá nu ŋe nú menyi na anyána Timoté ŋoó tóŋgínyí baacɔ yááyɛ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, na anyána u ŋɔɔ́ nyiɔ́kɔ buólí na yaŋɔ́ háyɛ ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔɔ́nɔ́ ŋɔ yɔ́ɔlɔ ciayɛ́ síkíne a asana ne buólí bú nyihulinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma.
50002023	Aáná i ŋeé mi bíkéti anyía ɛ ká mɛ banɔ́ wuúci tɔ́mɛ́na hí ekúlú ayɛ́ bá káá sɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́na yáámɛ asana.
50002024	Mbɔ́kɔ Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé lúmítíne, yaŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá ɛ ká mɛ faaya náánɔ́, i ŋe mí menyi aáná.
50002025	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ lɛca bɔmbányɛ buéŋí anyía yámɛ banɔ́ hélúmúnyínyi ɔtɔ́ma Ɛbafólótit, wáŋa uumi onyíinyí, wuúci tɔ́na yáámɛ ekendinyi ne yí buólí na yɛ́ ɔnua ɛcálɛ; nááyá nu ŋa nɔ́ mɛ tɔ́mɛ́ná bɛnyɛ́ma a bɛ́ ŋaá bá bɛ́ á mɛ bɛ́ámbákɛ́na.
50002026	Wáŋa na ɛcaná ciéŋí cɛ ɔkɔɔ́ banɔ́ lɛcaka banɔ́ bekime, anyía bú ŋeé wuúci yébíki buéŋí anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka bé bíkétíki asana ne uuyé ɔkɔnɔ.
50002027	Aá taaká u ŋɔɔ kɔ́nɔ́kɔ buéŋí; butíkítíki keyé u ŋeé wé mbá, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋeé wuúci bɛ́cámá mahana, yɔ́ háná ɔ mɛ bɛ́cáma mahana tɔ́na. Aáná u ŋeé wuúci eéŋúnyísí anyía ɔtɛ́má ɔnua a wɔ́mɔtɛ́ ti bísólínyi náámɛ.
50002028	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ i ŋe tényí emi wuúci banɔ́ tɔ́mɛ́na anyía nuénú bílénéke buéŋí ekúlú ayɛ́ nu ká háná ánɔ lɛ́cana; yaŋɔ́ tɔ́na uúmí ɔtɛ́má yɔ́ kua a tɔɔna.
50002029	Aáná, nu ŋa nɔ́ nyɛmána nú o wuúci káha ne obíléne anyía nua nɔ́ŋa balatákánɔ́ e nyimónjóló ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá, énu kékéke anamá cá baacɔ eécé aáná.
50002030	Yááŋa anyía u ŋa sɛ́ wáá mama uúyé olíhe a asana ne buólí bú Kilís, u ŋa sɛ́ weé wé anyía weé mi héléníne nyíánɔ́ nyiɔ́lɔ anyɛ́ nu tɛ ɔ́mɔ nɔ bɔ́ŋɔ ohónyí wú o mi nyiínyi héléníne banɔ́ bɛ́muátá.
50003001	Aámbáya, banɔ́ báámɛ benyíinyí bé olumitinine, énu bílénéke buéŋí anyía nua nuáŋa e nyimónjóló ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá. Ɛ tɛ ŋá mɛ tɔmbɔ ɔ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ ɛ naŋa yámɛ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɛ́na buáyá anyía cíínú ɛtɛ́má tɛ bɛ́nyíáka.
50003002	Énu bíkékényíki na bakɛla bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́, bá bɔ́ŋa ɛnyama, bá bɛ́ácáka bɔ bɛ́ácáka.
50003003	Yááŋa anyía basɔ́ tua sɔ́ŋa baacɔ bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a bá na maá bɔ́ bɛ́ácáka taaká cɛ nyɛbɛ́áca; aáná tu ŋe sú wuúci nyemi na yááyɛ́ Elilé, túɔ́ bá na bɔɔcɔ anyía tua sɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís. Nááyá tú ma sɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́, tɛ́ cáŋa o olíhe ú imehú,
50003004	yiíye anyía yaŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá ooci maamɛ mɔŋɔlɛ́ ŋaá bá o olíhe ú imehú. Yááŋa anyía mbɔ́kɔ baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́táá anyía bá bɔ́ŋa bɔ́ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ o olíhe ú imehú, mbá anyána na yaŋɔ́ e?
50003005	Yaŋɔ́ ooci ewú nu ŋe nú menyi, bá ŋaá mɛ́ aacá ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ manamanyɛ́ ma nyiámɛ nyibíbíéne, yaŋɔ́ yeéti yí Islayɛ́l a hɛnyɛ́nɔ́ hɛ́ Bɛnsamɛ́ŋ, taaká ci ebíényi yí Ebélé. A asana na nyɛlátɛ́na nyí bikotí, ya mɛ́ŋa ɔɔcɔ u Bafalisiɛ́ŋ.
50003006	I ŋe mí tekéséké baacɔ bá hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine Kilís a asana na nyíámɛ́ nyiléne nyí uúsú olumitinine e nyiwééné; mío líhéke tɛ́ka na hɛkɛ́bɛ́lɛ a asana na atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yí olíhe eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
50003007	Ta híáná, bɛsana eébí bikime abɛ́ ɛ ŋaá mɛ bá yamɛ́ nɔhɔkɛna, i ŋe mí biíbi bɛ́yúátáka bikime a asana ne Kilís.
50003008	Aáná i ti ŋé mí biíbi lɛcá ta háyɛ bɔkɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ a asana ne nyimenyinyi ne Yésus Kilís, uumi Otéŋí a Waáŋá. I ŋe mí lumítíne ɔbɛ́yúata bukime a yááyɛ́ asana; i biíbi lɛcaka i iŋetí ci tuubí ananyía mbá yámɛ hɔ́ma Kilís,
50003009	míɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na e nyimónjóló ne wuúci bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ. Yaŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá ɛ tɛ ŋá mɛ bɛ́táá ɔbá atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ a nyiámɛ nyɛlátɛ́na nyí bikotí. A asana ayɛ́ ɛ ŋaá mɛ háyá mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ ya mɛ́ŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋe télímínyi ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋaá háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eéyé eé buúse.
50003010	Bɔkɔ a bɔ́ ŋaá mɛ hámɛ́na ɔ ɔtɛ́má, buúbu ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba, áŋa anyía yémi menyinyi ne Yésus, wuúci wáŋa na makɛ́nda ma nyɛhaanyua nyí biwéewé; míɔ lɔ́kɔ́máka tɔ́na muuyé a ciayɛ́ iŋetí, mbá owé mi hiite háyɛ wuúci;
50003011	ɔ ɔkɛla anyía, mbɔ́kɔ búáŋa bu ɔbɛ́kɛ́láka, yámɛ háanyua tɔ́na nyɛhaanyua nyí biwéewé.
50003012	I ti ŋé mi bíkéti anyía ɛ́ maá ká mɛ háma a nyɛmana, ta anyía ya mɛáŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ ɔ ɔhɔla. Mbá ɛ naŋa yámɛ bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na ɔcɔba ne buúse o okohíite bɛnamá bɛ́ ɔtɛ́tá oócí, anyía Yésus Kilís ne me mí hiite háyɛ uuyé ɔɔcɔ.
50003013	Eéʼeé, báámɛ benyíinyí ! I ti ŋé mi bíkéti anyía ya mɛáŋa na bɛnamá eébí. Mbá asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́ ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba áŋa anyía ɛ tɛ háná bɛ́táá bɛsana a bɛ́kɛ́lákánɔ́ bɛ́ ciamɛ elime; ɛ ŋaá mɛ bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na ɔlɛca hú bɛsana a bɛ́áŋa eémi eé buúse.
50003014	Aáná ɛ ŋa mɛ́ cabɛna ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma a nyɛmana, ananyía yámɛ hɔ́máka bɛnamá abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ o ohiiteke ɔ Ɔmuaná, tɔ́ hɔlakɛna né Yésus Kilís.
50003015	Aá basɔ́ bekime abá tua súáŋa tɔkɔ́kɔ́sɛ́tánɔ́ tɔ́ baacɔ, tu ŋa sɔ́ nyɛ́mana tú ɔbámɔ́kɔ́na na nyɛnamá nyɛ́ nyɛbɛ́táá eényí nyɛ́mɔtɛ́; ta híáná, mbɔ́kɔ baacɔ bé etémbí náánɔ́ ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́táá náányia, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ tóŋínyi eese a asana eeye.
50003016	Ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyána, tu ŋa sɔ́ nyɛ́mana tú ɔcɔba ne buúse ɔlɔŋɔ ɔ́mɔtɛ́ i indélímínyínyi ecí tú ne me su hiite ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma aámbáya.
50003017	Benyíinyí, énu mi kétíkínyínyi banɔ́ bekime, ánɔ látákɛ́na nyɛkɛla nyɛ́ baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na háyɛ na yaŋɔ́ na baláamɛ.
50003018	Ɛ naŋa yámɛ banɔ́ láakɛna buáyá, ɛ ŋa háná ámɛ hálɔ́mɔ́nɛ́na ɔ banɔ́ laana aámbáya na bɛlɛlá e eése anyía, baacɔ beéŋí ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na e nyí ŋo tóŋínyi anyía bá bɔ́ŋa beliŋine Kilís, wuúci u ŋeé wé ɔ ɔmbásá ɔ ɔmuaná.
50003019	Nyíábɔ́ nyibíóndísínyi áŋa bunyímé; bá ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́táá hú túábɔ́ tɔɔna, bé tuútu nyemiki i iŋetí cɛ ciabɔ́ bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; aáná bɔkɔ a bɔ́ á nyɛ́mana o beébe iinjie aatɔ́ ɔlama, eé buúbu eébú bá ŋa bɔ́ háya núábɔ́ nuúmi noómi, bá bɛ́tááka hú bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci.
50003020	Aá basɔ́, búásɔ́ bunɔŋɔ áŋa ɔ Ɔmuaná, aá haála ehé Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís, muasɔ́ Munohi, áŋa. Tu ŋa sɔ́ táta na mɔŋɔlɛ́ mekime anyía wá ka hálɔ́mɔ́na.
50003021	Wuúci u káá kɛla anyía ciasɔ́ cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ mahana e cí ŋe wé á bɛ́cáŋa cɛɛ́tɔ ci nuúmi i iŋetí cɛ ciayɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ. U káá kɛlaka aáná a mááyɛ́ makɛ́nda e mé ŋe téŋínyi bɛnyɛ́ma bikime.
50004001	Yaátɛ́ asana, báámɛ benyíinyí bá ɔtɛ́má, énu limíne aná balatákánɔ́ bɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ né Otéŋí a Waáŋá noómi. Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ léne buéŋí, yaŋɔ́ na ɛcaná cɛ ɔ banɔ́ lɛ́cɔtɔna. Nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛla anyía yémi bílénéke buéŋí, nu mi iínjíékíne bɔɔcɔ.
50004002	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na báámɛ benyíinyí eebe, ne Efóti na Sɛ́ntíce, anyía bá bámɔ́kɔ́na na nyɛlɔ́kɔ́mána ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
50004003	Ɔɔ́ kuɔŋɔ́ yáámɛ́ ekendinyi yí buólí, ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ bata anyía óo beébe ɔɔ́lɛ́ta a nyɛlɔ́kɔ́mána eényí; beénjú eébé ŋa bɔ́ núáka ɛcálɛ ɔlɔŋɔ na yaŋɔ́ e nyihulinyi nyɛ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma a baacɔ, ta Kɛ́lɛ́maŋ áyá ɔlɔŋɔ na baacɔ bé etémbí abá tu ŋá sɔ nyiɔkɔ buólí ɔlɔŋɔ ɔ́mɔtɛ́. Beébe eébé cáábɔ́ eénye áŋa cɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ e nufule nú olíhe.
50004004	Énu bílénéke buéŋí ekúlú ekime né Otéŋí a Waáŋá noómi. Ɛ ŋaá mɛ hálɔ́mɔ́nɛ́na ɔkɔɔna anyía énu bílénéke buéŋí !
50004005	Baacɔ bekime ŋa bɔ́ nyɛ́mana bé omenyi nyíánɔ́ nyilimíné nyí mbuumu. Nu bɛ́tááka anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋa ka hálɔ́mɔ́kɔ́na hí aámbáya.
50004006	Nɔtɛ áákɛ́na ta bɔkɔ, mbá ánɔ láakɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɛsana bikime a bɛ́ ŋa banɔ́ yébi, nu wuúci iínjíékíne bitéŋíti ekúlú ekime eyí nu ŋe nú wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na.
50004007	Aáná mbuumu cɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a cɛ́ ŋa hɔ́la bɛsana bikime abɛ́ baacɔ ŋa bɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma, bé menyukune, kéé tétényíki ne cíínú ɛtɛ́má ne cíínú ibíkéti e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís.
50004008	Aánáʼo, báámɛ benyíinyí, asana ayɛ́ míɔ cɔba o obíóndísínyi ɔ banɔ́ laana áŋa anyíaʼo: Nu ŋá nɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔbɛ́tááka e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi bɔkɔ bukime a búáŋa taaká, buúbu baacɔ ŋe bú kéké, bé buúbu nyemiki; nu bɛ́tááka bɔkɔ bukime a búáŋa bufúúménénú, buúbu baacɔ ŋe bú léne bé lémbíki, nu bɛ́tááka tɔ́na a búáŋa bɔmbányɛ, buúbu baacɔ naŋa bébú béétíki.
50004009	Bɛsana abɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ eékúnyíki, núó biíbi lɔ́kɔ́máka, yémi biíbi táŋáka, núó biíbi lɛcaka, yémi biíbi látákɛ́na, énu biíbi látákɛ́na; aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na náánɔ́, yɔ́ banɔ́ iínjíékíne ciayɛ́ mbuumu.
50004010	Ɛ́ɛ, ya mɛ́ŋa háyɛ nyitíne nyí bilúŋe né Otéŋí a Waáŋá noómi anyía nu ŋá háná anɔ́ mɛ bɛ́táá e cíínú ɛtɛ́má. Aá taaká nu naŋa nuanɔ́ mɛ bɛ́tááka buáyá mbá, ohónyí wú o mi tóŋínyi ɔbɛ́táá oócí tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ bá.
50004011	Ta háyɛ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ táŋa aáná, yɛ́ tɛ á bá anyía bɔkɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋaá bá búá mɛ bɛ́ámbákɛna. Yááŋa anyíaʼo, ɛ ŋaá mɛ áákɔ́nákɛ́ná obíléne e nyilimíné nyikime.
50004012	Ɛ́cɛ anyía i ŋe mí menyi olíhe te ekúlú yí mecíli, te ekúlú yɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma biéŋí. Na a bɛhaála bikime na a bɔkɔ bukime i ŋeé mi hélínyi olíhe tɛ́ka ne muuyé, ta yaŋɔ́ oweécénú, ta yaŋɔ́ ɛcaná, ta yaŋɔ́ na bɛnyɛ́ma biéŋí, ta yaŋɔ́ tɛ́ka ne biíbi.
50004013	Ya mɛ́ŋa wu oweéhíkínyi bɛsana eébí bikime a makɛ́nda me Ooci ewú u ŋe mí kindisi.
50004014	Ta híáná, nua nɔ́ŋa bakɛlákánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ asana anyía nua nɔ́ŋa behiiténú nuafa eémi e muuyé.
50004015	Banɔ́ baacɔ bé Filibí, banɔ́ bɛ́muátá nu ŋe nú menyi bɔmbányɛ anyía ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ hatɔ́na a Masɛtuán, míɔ hɔla, e nyitúme nyí ohulinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma, ta hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine a hɛ́mɔtɛ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ mɛ ɔɔ́lɛ́ta na bɔkɔ, ɛ tɛ ŋáá bá hú híínú bímuócí. Nu ŋe nú híítéke nuafa nuéŋí ta aámɛ a bɔmbányɛ te eémi e bunyímé.
50004016	Hú banɔ́ bímuócí nu ŋa nɔ́ mɛ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ, yaŋɔ́ a Tɛsaloníke; bikúlú bífendí nu ŋa nɔ́ mɛ tɔ́mɛ́na bɛnyɛ́ma a bɛ́ ŋaá bá bɛ́á mɛ bɛ́ámbákɛ́na.
50004017	Bu tɛ á bá anyía ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba anyía baacɔ é mi iínjiekine bɛnyɛ́ma mbá, bú ŋa hɔ́la o mi bíléníne anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ námaka a nyíánɔ́ nyiínjie.
50004018	Ya mɛ́ŋa ɔlɛ́cákánɔ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime abɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ mɛ tɔ́mɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na ná Ɛbafólótit, míɔ mɛnaka maatá. Aámbáya, ya mɛáŋa na bɛnyɛ́ma biéŋí ɔ ɔhɔla nyɛnamá a nyɛ́ ŋa mɛ bɛ́ámbɛ́na. Bɛnyɛ́ma eébí áŋa i iŋetí cɛ abɛ́sámbá eyí bé ŋe lúlinyi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ yó yiíye lumitine, yí númbeke bɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔhɔla. Ekúlú ayɛ́ yɛ́ ŋaá bata ɔ Ɔmuaná, yí bílénékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
50004019	Ciamɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ iínjíékíne bɛnyɛ́ma bikime a bɛ́ ŋa banɔ́ bɛ́ámbɛ́na, anyía wáŋa na bɔnɔ́mɛ bú muómóomo. U káá hɔlɛna né Yésus Kilís ɔ ɔ banɔ́ biíbi iínjíékíne.
50004020	Nuúmi á bámɔ́kɔ́na ná ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ e bikúlú bikime ne bikúlú bikime, híáná yááŋa.
50004021	Énu mi téŋíkínyi belumitinine Yésus Kilís bekime a bá bɔ́ŋa aáhá. Báásɔ́ benyíinyí a bá bɔ́ŋa aaha na yaŋɔ́ ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ téŋi.
50004022	Belumitinine bekime ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ téŋi, hɔlákáhɔ́láka eebe a bá ŋa bɔ́ nyiɔ buólí o ooki ú Sɛsáal.
50004023	Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís á banɔ́ sáyábákɛ́na, banɔ́ bekimeʼo.
51001001	Ya mɛ́ŋa Bóol, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá mɛ táfá anyía yámɛ bámɔ́kɔ́na ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma u Yésus Kilís. Yaŋɔ́, ɛ́ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, na yaŋɔ́ ne Timoté uusú onyíinyí u olumitinine.
51001002	Tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ téŋi, banɔ́ belumitinine bé Kolóso. Nua nɔ́ŋa báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine. Nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís, nu ŋe nú wuúci látɛ́na na ɔtɛ́má okime. Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sayábɛ́na, waá banɔ́ íínjíé mbuumu ɔ ɔtɛ́má.
51001003	Tu ŋe sú íínjie Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Síkíne ci uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís, bitéŋíti ekúlú ekime eyí tu ŋe sú wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na eenú eé buúse.
51001004	Tu ŋe sú wuúci íínjie bitéŋíti ananyía tú ŋa sɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus Kilís, nu lénéke tɔ́na belumitinine bekime.
51001005	Nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛla aáná anyía nua nɔ́ŋa na mɔŋɔlɛ́ a bɛsana abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ tábɔ́nɛ́na a Bunɔŋɔ bɔ́ Ɔmuaná. Nu ŋe nú biíbi menyi o otúme ekúlú ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma, yiíyi yɛ́ ŋá kɔɔ́na taaká.
51001006	Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma eéyé ŋa kaáhámá aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́. Yɛ́ ŋa kɛ́la anyía belumitinine á kɛláka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ okime. Baacɔ e bé ŋe bú lúmitinine ŋe bú téke. Híáná yɛ́ ŋaá kɛ́láka náánɔ́ o otúme buɔ́sɛ́ bú buúse ebú nu ŋe nú yiíyi lɔ́kɔ́máka, núo menyi taaká taaká yaála yí nuubo yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
51001007	Ɛ́cɛ yáásɔ́ ekendinyi yí buólí yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má Ɛbáfas ú ŋaá banɔ́ éékúnyíkí bɛsana eébí. U ŋɔɔ́ nyiɔ buólí bú Kilís a búánɔ́ buúse na ɔtɛ́má ɔ́mɔtɛ́.
51001008	Wuúci u ŋaá basɔ́ láákɛ́na anyána Elilé yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋá kɛ́la anyía núénú lénéke bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ belumitinine.
51001009	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ tu ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bikúlú bikime o otúme buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká bɛsana eébí bikime. Tu ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na anyía núénú ményi bɔmbányɛ bɛsana abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé léne anyía núánɔ́ kɛ́láka, nuɔ bá tɔ́na ne injiŋé ikime ne omenyi ewú Elilé yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe yíinjiene.
51001010	Aáná nu ké búle anɔ́ kɛ́la bɛsana e bí ŋeé bíléníne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís, núɔ́ kɛlaka anamánamá cá bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana, nu menyukune bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
51001011	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, a mááyɛ́ makɛ́nda me nuúmi, káá banɔ́ íinjie yɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, anyía núánɔ́ nɔ́mátákána muuyé, nu ééhíkínyínyi bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ o obíléne noómi.
51001012	Énu íínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ cíásɔ́ Síkíne bitéŋíti. Wuúci u ŋaá banɔ́ íinjie makɛ́nda ma ɔbámɔ́kɔ́na na nuafa a bɛsana abɛ́ u ŋaá tábɔ́nákɛ́ná bááyɛ́ baacɔ a haála ehé eese ŋaa nɔ́ma.
51001013	Wuúci u ŋaá basɔ́ aáŋíá e butéŋí bɔ́ Sátan, yɔ́ basɔ́ háya e Butéŋí bú uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u ɔtɛ́má.
51001014	U ŋaá basɔ́ háŋɔ́náká, yɔ́ basɔ́ nyɛ́ánakɛnɛna maasɔ́ maabɛ́ e elime ci uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ ooci.
51001015	Baacɔ ŋa lɛ́cáka uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ oócí, Yésus Kilís. Wáŋa bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ awɔ́ baacɔ tɛ ŋáa lɛ́ca. U ŋa hɔ́la bɛnyɛ́ma bikime abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋee kétíki.
51001016	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaa kɛ́lá anyía Yésus Kilís eé ketíki bɛnyɛ́ma bikime na bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ na bɛ́ ɔmuaná, na a bɛ́ ŋa lɛ́cana na a bɛ́ tɛ ŋáa lɛ́cana; u ŋa kɛ́lá anyía weé ketíki anamánamá cá bɛnyɛ́ma ekime a cɛ́áŋa na makɛ́nda na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔ ɔmuaná. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa kɛ́lá anyía uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ eé ketíki bɛnyɛ́ma eébí bikime, anyía bí é wuúci óómísíki.
51001017	Yésus Kilís ŋaá cáŋacáŋa ɔbá ɛ́cɛ bé ti ŋé kétí na ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔmuaná; a mááyɛ́ makɛ́nda bɛnyɛ́ma bikime áŋa a cáábɔ́ elimíné, wuúci u ŋeé biíbi manɛna, u biíbi líhísíki.
51001018	Wuúci wáŋa aatɔ́, u ŋe kéndisi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine; híáŋa háyɛ ciayɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ. Wáŋa Ɔɔ́nɔ́ ooci awɔ́ u ŋa cáŋacáŋa ɔhaanyua e biwéewé anyía wá bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na u buúsebuúse a bɔkɔ bukime.
51001019	Aáná yí ŋeé bílénékíné Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía bábɔ́ nyɛmána bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ ne uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ a bɛsana bikime.
51001020	Híáná tɔ́na, yí ŋeé wuúci bílénékíné anyía wá tɔ́ma uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ wé ke hémúkúnyi maayɛ́ manɔ́ŋɔ́, mbá u wé ɔ ɔmbásá ɔ ɔmuaná, anyía na bɛnyɛ́ma bikime na baacɔ bekime á bámɔ́kɔ́na a nyɛlɔ́kɔ́mána ne wuúci anyía mbuumu á bámɔ́kɔ́na na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔ ɔmuaná noómi.
51001021	Banɔ́ tɔ́na nu ŋa nɔ́ bá buáyá e nyiitíé na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nu wuúci liŋekine anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ bá nuanɔ́ bɛ́tááka, nu kɛlaka bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana.
51001022	Mbá aámbáya, wuúci u ŋaá kɛ́la anyía núánɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mákána ne wuúci a asana ne owé ú imehú ewú uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ ŋeé wé, anyía núánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na ne efúúménénú yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
51001023	Nu ká nɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na híáná mbɔ́kɔ nu ŋe nú limíne bɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ o olumitinine noómi, núɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ a bɛsana bɛ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ayɛ́ nú ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka. Yiíyi etéeyé bé ŋee húlíkínyi baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́ bekime. Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá mɛ tɔ́ma anyía yemí yiíyi hulíki tɔ́na.
51001024	Aámbáya i ŋeé mi bíléne e muuyé amɔ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ lɛca eenú eé buúse. Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma ɔkála eé buúse bɔ́ hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine, háyɛ Kilís tɔ́na ŋaá lɔ́kɔ́máká ɔkála buáyá. Hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine áŋa háyɛ ciayɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ. Ɛ ŋaá mɛ lɔ́kɔ́ma ɔkála aá cɛɛ́tɔ aáná, anyía yémi nyióyísínyi muuyé mɔ búáyɛ́ buólí.
51001025	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá mɛ táfá anyía yámɛ bámɔ́kɔ́na munyiɔnɔ mu hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine, yó mi íínjie buólí anyía yámɛ banɔ́ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ. Buólí eébú áŋa anyía yémi húlíkínyi baacɔ bekime bíáyɛ́ Bɛsana bikime.
51001026	Buáyá, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá bátɛ́ná asana eéyé indiitie. Mbá aámbáya ú meé yiíyi tóŋínyi á bááyɛ́ baacɔ.
51001027	U ŋeé lénéke o beébe tóŋínyi anyía asana ayɛ́ ú ŋa yáamba ɔkɛla áŋa yaandándá yɛ́ asana a yɛ́ ŋa hɔ́la bɛsana bikime, yiíyi yɛ́ kɔ́ɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ mɔnɔŋɔ má baacɔ mekime. Asana eéyé áŋa anyía Kilís áŋa aanɔ́ ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi. Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ nua nɔ́ŋa na mɔŋɔlɛ́ anyía nu ká nɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na na nuafa eé nuúmi nɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
51001028	Kilís waáta tu ŋe sú húli yááyɛ́ asana o owoókísi baacɔ bekime i injiŋé ikime acɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ iínjíe, ananyía tu ŋa sɔ́ áamba anyía baacɔ bekime a bá bɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Kilís ábɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa yáamba.
51001029	Aáná í ŋeé mi bíínjíe e buólí eébú, a búáŋa háyɛ ɛcálɛ, na makɛ́nda emé Kilís ŋeé mi íínjíé; meéme me ŋeé mi kíndísi e buólí.
51002001	Énu menyí anyía ɛ ŋa mɛ́ nua ɛcálɛ eécí na makɛ́nda ne eenú eé buúse, ne eé buúse bú belumitinine bá Lawotisé, ne eé buúse bú belumitinine bekime e bé ti ŋé bu mí menyí.
51002002	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ nua aáná anyía na banɔ́ ne beébe nuánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na na ɛtɛ́má cɛ́ ɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́, nu lénékéne e nyimónjóló noómi. Aáná nu ká nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ asana ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá bátɛ́ná indiitie, nuó yiíyi menyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ, yiíyi yááŋa Kilís.
51002003	Waáta Kilís áŋa ne injiŋé ikime ne omenyi okime. Bɛandándá bɛ́ bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana eébí ŋeé húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
51002004	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ láana bɛsana eébí anyía ɔɔcɔ tɛ banɔ́ néŋé na ɔtáŋa ú ɛŋɔŋɔ.
51002005	Énu menyí anyía ta ya mɛ́ŋa haaca na banɔ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ bɛ́táá bikúlú bikime; i bílénéke anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ a mɔŋɔlɛ́ amá nu ŋa nɔ́ háya né Kilís, nu kɛlaka bɛsana a nyɛlatana noómi.
51002006	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, e nyilumitinine enyí nú ŋe nú lúmitinine anyía Yésus Kilís áŋa Otéŋí a Waáŋá, ánɔ cɔba ne buúse o olíhe háyɛ u ŋa yáamba.
51002007	Ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na bebíínjíénú nááyá, nu látákɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ bá ŋaá banɔ́ eékúnyíki, ánɔ cɔba ne buúse ɔ ɔwɔɔ́nɛ́na e nyiékúnyi nyɛ́ bɛsana bí Kilís noómi, nu iínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti buéŋí.
51002008	Énu bíkékényíki anyía ɔɔcɔ tɛ banɔ́ néŋé na yaála yí omenyi a yɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔ́ɔ́lɔ. Waáta omenyi oócí ú ŋeé húle na a abɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na cá baacɔ na a makɛ́nda me ibíne, ú ti húle né Kilís.
51002009	Énu menyí anyía bɛsana bikime a bɛ́áŋa ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bɛ́áŋa taaká tɔ́na híáná né Kilís, bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́;
51002010	nuó ményi tɔ́na anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ iínjíékíné bɛnyɛ́ma bikime anyía nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Kilís, wuúci u ŋe téŋínyi metéŋí mekime a mááŋa na makɛ́nda na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔ ɔmuaná.
51002011	Nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne wuúci, buátɛ́ bɔkɔ énu menyí anyía ú maá banɔ́ áácaka. Mbá tɛ́ cáŋa a nyɛbɛ́áca anyɛ́ baacɔ naŋa bábɔ́ bɛ́ácáka. Nyɛbɛ́áca eényí Kilís ú ŋeé nyiínyi kɛla; ɛ́cɛ anyía ú má banɔ́ aáŋíá a buɔ́lɛ́ bɔ́ nyíánɔ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a nyɛɛbɛ́ nyɛ́ buáyá.
51002012	Owootine awɔ́ bá ŋaá banɔ́ óótíne ŋoó tóŋínyi anyía bá ŋaá banɔ́ nyíé ɔlɔŋɔ ne Kilís; ú tóŋgínyi tɔ́na anyía na banɔ́ ne Kilís nú ma nɔ́ háányúá é biwéewé ɔlɔŋɔ ɔ́mɔtɛ́. Yááŋa anyía nu ŋe nú lúmítíníne anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ewú u ŋeé héenyi Kilís é biwéewé áŋa na makɛ́nda ma ɔ banɔ́ heényi é biwéewé tɔ́na.
51002013	Buáyá nu ŋa nɔ́ bá háyɛ biwéewé anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ bá nuanɔ́ kɛ́laka bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́, ɛ́cɛ Kilís tɛ ŋá banɔ́ aáŋíá a buɔ́lɛ́ bɔ́ nyíánɔ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a nyɛɛbɛ́. Mbá aámbáya, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ma banɔ́ iínjie yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe ne Yésus Kilís, yɔ́ basɔ́ nyɛánɛnɛna maasɔ́ maabɛ́ basɔ́ bekime.
51002014	U ŋaá basɔ́ nyɛánɛ́nɛ́na buhíné ebú esúŋe ŋaá bá cá basɔ́ bátaka, bú basɔ́ nuusiki. U ŋeé buúbu aáŋíá buúse bukime, yó buúbu túéhínyi né Yésus e uúyé owé ɔ ɔmbásá ɔ ɔmuaná.
51002015	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋɔ́ sɔ́mɔ́kɔ makɛ́nda mekime ma bɛnyɛ́ma bikime a bɛ́áŋa na makɛ́nda na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔ ɔmuaná, yó biíbi iínjíe aatɔ́ ɔlama eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ bekime, anyía wé tóŋínyi anyía uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ ŋeé biíbi hɔ́la a makɛ́nda.
51002016	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, nɔtɛ lɔ́kɔ́máka ɛtáŋa cɛ́ baacɔ a cɛ́ ŋa kɔɔ́na anyía: «Nɔtɛ nyíá bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá eébí, nɔtɛ múána meluku emenyíé», ta anyía: «Ánɔ kɛ́láka bɔŋanda eébú, énu nyemíki na abála cé oólí, na mɔɔ́sɛ́ mé ehélúme yí Besuif.»
51002017	Nuti beébe lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na, anyía bɛsana eébí bikime ŋaá bá bíé tóŋgínyi tubílícínyínyí tɔ́ taaká cɛ asana a yɛ́ káá fáaya: Yiíyi yááŋa Kilís bɛ́muátá.
51002018	Nuti beébe lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na, anyía bá ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔna anyía baacɔ é kélíki cɛɛ́tɔ o obílóosi, bé nyémiki bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Bá bɔ́ŋa na bumálá, bá kɔ́ɔnaka anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ meé beébe tóŋgínyi bɛsana. Nyɛnamá nyɛ́ baacɔ eényí ŋe bíbééti etémbí ne etémbí, bá bɛ́tááka hú bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́.
51002019	Bá tɛ abɔ́ bá a nyɛlatana ne Kilís a wáŋa aatɔ́. Yiíye anyía ne Kilís cɛɛ́tɔ ŋɔ bɔ́ŋɔ bɔkɔ bukime e bú ŋé ciíci bɛ́ámbɛ́na. Baacɔ a bá bɔ́ŋa a nyɛlatana ne wuúci ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ma nááyá háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa yáamba. Wáŋa a nyɛlatana ne beébe háyɛ cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ ɔɔcɔ áŋa ɛlatákánɔ́ na ɔɔ́ŋɔ́ na tulaŋá.
51002020	Yaŋɔ́ ɛsɛ́ nu ŋe nú wé ɔ ɔlɔŋɔ ne Kilís, buátɛ́ bɔkɔ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime a bɛ́áŋa na makɛ́nda na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔ ɔmuaná tɛ á bá ne butéŋí náánɔ́ e? Mbá anyíatɛ́ nu ŋe nú líhe háyɛ baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́ ekúlú ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ látɛ́na esúŋe a cá ŋa kɔɔ́na anyía:
51002021	«Eti bítíse bɔkɔ eébú, eti hiíte bɔkɔ ebunyíé, eti buúbu ɔ́ɔ́kɛ́tɛ́na e?»
51002022	Esúŋe ekime eécé ŋeé húle hú e eékúnyi cá baacɔ. Cá ŋa mána ekúlú ayɛ́ baacɔ meé ceéce bɛ́kɛ́lákɛ́na.
51002023	Baacɔ ŋe bú keti anyía esúŋe eécé ŋe yíinjie injiŋé anyía bá ŋa kɔ́ɔna anyía ɔɔcɔ ŋá nyɛmána wu ɔlátákɛ́na bikotí, yó lóosi cɛɛ́tɔ, u ciíci kélíki. Mbá esúŋe eécé ŋɔɔ́ yɔ́ɔlɔ baacɔ hú ɔlátɛ́na nyiléne nyí cííbú imehú.
51003001	Yaŋɔ́ ɛsɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ heényi e biwéewé ɔlɔŋɔ ne Kilís e? Yaátɛ́ asana ánɔ aámbáka bɛsana a bɛ́áŋa ɔ Ɔmuaná haála ehé Kilís áŋa. Wáŋa limine e nyilimíné nyí nuúmi a aháŋá yɛ́ ɔɔbɔ́ ú manɔ́mɛ ú Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
51003002	Ánɔ bɛ́tááka bikúlú bikime bɛsana bɛ́ Ɔmuaná, nɔtɛ bɛ́tááka bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci.
51003003	Yááŋa anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bewéénú, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ma bátɛ́na uúnú olíhe né Kilís.
51003004	Kilís wáŋa taaká uúnú olíhe; ekúlú ayɛ́ u ká háná ka hálɔ́mɔ́na, na banɔ́ ne wuúci, nu ká nɔ́ bá eé nuúmi noómi.
51003005	Yaátɛ́ asana ánɔ aáŋíáka ɛtɛ́má a bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ abɛ́ nú ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la. Ibiébi bíáŋa anyía ɛnjɔkɔ́nɔ́nɔ, ɔkɛla bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́, ɔbá na hiɔkɔ ɔtɛ́má, na bɛɛbɛ́ bí ibíkéti, na yaáká yí eése; yiíyi yááŋa nyinyemi nyɛ́ bɛbɔ́kɔ́bɔ́kɔ.
51003006	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kóó lóbísíkínyi baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛ́la nyɛnamá nyɛ́ bɛsana eényí.
51003007	Banɔ́ tɔ́na nu ŋa nɔ́ bá nuánɔ kɛláka buáyá anamá cá bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana eécé, ekúlú ayɛ́ cíínú ɛtɛ́má ŋaá bá eé biíbi.
51003008	Mbá aámbáya nɔtɛ háná kɛ́la bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana eebi: Ne hilóbi, ne tuliŋéliŋe, na nyɛŋána, na muɔ́mbɔ́nána ne mutúménéné bɛahɔ́.
51003009	Nuti néŋékénéne banɔ́ na banɔ́, ananyía nú ma nɔ́ nyɛánáka na bíánɔ́ bɛɛsɔ bɛ́ buáyá na bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́ abɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ bá nuánɔ kɛláka,
51003010	nua nuáŋa babɛ́tɔ́sɔ́nɔ́; muasɔ́ Muketi maá banɔ́ íínjie yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, u ŋé wuúci hélúmúnyi bikúlú bikime wɔɔ́sɔ háyɛ úúyé ɔtɛ́má áŋa, ananyía núénú wuúci menyí bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ.
51003011	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ bú tɛ ŋá háná ɔ yɔɔ́lɔ anyía bá kɔɔ́náka anyía Besuif eebe, ebenyíé tɛ ábɔ́ bá Besuif; benduéndue eebe, babɛ́ácákánɔ́ ebenyíé; be-ti-menyí bɔkɔ eebe, becikécíke ebenyíé; bɛɔ́lɛ́ eebi, ebenyíé tɛ ábɔ́ bá bɛɔ́lɛ́; ananyía baacɔ bekime a bɔ́ŋa bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, anyía Kilís ŋee téŋínyi bɛnyɛ́ma bikime, wáŋa a bááyɛ́ baacɔ bekime.
51003012	Yaátɛ́ asana, ánɔ hákɛ́na ɛtɛ́má e nuubo noómi, a bɔmbányɛ noómi, o obílóosi noómi, e nyisioŋono nyɛ́ ɔtɛ́má noómi, ne oweéhínyínyi noómi, ananyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lénéké, yɔ́ banɔ́ táfáka anyía núánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na bááyɛ́ baacɔ.
51003013	Énu eéhíkínyínyi, nu nyɛánákánána bɛsana ekúlú ayɛ́ sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ á kɛ́la sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bɔkɔ a bɔɔbɛ́; ánɔ nyɛánákánána na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime háyɛ Yésus tɔ́na ŋaá banɔ́ nyɛánákɛ́nɛ́na na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime.
51003014	Asana a yɛ́ á hɔ́la bɛsana eébí bikime áŋa anyía énu lénékénéne, ananyía nulénéne ŋaa kɛ́la anyía núánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na e nyimónjóló bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ.
51003015	Mbuumu e cí ŋeé húle ne Kilís é limíne bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi, nu menyukune anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ú ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́ e mbuumu eécí, ananyía nuánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na balatákánɔ́ na ɔtɛ́má ɔ́mɔtɛ́. Énu búle wuúci iínjie bitéŋíti.
51003016	Bɛsana a bɛ́ ŋaa lɛ́ca Kilís ó nyíóyókó e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi hú mbiɔ́kɛ. Énu eékúnyíkínyínyi, nu lébékénéne ne injiŋé ikime. Énu iínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti na ɔtɛ́má okime ekúlú eyí nu ŋe nú wuúci háyɛ́na maŋana ne me nyinyemi, na ma ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na, ne emé Efúúménénú yí Elilé ŋaá banɔ́ tóŋínyi ɔhákɛ́na.
51003017	A bɛsana bikime abɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la nu táŋáka, ánɔ kɛláka nu táŋáka háyɛ eebe a bá ŋá bɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus, nɔ hɔlakɛna tɔ́na nááyá o owiínjie Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti.
51003018	Banɔ́, beénjú bá ɔtɔ́nɔ́, enú kékéke báánɔ́ banɔ́mɛ; aáná Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋa yáamba anyía núánɔ́ kɛ́láka, anyía nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne wuúci.
51003019	Banɔ́, banɔ́mɛ, hú naányɛ́ é tétényíki uuyé oónyí bɔmbányɛ; nuti beébe súŋékíne meése.
51003020	Banɔ́, baáná, anɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na bíánɔ́ bibíényi a bɛsana bikime; aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa yáamba, anyía nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
51003021	Banɔ́, síkíne, nuti liŋísíki báánɔ́ baáná, keyé bé ŋé búle abɔ́ kása.
51003022	Banɔ́, bɛɔ́lɛ́, ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na báánɔ́ baáŋá bá ɔmɛsɛ́ a bɛsana bikime; tɛ́ cáŋa hú ekúlú ayɛ́ bá bɔ́ŋa hoóhi na banɔ́ ɔ banɔ́ nyiósi, anyía nuénú beébe bílénékíne. Mbá énu beébe lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime yí eebe e bé ŋe bú kéke Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
51003023	Buólí bukime abɔ́ bá banɔ́ iínjíé, énu buúbu nyiɔ́kɔ na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime, anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá nú ŋa nɔ́ nyíɔnɔ; tɛ́ cáŋa hú baacɔ bímuócí.
51003024	Énu menyí anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá u káá banɔ́ námaka. U káá banɔ́ íínjíékíne bɛnyɛ́ma abɛ́ u ŋaá batɛ́ákɛ́nɛ́na bááyɛ́ baacɔ. Kilís, wuúci wáŋa taaká taaká cɛ Waáŋá awɔ́ nú ŋa nɔ́ nyíɔnɔ.
51003025	Mbá baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛ́la bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́ ké bu híiteke bɛnamá a bɛɛbɛ́, anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ á bá na mutáfána mɔ baacɔ.
51004001	Banɔ́, bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ baáŋá, énu tétényíki bíánɔ́ bɛɔ́lɛ́ bɔmbányɛ háyɛ yɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́ámba, nu bɛ́tááka anyía banɔ́ tɔ́na nua nɔ́ŋa na Waáŋá ɔ Ɔmuaná.
51004002	Ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bikúlú bikime, ánɔ háya ɔtɛ́má ɔ ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na, nu wuúci íínjíékíne tɔ́na bitéŋíti.
51004003	Ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na tɔ́na a yáásɔ́ asana, anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á basɔ́ tóŋínyi ohónyí wú ohulikinyi baacɔ yááyɛ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí Kilís ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa bátɛ́na indiitie. A yaátɛ́ asana yí indiitie eéyé ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná aámbáya.
51004004	Ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na anyía yémi húlíkínyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma háyɛ yɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́ámba.
51004005	Énu líhéke ne injiŋé ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ ci be-ti-lumítíníne Kilís, ánɔ aambáka ohónyí wú ohulikinyi be-ti-lumítíníne Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma e bikúlú bikime abɛ́ nuánɔ́ ɔɔ́ndɛ́mánána.
51004006	Énu hémúkúnyi ekúlú ekime bɛmbányɛ bí mehúnyi, bí sóomoko; aáná nu ké búle enú bíhélúmúnyi bɔmbányɛ ɛmbataka cɛ́ ɔɔcɔ okime.
51004007	A bɛsana bikime a bɛ́ ŋa mɛ́ lɛca, Tisíke u kéé biíbi banɔ́ láakɛna; wáŋa uusú onyíinyí u ɔtɛ́má. U ŋɔɔ́ nyiɔ buólí bú Kilís na ɔtɛ́má ɔ́mɔtɛ́; wáŋa tɔ́na yáámɛ ekendinyi yí buólí bú Kilís.
51004008	Yaátɛ́ asana í me mí wuúci banɔ́ tɔ́mɛ́na anyía wá banɔ́ láákɛ́na anyána tua sɔ́ŋa, yɔ́ banɔ́ hélúmúkúnyi ɛtɛ́má.
51004009	Wáŋa ɔlɔŋɔ ne wuúci ne uusú onyíinyí u ɔtɛ́má Onesime; u ŋa látɛna tɔ́na Kilís na ɔtɛ́má ɔ́mɔtɛ́. U ŋeé húle náánɔ́. Beébe eébé bá ká bɔ́ banɔ́ bíkétíkínyi bɛsana bikime a bɛ́áŋa aáhá.
51004010	Alisitáak a wáŋa aaha eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná na yaŋɔ́ ŋaá banɔ́ téŋi. Malɛ́kus, onúséyé u Baanábas ŋaá banɔ́ téŋi tɔ́na. (Mbɔ́kɔ u ŋá fááya náánɔ́, énu wuúci káha bɔmbányɛ, anyía nu ŋe nú ményi aátɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ éékúnyíki ɔ ɔkɛla.)
51004011	Yésus, awɔ́ bɔ́ ŋɔɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ anyía Yusítus, ŋaá banɔ́ téŋi tɔ́na. Hú bɛ́tátɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ eébí bɛ́áŋa Besuif a bá ŋa bɔ́ nyiɔ buólí na yaŋɔ́ aáhá anyía baacɔ é lumítíníne anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa Otéŋí a Waáŋá. Bé ŋe bú mi hélúmúnyi ɔtɛ́má.
51004012	Ɛbáfas a wáŋa uunú ɔɔcɔ a wɔ́mɔtɛ́, ŋaá banɔ́ téŋí. U ŋɔɔ́ nyiɔ buólí bú Yésus Kilís. Ú meé bíínjíe na makɛ́nda ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ eenú eé buúse anyía nuénú lúmitinine na makɛ́nda, nu kɔmaka o ohónyí ú Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nu menyukune bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ aátɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa yáamba anyía nuánɔ́ kɛ́láka.
51004013	I ŋe mí menyi bɔmbányɛ anyía u ŋa lɛ́ca muuyé buéŋí e buólí abɔ́ ú ŋɔɔ nyiɔ ne eenú eé buúse, ne eé buúse bú belumitinine bá Lawotisé na bá Híélabolis tɔ́na.
51004014	Lúkas, muasɔ́ muándɛ́na baacɔ mu ɔtɛ́má, ne wuúci na Tɛ́mas ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ téŋí tɔ́na.
51004015	Énu mi téŋgínyí belumitinine bekime bá Lawotisé, énu téŋíti tɔ́na oónjú awɔ́ bɔ́ ŋɔ lɔ́ŋɔ anyía Nímfa na hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine a hɛ́ náŋa hɛ́a bɛ́bándákána e úúyé ooki.
51004016	Núánɔ́ fanaka nufule eénú, énu nuúnu tɔ́mɛ́na hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine hɛ́ Lawotisé, anyía bábɔ́ fánáka tɔ́na. Belumitinine bá Lawotisé ká bɔ́ banɔ́ tɔ́mɛ́na nufule enú í ŋe mí beébe ɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɛ́na anyía núénú nuúnu fanáka tɔ́na.
51004017	Nu laana Alésibe anyía wá bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na onyíóyísínyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ buólí ebú Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé wuúci iínjíé.
51004018	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɛ́ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔɔ́ŋɛ́na bitéŋíti eebi: Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ téŋítíʼo ! Nɔtɛ bɛ́hɔ́ya anyía ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sayábákɛ́naʼo !
52001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔɔ́ŋɔ nufule eenu. Tua sɔ́ŋa ne Sílas ne Timoté; ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ nuúnu ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na, banɔ́ hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine Yésus hɛ́ bálɛ́ka cɛ Tɛsaloníke. Nua nɔ́ŋa baacɔ bé Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, banɔ́ tɔ́na bé Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sáyábɛ́na, wá banɔ́ íínjíé mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi.
52001002	Tu naŋa tuesú iínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti eenú eé buúse, banɔ́ bekime, ekúlú ekime eyí tu ŋe sú wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na.
52001003	Yááŋa anyía tu ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́táá búánɔ́ buólí ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, anyía nu ŋe nú lumitinine, nɔ lɛcaka muuyé o o wuúci léne; tu ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́táá tɔ́na háyɛ nú me nú óónyísínyi maanɔ́ mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
52001004	Benyíinyí, tu ŋe sú ményi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lénéké, yɔ́ banɔ́ lɔ́tɔkɔ, anyía nuánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na bááyɛ́ baacɔ.
52001005	Tu ŋe sú ményi aáná, anyía tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ banɔ́ húlikinyi Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma hú ne nyuúté, mbá a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé, tu menyukune anyía bɛsana eébí áŋa taaká. Banɔ́ bɛ́muátá, nu ŋe nú ményi yáásɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ bá aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ a asana na búánɔ́ bɔmbányɛ.
52001006	Nu ŋa nɔ́ basɔ́ kétíkínyínyi, núo kétikinyinyi tɔ́na Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus. Ekúlú eyí nu ŋe nú lumitinine, nu ŋa nɔ́ lɛcá muuyé buéŋí; ta híáná, nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne obíléne ewú ú ŋe húle né Efúúménénú yí Elilé.
52001007	Yaátɛ́ asana nua núáŋa hibílícínyínyí ehé belumitinine Kilís bekime na bá Masɛtuán na bá Akayí ábɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔlátáka.
52001008	Yááŋa anyía baacɔ bekime á bɛhaála bikime á bɔ́áŋa o omenyi Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma e yí ŋe húle náánɔ́, tɛ́ cáŋa hú na a Masɛtuán na a Akayí. Mbá anyía baacɔ eébé bekime ŋa bɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka bé bíketiki anyána nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Bú tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ anyía túá háná esú bíketiki aaha.
52001009	Beébe bɛ́muátá bekime ŋe bú bíkétíkínyi baacɔ na anyána nu ŋa nɔ́ basɔ́ káha, ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋga sɔ́ háma náánɔ́ na anyána nu ŋe nú kínéke onyemi bɛbɔ́kɔ́bɔ́kɔ, nuɔ bɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́nákɛ́na ɛtɛ́má o onyemi taaká cɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a wáŋa wɔɔ́sɔ.
52001010	Bé ŋe bú ményi tɔ́na anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ táta nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí Yésus, Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, weé húlúkúne haála ahɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa. Wuúci Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé héényi e biwéewé, anyía wá basɔ́ kétúnyíki basɔ́ bekime a nyɛkála nyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a nyɛ́ ŋa fáakɔna.
52002001	Baláamɛ, yááŋa anyía nu ŋe nú menyi bɔmbányɛ banɔ́ bɛ́muátá anyía nyíásɔ́ nyɛkaáháma náánɔ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ bá etémbí.
52002002	Nu menyukune tɔ́na anyía bá ŋa cáŋa á basɔ́ ɔɔmbɔ́náka a bálɛ́ka ci Filibí; túɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé. Ta híáná, ayɛ́ ba-basɔ́-nuusi ŋa bɔ́ bá beéŋí, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ iínjíé makɛ́nda ma ɔ banɔ́ húlikinyi yááyɛ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma.
52002003	Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ayɛ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ bá tuesú húlikinyi baacɔ bekime tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ bá nyɛnana, yɛ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ bá ta asana yɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́, te yí munéŋéne.
52002004	Mbá tu naŋa tuesú húlikinyi baacɔ hú bɛsana abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe léne. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋá lɛ́cáka anyía tua sɔ́ŋa baacɔ bɔ́ mɔŋɔlɛ́, yɔ́ basɔ́ cúmeke yááyɛ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma, anyía túésú yiíyi huliki, tɛ́ cáŋa o obílénékíne baacɔ mbá, o bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, wuúci u ŋe ményi cíísú ɛtɛ́má.
52002005	Nu ŋe nú ményi bɔmbányɛ anyía ta buɔ́sɛ́ tu tɛ ŋá sɔ kɔ́ɔna asana tɛ yí munéŋéne, ta yɛ́ ɛŋɔŋɔ, ta yɛ́ ɔ basɔ́ iínjie bɔkɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́; ta Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɛ́muátá ŋe ményi aáná.
52002006	Tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ aamba ta buɔ́sɛ́ anyía ta banɔ́, ta baacɔ bé etémbí á basɔ́ iínjíékíne nuúmi.
52002007	Tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ tóŋínyi búásɔ́ bɔɔcɔ, basɔ́ baacɔ bá ɛndɔ́ma bé Kilís, mbá tu ŋe sú bíloósi ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́, túó límine mbuumu aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ háyɛ iinyí ŋe sókóbi bááyɛ́ baáná.
52002008	Tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ lénéké buéŋí, buátɛ́ bɔkɔ tu ŋa sɔ́ lɛca bɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔ banɔ́ húlinyi Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, túɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na hoóhi ne owiínjie úúsú olíhe a yáánɔ́ asana. Ánɔ lɛcá, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ lénéké buéŋí ɔ ɔhɔla.
52002009	Baláamɛ, tɛ́ka nua núánáŋa ɔ ɔbɛ́táá na muasɔ́ muuyé ne buólí abɔ́ tu ŋá sɔ bá tuasɔ́ nyíɔkɔ ne nebutúé na nabuɔ́sɛ́ anyía tu ti yébi ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ aá banɔ́ a asana na bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá e? Yaátɛ́ ekúlú eéyé tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ húlíkínyi ne uúsú ɔtɛ́má okime Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma e yí ŋeé húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
52002010	Nu ŋe nú ményi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ, ta Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áyá, anyía úúsú olíhe aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́, banɔ́ belumitinine, ŋaá bá ɔmbányɛ, wuúci ɔtálɛ́mánánɔ́ tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma a hɛ́mɔtɛ́.
52002011	Nu menyukune tɔ́na anyía tu ŋa sɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́lɔ́kɔ́ ɔɔcɔ okime aá banɔ́ háyɛ síkíne cɛ baáná ŋɔ yɔ́ɔ́lɔ bááyɛ́ baáná bá bɛ́muátá.
52002012	Basɔ́, tu ŋa sɔ́ bá tuasɔ́ banɔ́ kíndísíki ɛtɛ́má, tu banɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́nɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bikúlú bikime anyía núénú líhéke háyɛ ú ŋe léne, mbá wuúci ú ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ anyía núénú hiíte nuafa na a búáyɛ́ Butéŋí na a núáyɛ́ nuúmi.
