52002013	Yááŋa anyía tu ŋe sú íínjie Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti bikúlú bikime a asana eeye tɔ́na: Ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ húlíkínyí Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nu ŋe nú biíbi káhá bɔmbányɛ e cíínú ɛtɛ́má háyɛ taaká cɛ́ bɛsana e bí ŋe húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, tɛ́ cáŋa háyɛ e bí ŋe húle ná baacɔ. Híáná bɛ́áŋa taaká taaká Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Bɛsana eébí ŋaá banɔ́ íínjie makɛ́nda ɛ ɛtɛ́má, banɔ́ belumitinine.
52002014	Baláamɛ, nu ŋa nɔ́ hɔ́á tuɔ́bɔ tú belumitinine Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tú iisí ci Yuté a tɔ́ ŋaá hákɛ́ná mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus Kilís. Besuif ŋe bú tuútu tékéséke. Aámbáya báánɔ́ baacɔ ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ tékése tɔ́na bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́.
52002015	Besuif a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ eébé ŋa bɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́nɔ́kɔ́ behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bá buáyá; e elime eécí a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́nɔ́kɔ́ Yésus, ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ eeme a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ tɔ́na ŋa bɔ́ basɔ́ tékése. Bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛ́la bɛsana e bí ti ŋée bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bá bɔ́ŋa beliŋine bá baacɔ bekime.
52002016	Bá ŋá sɛ́ bábɔ́ basɔ́ koti ohulinyi baacɔ a bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá Besuif Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, biíbi bíáŋa bí o beébe nohiki. Híáná bá ma háná ábɔ́ kɛla bɔɔbɛ́ e bú mo nyíóyísínyi ɔmbana ú maabɛ́ me etémbí amá bá naŋa bábɔ́ kɛ́láka. Mbá e elime, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ meé beébe lóbísíkínyi.
52002017	Baláamɛ, a yáásɔ́ aháŋá, ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ aálɔ́náná na banɔ́ ne eése a yɛ́mɔtɛ́ ekúlú, tu tɛ háná lɛcana, tu ŋa sɔ́ bá tuasɔ́ banɔ́ bɛ́tááka ɔ ɔtɛ́má noómi. Tu ŋa sɔ́ bá tuasɔ́ bɛ́tááka buéŋí anyía tu ká sɔ́ faáya ɔ ɔkɔɔ́ banɔ́ lɛca.
52002018	Yááŋa anyía tu ŋa sɔ́ bá tuesú lénéke ɔkɔɔ́ banɔ́ lɛca. Yaŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá Bóol, ɛ ŋaá mɛ bɛ́kánáka bikúlú biéŋí ɔfaaya náánɔ́, mbá Sátan ŋa bɛ́kɛ́ŋɛ́lɛ́ákána o ohónyí.
52002019	Aá taaká, tu ŋe sú lénéke ɔkɔɔ́ banɔ́ lɛca aáná, anyía banɔ́ tɔ́na nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la anyía tua sɔ́ŋa tú ɔmɔ́ŋɔluaka na mɔŋɔlɛ́, ne obíléne, ne nuúmi eé buúse bú Otéŋí a Waáŋá a nyíáyɛ́ nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na.
52002020	Taaká, tua sɔ́ŋa ne nuúmi, tu bílénéke anyía yáánɔ́ asana.
52003001	E elime, tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ bá tú ɔ háná céényi ɔtáta omenyi anyána nú ŋe nú líhe; yaátɛ́ asana túɔ lɛca bɔmbányɛ anyía túásɔ lɔ́bɔ basɔ́ bímuócí a bálɛ́ka cɛ Atɛ́na.
52003002	Híáná tu ŋa sɔ́ tɔ́má Timoté anyía wá banɔ́ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ, u banɔ́ kíndísíki ɛtɛ́má o olumitinine noómi. Wáŋa uusú onyíinyí u buólí, wuúci munyiɔnɔ mɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; u ŋe húlinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma a yɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca Yésus Kilís.
52003003	Aáná ta ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ aá banɔ́ tɛ káá nákamɛna muuyé. Nu ŋe nú ményi banɔ́ bɛ́muátá bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe lúmitine anyía muuyé o oofine e úúsú olíhe, basɔ́ belumitinine Yésus.
52003004	Yááŋa anyía, ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ bá aanɔ́ a maabána, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ óókísíki anyía tu ká sɔ́ lɛ́caka muuyé; híáná bú ŋa bɛ́kɛ́láka, banɔ́ bɛ́muátá nu ŋe nú ményi.
52003005	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ ɛ ŋaá mɛ tɔ́má Timoté anyía wé menyí anyána úúnú olumitinine áŋa, anyía ɛ tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ bá wu ɔ háná céényi ɔtáta omenyi bɛsana eébí. Ɛ ŋaá mɛ bá yémi líkíméke anyía Sátan áŋa wu ɔ banɔ́ kɔ́kɔnaka, búásɔ́ buólí búɔ́ bɛ́cáŋa bú nubókó.
52003006	Mbá aámbáya, ta híáná ayɛ́ Timoté maá ka hálɔ́mɔ́na aaha, weé húlúkúne náánɔ́, ú maá basɔ́ bíkétíkínyi bɛsana a bɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ íínjie obíléne ɛ ɛtɛ́má a asana ne úúnú olumitinine ne nulénéne enú nu ŋe nú lénéne. Ú maá basɔ́ láákɛna ɔsɛ nu ŋa nɔ́ basɔ́ bɛ́táá ne nulénéne ɛ ɛtɛ́má bikúlú bikime; ɔsɛ nu ŋa nɔ́ aamba ɔkɔɔ́ basɔ́ téŋíti, bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ háyɛ basɔ́ tɔ́na tu ŋa sɔ́ aamba ɔkɔɔ́ banɔ́ téŋíti.
52003007	Yaátɛ́ asana, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá muasɔ́ muuyé ne úúsú ɔtɛ́má ɔnua a yaanɔ́ asana, benyíinyí, tu ŋa sɔ́ bɔ́ŋɔ makɛ́nda ɛ ɛtɛ́má. Yááŋa taaká anyía úúnú olumitinine ú ŋaá basɔ́ kíndisi ɛtɛ́má.
52003008	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ nú ma háná anɔ́ basɔ́ hélúmúnyi ɛtɛ́má aámbáya, anyía nú me nú bíínjie na makɛ́nda ɔ ɔlátɛ́na Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
52003009	Nyɛnamá nyí bitéŋíti bɛ́ yaátɛ́ aná tua sɔ́ŋa tú owiínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a yáánɔ́ asana o obíléne okime awɔ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ basɔ́ iínjie eéyé e buúse e?
52003010	Ne nebutúé na nabuɔ́sɛ́ tu ŋe sú wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na, tu tɛ tɔmbɔ, anyía wé lumítíne anyía tú ka sɔ́ banɔ́ téŋíti basɔ́ bɛ́muátá, túɔ́ banɔ́ eékúnyíki bɛsana ebí nu ti ŋé nú menyi a asana ne úúnú olumitinine.
52003011	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ wuúci bɛ́muátá, tu bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus anyía bá basɔ́ tóŋínyi ohónyí wú ɔfaaya náánɔ́.
52003012	Otéŋí a Waáŋá á banɔ́ sólínyínyi nulénéne enú nu ŋe nú lénéne banɔ́ na banɔ́, nu lénéke tɔ́na baacɔ bekime háyɛ núásɔ́ nulénéne anɔ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ léne.
52003013	Aáná u kéé kíndísíki cíínú ɛtɛ́má anyía nuanɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na befúúménénú tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma eé buúse bú Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ekúlú eyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na ɔlɔŋɔ na bááyɛ́ baacɔ bekime.
52004001	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba okuenyinyi ɔ banɔ́ láana, banɔ́ báámɛ benyíinyí, anyía tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ eékúnyíkí anyána nuánɔ́ nyɛ́mana nu olíhéke a nyɛnamá anyɛ́ nua nɔ́ŋa nú obílénékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ɛ́ɛ, yááŋa taaká anyía nua nuáŋa o olíhe aáná. Mbá aámbáya tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ báta, tu tɛ tɔmbɔ, eé nyiínyi nyí Yésus anyía anɔ́ cɔbá ne buúse o olíhe híáná ɔ ɔhɔla.
52004002	Nú ŋe nú ményi bɛsana abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ éékúnyíkí a asana na makɛ́nda me Yésus.
52004003	Nyiléne nyí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa anyía nuanɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na befúúménénú eéyé eé buúse, ɛ́cɛ anyía núánɔ́ nyɛ́ánáka ɛnjɔkɔ́nɔ́nɔ.
52004004	Ɔɔcɔ okime aá banɔ́ é menyí otimbie bɔmbányɛ nyíáyɛ́ nyɛtɔ́nɔ́ ne e bufúúménénú ne e nuúmi noómi.
52004005	Nɔtɛ bɛ́nyɛ́ána anyía ibíkéti a cɛɛbɛ́ á banɔ́ kéndísíki. Be-ti-menyí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bá naŋa bábɔ́ kɛlaka aáná.
52004006	Ta ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ aá banɔ́ tɛ aambɛ́na sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ asana buúse bukime a asana eéyé, anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kéé yébíki bɔɔbɛ́ baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛla aáná; tu na ma sɔ́ banɔ́ oókísíki asana eéyé bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ.
52004007	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́; tɛ́ cáŋa a asana yɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́, mbá a asana yɛ́ ɔbá befúúménénú eéyé eé buúse.
52004008	Yaátɛ́ asana yááŋa anyía ɔɔcɔ é kiné ɔlátɛ́na esúŋe eécé, tɛ́ cáŋa hú ɔɔcɔ u ŋa bábɛ́na, mbá u ŋa bábɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Mu-banɔ́-iínjíé Efúúménénú yí Elilé.
52004009	A asana ayɛ́ nu ŋe nú léne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ belumitinine, bú tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔ́ɔ́lɔ tɔ́na anyía yá háná ámɛ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɛ́na, ananyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na maá banɔ́ eékúnyíki anyía nuénú lénékénéne.
52004010	Aá taaká nua nuáŋa o oléne benyíinyí bé olumitinine bekime bá Masɛtuán ikime. Mbá ta híáná, ánɔ cɔbá ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla aáná ɔ ɔhɔla.
52004011	Ánɔ aambáka ohónyí okime wú olíhéke e mbuumu noómi, nɔ látákɛ́na hú bíánɔ́ bɛsana bɛ́ bɛ́muátá; nu nyiɔkɔ buólí na cáánɔ́ aabá cá bɛ́muátá, háyɛ tu na ma sɔ́ cáŋa ɔ banɔ́ láakɛna.
52004012	Aáná be-ti-lumítíníne Yésus ké búle a banɔ́ kéké. Nɔtɛ lɛ́báka ta bɔkɔ ná ɔɔcɔ.
52004013	Buamɛ eé, tu ŋa sɔ́ aamba anyía núénú ményi bɔmbányɛ asana a yɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca eebe e bé ne me bú wéékúne, anyía ɛtɛ́má tɛ banɔ́ nuá háyɛ cɛ́ ŋaá nua baacɔ bé etémbí a bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ɔ yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime.
52004014	Tu ŋe sú lúmitinine anyía Yésus ŋeé wé, yɔ́ háanyua e biwéewé. Yaátɛ́ asana énu menyí tɔ́na anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kéé héényutune baacɔ e biwéewé anyía bábɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na ne Yésus, beébe eébé bé ŋe bú lúmitekinine ɛ́cɛ bé ti ŋe bú wéékúne.
52004015	Asana ayɛ́ túɔ́ cɔba ɔ ɔ banɔ́ laana aámbáya áŋa anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋe yéékúnyíkí baacɔ anyía buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ u ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na, basɔ́ abá tu ká sɔ́ bá tua suanaŋa bɔɔ́sɔ, tú tɛ ká sɔ́ cáŋacáŋa ɔhatɔna na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ e bé ŋe bú wéékúné.
52004016	Buɔ́sɛ́ eébú okelú káá bɛ́átábɔ́tɔ́na, mutéŋínyi bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ yɔ́ táŋɛ́ta okelú ɔ ɔmuaná, ɛsɛ́bɛ́ cɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ cɛ́ɔ táŋɛ́ta; aáná Otéŋí a Waáŋá kéé húle ɔ Ɔmuaná, baacɔ bekime e bé ŋe bú wéékúné, beébe e nyimónjóló ne Kilís, ká bɔ́ cáŋacáŋa ɔhaanyuaka e biwéewé.
52004017	E elime eécí, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá basɔ́ bándáka basɔ́ ɔ bɔɔ́sɔ bekime ɔlɔŋɔ na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ eébé a bɛlɔndɔ́ noómi; aáná tu ká ká sɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ndɛ́mákánána ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá ɔ ɔmuaná, túɔ́ bá ɔlɔŋɔ ne Otéŋí haála ahá wáŋa ekúlú ekime.
52004018	Yaátɛ́ asana énu kíndísíkínyínyi banɔ́ na banɔ́ a bɛsana eébí.
52005001	Banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine, bú tɛ ŋa háná ɔ yɔɔ́lɔ anyía túásɔ banɔ́ ɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɛ́na nufule a asana ne bikúlú na mɔɔ́sɛ́ amá bɛsana eébí káá bɛ́kɛ́láka,
52005002	anyía banɔ́ bɛ́muátá nu ŋe nú ményi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ anyía buɔ́sɛ́ ebú Otéŋí a Waáŋá ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na, u ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na hú huasɛ háyɛ weébi naŋa waá fáaya nebutúé, ɔɔcɔ tɛ bɛ́táta.
52005003	Ekúlú a yɛ́mɔtɛ́ ayɛ́ baacɔ ká bɔ́ bá bábɔ́ kɔ́ɔnaka anyía bɔmbányɛ áŋa hɔ́á, bɔkɔ bú olíkíméke tɛ á bá, hí e ekúlú eéyé bé ké bú túme ɔlɛca muuyé, bá tɛ bɛ́táta; bú káá bá háyɛ inúmí cí obíéne naŋa cɛ́á hátɛna oónjú, u tɛ bɛ́táta; bá tɛ ká bɔ́ bɔ́ŋɔ ohónyí wú ɔcabakɛna.
52005004	Mbá banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine, buɔ́sɛ́ eébú tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ nyɛ́mana bú ɔ banɔ́ béletenyi háyɛ weébi naŋa weé béletenyi ɔɔcɔ, anyía nu tɛ anɔ́ bá i ibíne noómi.
52005005	Yááŋa anyía nua nɔ́ŋa banɔ́ bekime baáná bé eese yɛ́ nabuɔ́sɛ́; tu tɛ asɔ́ bá baáná bé ibíne ci nebutúé.
52005006	Yaátɛ́ asana tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ nyɛ́mana tú ɔhɛ́táka háyɛ bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́; mbá túé limíne bahaanyúánɔ́, basɔ́ tɛ́ka ne olóŋólóŋó a bɔkɔ bukime.
52005007	Nebutúé baacɔ naŋa bábɔ́ hɛ́táka, nebutúé tɔ́na ɛ naŋa bébú híólóko meluku.
52005008	Mbá basɔ́, tua sɔ́ŋa baáná bé eese yɛ́ nabuɔ́sɛ́, tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ nyɛ́mana tú ɔbá ne olóŋólóŋó. Yaátɛ́ asana tuásɔ́ nyɛ́mana tú ɔbɛ́háya ne olumitinine ne nulénéne ɛ ɛtɛ́má háyɛ bɔlaka bú eléŋú, túɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na na mɔŋɔlɛ́ a buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá basɔ́ nóhiki, mɔŋɔlɛ́ eémé mɔ́ bá háyɛ atamba yí eléŋú ayɛ́ bá ŋa bɛ́háya a aatɔ́.
52005009	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔ basɔ́ táfáka anyía wá basɔ́ lóbísíkínyi, mbá u ŋaá basɔ́ táfáka anyía wá basɔ́ nóhiki e elime ci uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
52005010	Wuúci u ŋeé we a yáásɔ́ asana anyía túésú líhéke ne wuúci; ta basɔ́ bɔɔ́sɔ ta basɔ́ bewéékúnénú, ekúlú ayɛ́ u ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na.
52005011	Yaátɛ́ asana, énu hélúmúkúnyínyi ɛtɛ́má, nu kíndísíkínyínyi banɔ́ na banɔ́ háyɛ nua núáŋa ɔ ɔkɛla aámbáya.
52005012	Benyíinyí, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ láana anyía énu kékéke bɔmbányɛ bɔnyiɔnɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ buólí bá cianɔ́ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́, beébe eébé Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé télímíkínyi eénú eé buúse anyía bábɔ́ banɔ́ eékúnyíki ɔlátɛ́na uúyé ohónyí.
52005013	Nu beébe kékéke buéŋí, nu beébe lénéke buéŋí tɔ́na a asana ne buólí abɔ́ bá ŋa bɔ́ nyiɔ. Banɔ́ bɛ́muátá, énu líhéke e mbuumu noómi ne belumitinine bekime.
52005014	Benyíinyí, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ láana anyía énu lébéke betisetise, énu kíndísíki ɛtɛ́má cí belíkílíki, nu ɔ́ɔ́lɔ́kɔ banɔ́nɔ́nɔ́nɔ, énu eéhíkínyínyi buéŋí baacɔ bekime.
52005015	Énu bíkékényíki anyía ta ɔɔcɔ aá banɔ́ ti hélúmúnyínyi sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́, mbá ánɔ aambáka ohónyí wú ɔkɛlakana bɔmbányɛ ekúlú ekime banɔ́ na banɔ́, na baacɔ bekime áyá.
52005016	Énu bílénéke ekúlú ekime,
52005017	nu bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ nɔtɛ tɔmbɔ,
52005018	énu iínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti ekúlú ekime. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé léne anyía núánɔ́ kɛ́láka aáná, banɔ́ baacɔ abá nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís.
52005019	Nɔtɛ bɛ́kɛ́ŋɛ́lɛ́ánɛ́na buólí bú Efúúménénú yí Elilé.
52005020	Nɔtɛ bábákɛ́na bɛsana bí behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
52005021	Énu bílúmíkínyi yáaŋa bɔmbányɛ bɛsana bikime abɛ́ nɔ́ ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma; mbá nɔ látákɛ́na a bɛ́áŋa bɛmbányɛ.
52005022	Énu bíkékényíki; nɔtɛ kɛláka anamánamá cá bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́.
52005023	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɛ́muátá ewú u ŋe yíínjie baacɔ mbuumu á banɔ́ fúúmíkínyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ, wé tétényíki tɔ́na na yáánɔ́ elilé, na túánɔ́ tɔtányɛ́, na cianɔ́ cɛɛ́tɔ, bɛnyɛ́ma eébí bikime bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ, anyía nuanɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma a nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
52005024	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́, wuúci u káá kɛ́laka aáná anyía u ŋo nyíóyísinyi nyíáyɛ́ nyɛkɔɔna.
52005025	Benyíinyí, ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na tɔ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a yáásɔ́ asana.
52005026	Énu téŋíki bɔmbányɛ benyíinyí bé olumitinine Yésus.
52005027	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ óókísi eé nyiínyi nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá anyía ánɔ fanáka nufule eénú ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ ci benyíinyí bekime.
52005028	Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís á banɔ́ sáyábákɛ́na banɔ́ bekimeʼo !
53001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɛ ŋá mɛ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ nufule eenu. Tua sɔ́ŋa ne Sílas ne Timoté. Tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, banɔ́ hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine Yésus a hɛ́áŋa a bálɛ́ka cɛ Tɛsaloníke. Nua nɔ́ŋa baacɔ bá na ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
53001002	Ne Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís bá banɔ́ sáyábɛ́na, bá banɔ́ háya mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi.
53001003	Banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí, tu ŋá sɔ́ nyɛ́mana tú owiínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti a yáánɔ́ asana ekúlú ekime, tu tɛ tɔmbɔ. Búáŋa bɔmbányɛ anyía túásɔ́ kɛ́láka aáná, ananyía úúnú olumitinine ŋa kɔ́ma buéŋí. Híáná tɔ́na, nulénéne enú nu ŋe nú lénene banɔ́ na banɔ́ ŋe bísólínyi mɔɔ́sɛ́ mukime.
53001004	Yaátɛ́ asana ekúlú ayɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa eé buúse bú tuɔ́bɔ tú belumitinine Yésus tú etémbí, tu ŋe sú beébe bíkétínyi yáánɔ́ asana na bɔɔcɔ bukime, anyía nu me nú tímbie olumitinine na makɛ́nda mekime ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía baacɔ ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ tékése ne muuyé.
53001005	Bú ŋo tóŋínyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kéé kélísíki baacɔ. Nyíáyɛ́ nyikélísi nyɛ́ bɛsana káá bá nyɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́. Ayɛ́ nú ŋe nú ééhínyínyi muuyé aáná, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá kɛ́la anyía nuánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na banyɛmánánɔ́ o owoofokine a búáyɛ́ Butéŋí. A asana ne Butéŋí eébú nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé.
53001006	Ɛ́ɛ, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa ɔtálɛ́mánánɔ́; u kéé hélúmúkúnyínyi muuyé a baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ iínjíékíne muuyé.
53001007	Aá banɔ́ abá nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé aámbáya, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ muúmu aáŋíáka, na aá basɔ́ tɔ́na, ekúlú eyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus káá lɛ́cana, weé húlúkúne ɔ Ɔmuaná ɔlɔŋɔ na bíáyɛ́ bɛkɛndákɛ́nda bí bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma.
53001008	U káá fáaya a nɔbɛ́mbɛ nú oocó noómi, yó bífúnéke ne be-ti-menyí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne eebe e bé tí ŋe bú lumitinine Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí úúsú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus.
53001009	Ciabɔ́ bɔ́nɔ́sɛa káá bá bunyímé bú ekúlú ekime; bó límekine haaca ne buúse bú Otéŋí a Waáŋá, bá tɛ lɛcá makɛ́nda ma núáyɛ́ nuúmi.
53001010	Bɛsana eébí káá bɛ́kɛ́láka a buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ u ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na. Ekúlú ayɛ́ u ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na aá yaandándá yɛ́ buɔ́sɛ́ etéebú anyía bááyɛ́ baacɔ bekime, baháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá, é wuúci nyemíki, bé oómísíki búáyɛ́ buáŋá, banɔ́ tɔ́na nuɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na ɔlɔŋɔ ne beébe, anyía nu ŋe nú lúmítékíníne bɛsana abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ húlíkínyi.
53001011	Yaátɛ́ asana tú ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ekúlú ekime, tu tɛ tɔmbɔ, a yáánɔ́ asana. Tu ŋe sú wuúci báta anyía wáa kɛlá anyía núénú líhéke a nyɛnamá nyí olíhe anyɛ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́; tu ŋe sú wuúci báta tɔ́na anyía wá banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́lɛ́ta na mááyɛ́ makɛ́nda o onyíóyísínyi na ɔ ɔkɛla bɔmbányɛ ebú nu ŋe nú léne ɔkɛla na ɔ ɔnyiɔkɔ buólí bukime abɔ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ nyiɔ, anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá.
53001012	Aáná nu ké nú óómísíki buáŋá bú nyiínyi nyí úúsú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus, yɔ́ kɛ́la anyía bé óómísíki tɔ́na cáánɔ́ eénye a yááyɛ́ asana. Bú káá bɛ́kɛ́láka aáná, anyía na ciasɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ sáyabɛna.
53002001	Banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na a asana na nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí úúsú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís, na nyíásɔ́ nyɛbɛ́bándána anyɛ́ tu ká sɔ́ bɛ́bándákána nááyá, anyía
53002002	nuti tényí nyímísi cianɔ́ injiŋé; ta anyía nuti líkíméke a nyɛkɔɔna anyɛ́ baacɔ ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔ́na anyía buɔ́sɛ́ ebú Otéŋí a Waáŋá ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na na ma kaá háma; te behémúnyi bɛsana a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔ́náka aáná, ta anyía yáakɛlá nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ébú húlikinyi baacɔ aáná, ta anyía tɔ́na baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔ́na anyía yaŋɔ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ aáná, nuti lumítíne.
53002003	Nuti lumítíne buúse bukime anyía ɔɔcɔ á banɔ́ néŋé, anyía buɔ́sɛ́ ebú Otéŋí a Waáŋá káá faáya, baacɔ beéŋí káá bɔ́ bá ɛ́cɛ bá ma bɔ́ kɛ́lakɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ aatɔ́ ɔnata; ekúlú eéyé ɛ́cɛ ɔŋána me bítóŋínyi a baacɔ, wuúci bé kéé nyímísi buúse bukime.
53002004	U kéé núusiki bɛnyɛ́ma bikime abɛ́ baacɔ ŋe bú nyemi; ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɛ́muátá, mbá ta bɔkɔ bú etémbí; u káá kɔɔna anyía u ŋeé biíbi hɔ́la bikime, yó kó wóofine te eé Ciíbe cɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, yó kó limine hɔ́á, u kɔɔnaka anyía wáŋa Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
53002005	Yáakɛlá nu tɛ ŋá háná ánɔ bɛ́táá anyía ekúlú ayɛ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ bá náánɔ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ láákɛ́na bɛsana eébí.
53002006	Ta híáná, bɔkɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ áŋa hɔ́á e bú mo koti bɛsana eébí ɔbɛ́kɛ́la aámbáya; nu ŋe nú ményi buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, ɔŋána kéé bítóŋínyi a baacɔ hú ekúlú ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá táná.
53002007	Yááŋa taaká anyía baacɔ beéŋí a bɔ́áŋa ɔ ɔkɛlɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ aatɔ́ ɔnata; tu ŋe sú menyi aáná hú anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋaá basɔ́ tóŋínyi. Mbá bɛsana eébí tɛ káá bɛ́kɛ́láka ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma ekúlú ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ká yáaŋia ɔɔcɔ ewú ú mo koti ɔŋána ɔ ɔfaaya.
53002008	E elime eécí ɔŋána kéé bítóŋínyi a baacɔ. Ekúlú eyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na a núáyɛ́ nuúmi noómi, u kéé wuúci ɔɔ́nɔ́ ne mehúne a má ŋaá háma a nyíáyɛ́ nyuúté.
53002009	Ɔŋána oócí, awɔ́ u káá cɔba o obítóŋínyi a baacɔ, káá fáaya na makɛ́nda amá Sátan kéé wuúci iínjie; u káá kɛ́laka anamánamá cé ne bikéki ne bikémése bɛ́ bɛsana anyía wé néŋéke baacɔ ne biíbi.
53002010	U káá kɛ́laka anamánamá ekime cá bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana anyía wé néŋéke baacɔ e bé ké bú nyímúkúne. Bé ké bú nyímúkúne anyía bó ti ómo bú lúmitinine taaká, bé ti ciíci léne; mbɔ́kɔ bébú ciíci lumítíníne, keyé Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé beébe nohíki.
53002011	Yaátɛ́ asana Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá kɛ́la anyía bábɔ́ bɛ́tááka bɛsana a bɛ́kɔ́tɛ́mákánánɔ́, bó lúmitekinine bɛfala.
53002012	U kéé kélísíki baacɔ bekime e bé ŋe bú kíne olumitinine taaká, bé lénéke ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́, yó beébe iínjíékíne muuyé.
53002013	Mbá a yáánɔ́ asana, banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine ebé Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé léne, tu ŋá sɔ́ nyɛ́mana tú owiínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti bikúlú bikime, anyía u ŋaá banɔ́ táfáká o otúme e nyitúme. U ŋaá banɔ́ nóhí a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé. Yiíyi yɛ́ ŋa kɛ́la anyía nuánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na bifúúménénú bɛ́ baacɔ, u banɔ́ nóhiki anyía nu ŋe nú lúmítíníne taaká.
53002014	Aá yaátɛ́ asana Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́ nááyá na Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ húlíkínyi, na anyía núénú bílénéke tɔ́na e elime ci nuúmi nú úúsú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
53002015	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine, énu bíínjíé na makɛ́nda o olumitinine noómi, nu tétényíki bɛsana abɛ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ éékúnyíkí, te ne nyuúté, ta na núásɔ́ nufule a númɔtɛ́ anɔ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɛ́ná.
53002016	Ɛ ŋaá mɛ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís bɛ́muátá na ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ awɔ́ ú ŋa basɔ́ léne anyía bá cɔbá ne buúse ɔ ɔ basɔ́ kíndísi ɛtɛ́má, bá basɔ́ hákɛ́na taaká cɛ mɔŋɔlɛ́ ɛ ɛtɛ́má a yáábɔ́ yaála yí nuubo noómi,
53002017	bá banɔ́ kíndísíki ɛtɛ́má, bá banɔ́ iínjíékíne tɔ́na makɛ́nda na ma ɔkɛlaka na ma ɔtáŋáka ekúlú ekime bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana.
53003001	Banɔ́, báásɔ́ benyíinyí, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba okuenyinyi ɔ banɔ́ laána anyía: Ánɔ basɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́nɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, anyía Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yí Otéŋí a Waáŋá á cɔcɔ́báka ne buúse fiaŋɔ fiaŋɔ, yí óómóko a nyɛnamá anyɛ́ yɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́kɛ́láka aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́.
53003002	Ánɔ basɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́nɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɔ́na anyía wá basɔ́ tétényíki, anyía na baŋána na bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ baacɔ tɛ basɔ́ kɛla bɔkɔ a bɔɔbɛ́; yááŋa anyía baacɔ bekime ti ŋé bú lúmitinine bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ebí tu ŋe sú beébe hulinyi.
53003003	Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋo nyióyísínyi cááyɛ́ esúŋe bikúlú bikime. Wuúci u káá banɔ́ kíndísíki, yɔ́ banɔ́ tétényíki anyía Sátan tɛ banɔ́ kɛlá bɔkɔ a bɔɔbɛ́.
53003004	Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋa kɛ́la anyía túásɔ́ bá na mɔŋɔlɛ́ a yáánɔ́ asana; tu ŋe sú ményi anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ látɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ láákɛ́na, tu menyukune tɔ́na anyía nu ké nú biíbi látákɛ́na.
53003005	Otéŋí a Waáŋá é kendíki cíínú ɛtɛ́má ɔ ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma bɔmbányɛ na anyána Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ léne na anyána nua nɔ́ŋa nú oweéhíkínyínyi muuyé háyɛ Kilís.
53003006	Banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ láana a makɛ́nda me Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís anyía énu bíkékényíki ne benyíinyí bekime a bá tɛ́ ŋá bɔ́ áamba ɔnyiɔ buólí, bé me bú kíneke ɔlátɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ éékúnyíkí.
53003007	Yááŋa anyía banɔ́ bɛ́muátá nu ŋe nú ményi anyána nua nɔ́ŋa nú ɔ basɔ́ hɔ́áka a nyɛkɛla. Ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ bá aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́, tu ti ómo sú kíne ɔnyiɔ buólí.
53003008	Tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ bata ɔɔcɔ a wɔmɔtɛ́ anyía wá basɔ́ túkéke e etémbí, mbá tu ŋa sɔ́ bá túásɔ́ nyiɔkɔ buólí na makɛ́nda ne nebutúé na nabuɔ́sɛ́; túó lumitine oweéhínyínyi ne muuyé na ɔtɔmbɔ anyía tu tɛ asɔ́ banɔ́ oóndó a amɛna a asana na bíásɔ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá.
53003009	Aá taaká tu ŋa sɔ́ bá na makɛ́nda ma ɔ banɔ́ bátaka bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá, mbá tú tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ banɔ́ biíbi báta; tu ŋe sú lénéké ɔnyiɔ buólí anyía túásɔ́ banɔ́ tóŋínyi hibílícínyínyí hɛ́ ɔlátáka.
53003010	Yááŋa anyía te ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ bá aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ óókísíkí anyía ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ti ŋée léne ɔnyiɔ buólí tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ nyɛmána wu ɔnyíáka tɔ́na.
53003011	Yááŋa anyía tu ŋa sɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma bá kɔ́ɔnaka anyía baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ á bɔ́ŋa ne butise; bá tɛ ŋá bɔ́ nyiɔ buólí, mbá bé ŋge bú oofine a bɛsana bɛ́ bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ e bí ti ŋée beébe lɛca.
53003012	A baacɔ eébé, tu ŋe sú beébe óókísi, tú beébe laakɛna a makɛ́nda me Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís anyía bé búle nyiɔ buólí bikúlú bikime e mbuumu noómi o o búle bɔ́ŋɔ bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá.
53003013	Aá banɔ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí, nɔtɛ tɔmbɔ ɔkɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana.
53003014	Mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ tɛ ŋáa látɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ tu ŋá sɔ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ aaha e nufule eenu, énu wuúci bísíémúkúnyi bɔmbányɛ; mbá nu áálɔ́nána ne wuúci a nyɛkɛla nyɛ́ bɛsana, anyía aatɔ́ ɔlama é wuúci tímbíé.
53003015	Ta híáná, nuti wuúci hiíte háyɛ uunú oliŋine, mbá énu wuúci hɔŋɔ́náka ekúlú ekime anyía wáŋa uunú onyíinyí.
53003016	Otéŋí a Waáŋá a wáŋa hicéme hí mbuumu á banɔ́ iínjíékíne, wuúci bɛ́muátá, mbuumu ne e bikúlú bikime na a nyɛnamá nyikime. Otéŋí a Waáŋá é límíne náánɔ́ banɔ́ bekime.
53003017	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ téŋi. Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ bitéŋíti eebi ne úúmí ɔɔbɔ́ ú bɛ́muátá. Aáná ɛ́ náŋa yámɛ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ nyiámɛ nyiínyi a túámɛ tufule tukime; nyiámɛ nyiɔ́ŋɔ eényí nyɛ́áŋa.
53003018	Uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís á banɔ́ sáyábákɛ́na banɔ́ bekimeʼo !
54001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma u Yésus Kilís e nyitélímínyi na nyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, muasɔ́ Munohi, ne nyí Yésus Kilís, maasɔ́ Mɔŋɔlɛ́.
54001002	Yaŋɔ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ wɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, kuɔŋɔ́ Timoté; ɔ ɔ́ŋa ciamɛ taaká cɛ ɔɔ́nɔ́ anyía o ŋoó lumitinine. Na ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís bá ɔ sayábákɛ́na, bá ɔ bɛ́cáma mahana, bé o wiínjie mbuumu ɔ ɔtɛ́má noómi.
54001003	Ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bá yámɛ cɔbaka a Masɛtuán, ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ laána anyía ɔ́ɔ lɔ́bɔ ɛ Ɛfɛ́ɛsɛ anyía ɔ́ɔ sáŋɔ́nákɛ́na baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ bá hɔ́á oweékúnyi nyiékúnyi nyɛ́ bɛfala.
54001004	Beébe sáŋɔ́nákɛ́na tɔ́na obíínjie ne obíkéti tuhélúméke tɔ́ buáyá na ɔfana eénye cá baacɔ cá tɔnyɛ́nɔ́ a cá tɛ ŋá mana. Bɛsana eébí bikime ŋe céhísi hú isuŋí, bɛ́ tɛ ɔɔ́lɔ ɔkɛla nyɛtákɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana nyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Tu ŋe sú menyi nyɛtákɛ́na eényí anyía tu ŋe sú lumitinine.
54001005	Aatɔ́ yɛ́ asana eyí o ŋoó beébe laana aáná áŋa anyía bá ŋa bɔ́ nyɛmána bé olénéke bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́. Nulénéne eénú hulukune e efúúménénú yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má noómi, ne e hííwu hɛcɔɔ́cɔ́ a hɛ́áŋa ɔ ɔtɛ́má a hɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔ́ɔ kákálɛ́na, na aá taaká ci olumitinine.
54001006	A aháŋá na bɛsana eébí, bɔ́mɔtɛ́ baacɔ ŋa bɔ́ nánáka ohónyí, bɔ́ cɔba hú o ohulinyi baacɔ bɛsana bí isuŋí a bɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ.
54001007	Bé ŋe bú bíhiíte háyɛ eebe e bé ŋe bú menyi oweékúnyi bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ mbá, bé ti biíbi lɔ́kɔ́ma bɔmbányɛ beébe bɛ́muátá: Ta bɔkɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɔɔna, mbá te mehúnyi emé bé ŋe bú hémunyi oweékúnyi na mɔŋɔlɛ́ mekime.
54001008	Tu ŋe sú menyi anyía bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa bɛmbányɛ mbɔ́kɔ bé ŋe biíbi látɛ́na háyɛ yɛ́ á nyɛmána.
54001009	Túé menyi anyía bá náŋa bé ti é télímínyi bikotí eé buúse bɔ́ bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ mbá, bé ŋe biíbi télímínyi ne eé buúse bɔ́ bacaŋɛna bɛsana, ne eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛlɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ aatɔ́ ɔnata, ne eé buúse bɔ́ na baŋána na bakɛla maabɛ́, ne eé buúse bú eebe e bé ŋe bú féníne na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne olumitinine, ne eé buúse bɔ́ bɔɔ́nɔ na bíábɔ́ bibíényi na baacɔ bé etémbí áyá.
54001010	Ɛ náŋa bé télímíkínyi tɔ́na bikotí ne eé buúse bɔ́ balátɛ́na beénjú, ne eé buúse bɔ́ banɔ́mɔcɔ́ a bá ŋa bɔ́ fianana bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ banɔ́mɔcɔ́. Bikotí áŋa tɔ́na ne eé buúse bɔ́ bakɛla onduné ú baacɔ, ne eé buúse bú benéŋe baacɔ, ne eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ talɛmɛna ɛ ɛmbasɔ́ cɛ́ bɛfala, ne eé buúse tɔ́na bɔ́ baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛla bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana bí etémbí e bí ŋe núusi ambányɛ yí nyiékúnyi.
54001011	Ambányɛ yí nyiékúnyi eéyé áŋa a Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma noómi; yɛ́ ŋa lɛca Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Muómóomo. U ŋe líhe a ambányɛ yɛ́ haála. Wuúci ú ŋe mi cuméke Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma eeye.
54001012	I ŋé mi iínjie Yésus Kilís, uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá, bitéŋíti, anyía ú ŋa lɛ́ca anyía ya mɛ́ŋa ɔɔcɔ u ɔháya mɔŋɔlɛ́, yó mi hiíte háyɛ múáyɛ́ munyiɔnɔ. Wuúci u ŋeé mi kíndísi tɔ́na ɔ ɔnyiɔ buólí eébú.
54001013	Buáyá, ɛ ŋaá mɛ bá yémi wuúci fénékíne, i tekeseke bááyɛ́ baacɔ, i wuúci ɔɔ́mbɔ́náka tɔ́na. Ta híáná, Yésus ŋaá mɛ bɛ́cáma mahana, anyía ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bá i ti émi menyi bɔkɔ abɔ́ ɛ ŋaá mɛ bá yámɛ kɛlaka, ɛ tɛ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá.
54001014	Uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋaá mɛ sayábákɛ́na buéŋí, yó mi iínjie makɛ́nda na ma ɔhákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá ne me olénéke bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́.
54001015	Buhúnyi eebu áŋa taaká ci buhúnyi; búáŋa bɔmbányɛ anyía baacɔ bekime é buúbu háya ɔ ɔtɛ́má noómi: Yááŋa anyía Yésus Kilís ŋaá faáya ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci anyía wó ko nóhíki bakɛla maabɛ́ bekime. Yaŋɔ́, ya mɛ́ŋa mɔkɛla maabɛ́ mú buúsebuúse.
54001016	Ta híáná, Yésus Kilís ŋaá mɛ bɛ́cáma mahana, yaŋɔ́ mɔkɛla maabɛ́ mú buúsebuúse, anyía wó tóŋínyi baacɔ anyána u ŋeé beébe eéhínyínyi buéŋí. U ŋo tóŋínyi hibílícínyínyí eéhí o okíndísi baacɔ a bá ká bɔ́ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá, bɔ́ bɔ́ŋgɔ́na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime.
54001017	Ne nuúmi ne nyinyemi á bámɔ́kɔ́na né Otéŋí a Waáŋá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía u ŋe téŋínyi ekúlú ekime, wáŋa Indiwé; ta ɔɔcɔ ti ŋé wuúci lɛca, wuúci wáŋa bímuócí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Híáná yááŋa.
54001018	Uumi ɔɔ́nɔ́ Timoté, i ŋe mí o lébe ne mehúnyi emé behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔnaka ɔ yɔ́ɔ́wɔ asana ananyía ɔ́ɔ kɛ́nda ne meéme ɔ ɔnua bɛmbányɛ bí biité.
54001019	Tétényíki uúwe olumitinine, mbá a kɛla anyía hííwu hɛcɔɔ́cɔ́ hɛ́ ɔtɛ́má tɛ ɔ kákálɛ́na; bɔ́mɔtɛ́ baacɔ ŋe bú kínéke ɔlátɛ́na ambányɛ yí ohónyí eéyé, bɔ́ nánáka e uúbu olumitinine.
54001020	Ne Iméné na Alɛkɛsándɛlɛ á bɔ́ŋa ɔ ɔlɔŋɔ ú nyɛnamá nyɛ́ baacɔ eényí; i ŋe mí beébe báka mío beébe cumeke ná Sátan anyía bábɔ́ aákɔ́nákɛ́na omenyi anyía bé ti ŋé féníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
54002001	Asana yí buúse a yɛ́ á hɔ́la ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba owoókísi baacɔ áŋa anyía bá bɛ́cɔ́bɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bá bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na, bé wuúci bataka bɛsana eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ bekime, bé wuúci iínjíékíne tɔ́na bitéŋíti eébú eé buúse.
54002002	Ánɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne eé buúse bú betéŋí, ne eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ bé etémbí bekime e bé ŋe bú téŋínyi, anyía ne mbuumu ne yeébu á bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na a bunɔŋɔ, nu kékéke Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a nyɛmbányɛ.
54002003	Ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ bekime áŋa ambányɛ yɛ́ asana e yí ŋe bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Mu-basɔ́-nohi.
54002004	U ŋeé léne anyía baacɔ bekime ɔ́ nɔhɔ́kɔ, bé menyukune taaká.
54002005	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa hú ɔmɔtɛ́; ohényíhényi áŋa hú ɔmɔtɛ́ tɔ́na ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na baacɔ, wuúci wáŋa ɔɔcɔ, Yésus Kilís.
54002006	U ŋa faáya yó koó wé anyía wá háŋɔ́náka baacɔ bekime a buɔ́lɛ́ bɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́. Asana eéyé ŋa bɛ́kɛ́láka ekúlú a yɛnyɛmánánɔ́, bú tóŋgínyi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa yáamba onohi baacɔ bekime.
54002007	Yaátɛ́ asana Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi télímínyi ne muhulinyi baacɔ Ɛsɔ́ma na ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma, anyía yémi hulíkínyi baacɔ bɛsana eébí. U ŋaá mɛ tɔ́ma o okowéékúnyi baacɔ a bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá Besuif, anyía bé lumítékíníne taaká cɛ́ bɛsana. Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ kɔɔna taaká, i ti ŋé mi néŋe.
54002008	Aáná ɛ ŋa mɛ́ áamba anyía keyé banɔ́mɔcɔ́ ábɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɛhaála bikime ne efúúménénú yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, tɛ́ka ne meliŋé ɔ ɔtɛ́má, ta na bɛhɔnɔnɔ.
54002009	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ áamba tɔ́na anyía beénjú á bɛ́láŋáka a nyɛnamá a nyɛ́ ŋa bɛ́ámba, bá lɔ́kɔ́máka aatɔ́ ɔlama, bá tɛ bɛ́nua anamá cé tuhúnyi anyía bébú bítóŋgínyi; bá tɛ bɛ́háya bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ nyɛnɔ́kɔ́ bí kóolo, ta bɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma e bí ŋe mueli bɔmbányɛ, ta hú bɛlaŋa bɛ́ mɔɔnyɛ́ meéŋí.
54002010	Mbá, beénjú a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɔɔna anyía bé ŋe bú kéke Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔkɛlaka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana.
54002011	Yɛ́ ŋa nyɛmána anyía beénjú é lesikinyi mbuumu ekúlú eyí bé ŋe beébe eékúnyi, bá lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na beékúnyi buéŋí.
54002012	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ sáŋɔ́nɛ́na beénjú anyía bé ti eékúnyíki banɔ́mɔcɔ́, bé ti beébe téŋínyi mbá, bé lesíkínyi mbuumu,
54002013	anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa cáŋacáŋa o keti Átam. E elime eécí u ŋe kéti Ɛfa,
54002014	tɔ́na anyía Sátan ti ómo néŋe Átam, mbá oónjú. Yááŋa anyía oónjú u ŋa kɛlakɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ɛndɔ́kɔ́.
54002015	Ta híáná, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kóó nohiki beénjú a asana ne obíéne baáná, mbɔ́kɔ bá ŋa bɔ́ cɔba ne buúse o olumitinine, bé lénéke baacɔ, beébe ne efúúménénú yí olíhe e nyibílóosi ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́.
54003001	Buhúnyi eebu áŋa taaká ci buhúnyi, búáŋa anyía ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa yáamba ɔbámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na mukendisi belumitinine, ɔɔcɔ oócí ma táfa ambányɛ yí buólí.
54003002	Mukendisi belumitinine ŋá nyɛmána wu olíhéke bɔmbányɛ, tɛ́ka na tɔkɔma na baacɔ; muúmu mɔbátɛ́nánɔ́ hú oónjú ɔmɔtɛ́, mu ti bíínjie ɔ ɔmúána meluku, muúmu ne injiŋé a aatɔ́, muúmu na bɔɔcɔ, muúmu na nɔkasa, mu menyukune oweékúnyi baacɔ bɛsana.
54003003	Mu tɛ ɔ́mɔ nyɛmána mu ɔbá ta amúána meluku, ta anua bitule, mbá mu ŋá nyɛmána mu ɔbá mbuumu cɛ ɔɔcɔ, u tɛ sáá ɛsáká; wuúci tɛ́ka na ɔtɛ́má ɔɔ́ mɔɔnyɛ́.
54003004	U ŋá nyɛmána wu okendiki bɔmbányɛ cíáyɛ́ ciíbe cɛ baacɔ, bááyɛ́ baáná wuúci lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na, bé wuúci kékéke bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ.
54003005	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ táŋa aáná anyía mbɔ́kɔ u ti ŋée menyi okendisi cíáyɛ́ ciíbe cɛ baacɔ cɛ bɛ́muátá, anyána wáŋa wu okendiki hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine hɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ e?
54003006	U tɛ ɔ́mɔ nyɛmána wu ɔbá yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí mulumitinine Yésus, anyía keyé bumálá kéé wuúci bááta a aatɔ́, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ yó wuúci túme hɛkɔma háyɛ ú ŋeé túme Musɔ́mɛ́na.
54003007	Yɛ́ ŋa nyɛmána tɔ́na anyía baacɔ a bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá belumitinine ébú wuúci kékéke; anyía keyé bé keé wuúci séésíki, Musɔ́mɛ́na múó wuúci ɔ́ɔ́tɔ́kɔ na túáyɛ́ tukolí.
54003008	Nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na nyɛ́ batiákɛ́lɛ ŋá nyɛmána nyɛ́ ɔbámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na tɔ́na nyɛmbányɛ, bá kɔ́ɔnaka taaká, bé ti bíínjie ɔ ɔmúána meluku, bá tɛ aamba ɔhɔ́ma mɔɔnyɛ́ i ihényí a cɛɛbɛ́.
54003009	Bá ŋa bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔlátákɛ́na na hɛcɔɔ́cɔ́ hɛ́ ɔtɛ́má e hifúúménénú bɛsana bí olumitinine abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa námbɔ́náka.
54003010	Ekúlú ayɛ́ bá ŋa yáamba o obééti batiákɛ́lɛ, bá ŋa nyɛmána bá ɔ cáŋa o beébe aákɔ́nákɛ́na bɔmbányɛ; bá a lɛca mbɔ́kɔ bá ŋa bɔ́ nyɛ́mána, bé beébe béétíki aná batiákɛ́lɛ.
54003011	Beénjú tɔ́na ŋa bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔbá na ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, bé ti ooto baacɔ, bé ti bíínjie ɔ ɔmúána meluku, bá kɛlaka taaká cɛ́ bɛsana ekúlú ekime.
54003012	Tiákɛ́lɛ ŋá nyɛmána wu ɔbátɛ́na oónjú hú ɔmɔtɛ́, u ŋá nyɛmána wu otétényíki bááyɛ́ baáná, u kendisiki cíáyɛ́ ciíbe cɛ baacɔ bɔmbányɛ.
54003013	Baacɔ ŋe bú kéké buéŋí batiákɛ́lɛ a bá ŋa bɔ́ nyiɔ ambányɛ yí buólí. Batiákɛ́lɛ eébé á bɔ́ŋa bé ohulikinyi baacɔ bɛsana bí Yésus Kilís, bé ti líkíme, anyía bá ŋa bɔ́ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá.
54003014	Ta ayɛ́ ɛ́ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ wɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, i ŋeé mi bíkéti ɔfaaya ɔ ɔkɔɔ́ kuɔŋɔ́ lɛca hikúlúkúlú.
54003015	Asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, mbɔ́kɔ i ti ŋé tényí kaá mɛ háma, bɛsana abɛ́ ɛ ma mɛ́ ɔ laákɛ́na kɔ́ yɔ́ɔ wɔɔ́lɔ omenyi anyána baacɔ bá hɛnyɛ́nɔ́ hɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ábɔ́ nyɛmána bé olíhéke; hɛnyɛ́nɔ́ eéhí áŋa hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine. Bá bɔ́ŋa baacɔ bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Ooci a wáŋa wɔɔ́sɔ, beébe nukúse e nú me kíndisi taaká cɛ asana.
54003016	Asana eéyé ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa námbɔ́nɛ́na baacɔ áŋa yaandándá yɛ́ asana, isuŋí tɛ á kɛla. Yááŋa asana yí Ooci awɔ́ ú ŋá bɛ́cáŋa ɔɔcɔ, Elilé yíó tóŋínyi anyía wáŋa ɔtálɛ́mánánɔ́, bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bíó wuúci lɛcaka, baacɔ bó húlíkínyi bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ abá bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá Besuif yááyɛ́ asana, biliminyi bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ okime bá ɔhákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ nyi wuúci bééti eényí ɔ Ɔmuaná aá haála hé nuúmi.
54004001	Elilé ŋa kɔɔna bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ yɛ́sɛ: Ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ me elime, baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ká bɔ́ bɛ́yuátáka olumitinine anyía bábɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na ne bililé bí munéŋéne ne nyiékúnyi e nyí ŋe húle ná bɛɛbɛ́ bí bililé.
54004002	Baacɔ bá tɔbɛ́mbɛ túfendí ké bú beébe nénísíki ohónyí ne munéŋéne; tɔcɔɔ́cɔ́ tɔ́ ɛtɛ́má tɔ́ baacɔ eébé áŋa túweékúnénú.
54004003	Aáná bé ŋe bú eékúnyi anyía nyɛtɔ́nɔ́ áŋa nyɛɛbɛ́, ta ɔnyíá bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá a bɛ́mɔtɛ́, yiíyi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé ketiki bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá eébí anyía belumitinine Kilís; beébe eébé bé ŋe bú menyi taaká, bé biíbi nyíáka, bé iínjiekine Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti.
54004004	Yááŋa anyía bɛnyɛ́ma bikime abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋé kétiki áŋa bɛmbányɛ, bɔkɔ bú owoomboko tɛ á bá hɔ́á; aáná ɔɔcɔ á nyɛmána wa ɔnyíáka bɔkɔ bukime, wu iínjiekine Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti.
54004005	Na Bɛsana abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá kɔ́ɔnaka na ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na ewú tu ŋe sú wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na ŋeé fúúmínyi bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá bikime.
54004006	Eékúnyíki bɔnɔ́ɔnyia bé olumitinine bɛsana eébí, aáná ɔ kɔ́ɔ́ bá ambányɛ yɛ́ munyiɔnɔ yí Yésus Kilís, á kɔmaka a Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ebí tu ŋe sú lumitinine, ɔlata na ambányɛ yí nyiékúnyi anyɛ́ ɔ ŋɔɔ́ látɛ́na.
54004007	Mbá e kine ɔbɛ́lɔ́kɔ́ma tuhélúméke tɔ́ buáyá e tú ti ŋé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Cɔbá ne buúse o obíínjie o olíhe háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe léne.
54004008	Obíínjie o onyíényi cɛɛ́tɔ anyía ciá kɛndaka ŋɔ yɔɔ́lɔ nyɛnamá; mbá nyibíínjie anyɛ́ ɔɔcɔ ŋe bíínjie o olíhe háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé léne ŋɔ yɔɔ́lɔ buéŋí ɔ ɔhɔla, anyía ɔɔcɔ oócí kéé líhéke bɔmbányɛ o olíhe ú aámbáya, yó líhéke tɔ́na bɔmbányɛ ɔɔ́ yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime.
54004009	Buhúnyi eébú áŋa taaká ci buhúnyi, bá ŋa nyɛmána bé o buúbu háya ɔ ɔtɛ́má noómi.
54004010	Yááŋa anyía tu ŋe sú bíyébi, tú bɛ́kákátáka ɔ ɔnyiɔ buólí anyía tú ma sɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a wáŋa wɔɔ́sɔ, wuúci Munohi baacɔ bekime, hɔlákáhɔ́láka mu eebe a bá ŋa bɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís.
54004011	Bɛsana eébí ɔ́ɔ nyɛmána wu owoónyísíkínyi ɔlaana baacɔ, é beébe eékúnyíki.
54004012	Ɔɔcɔ tɛ ɔ bábɛ́na anyía ɔ waánáŋa ɔɔ́nɔmbɔ́; asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na nuketi enú belumitinine Kilís ŋa bɔ́ látɛ́na ɔ ɔtáŋa awɔ́ ɔ ŋɔɔ́ táŋa, o olíhe ewú o ŋoó líhe, e nyiléne enyí o ŋoó léne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́, a mɔŋɔlɛ́ amá ɔ ŋɔɔ́ háya ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ne ofúúméne ewú o ŋoó fúúméne.
54004013	Ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma a buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ ɛ ká mɛ faaya, bíínjie na makɛ́nda ɔ ɔfana Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ haála ahá baacɔ á bɔ́ŋa, beébe lébéke, é beébe eékúnyíki.
54004014	Atɛ bábɛ́na yaála yí nuubo yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, yiíye yɛ́ ŋa lɛcana ne ekúlú eyí behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔnaka yɔ́ɔ́wɔ asana ne ekúlú eyí bekendisi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine ŋa bɔ́ ɔ táláka aabá a aatɔ́ ɔ ɔ kuɔŋɔ́ sáyabɛna.
54004015	Bíínjie ɔlátɛ́na bɛsana eébí ne úúwe ɔtɛ́má okime, aáná baacɔ bekime ká bɔ́ lɛca anyía ɔ ŋɔɔ́ kɔmá e buólí bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ noómi.
54004016	Limíne ne ciéhíhi, bíkékényíki o otúme oówo o olíhe ú bɛ́muátá ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma a bɛsana ebí o ŋoó weékúnyi baacɔ. A nyɛkɛlaka eényí o kóó nohiki baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma bɛsana abɛ́ ɔ ŋɔɔ́ kɔɔna; kuɔŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá wɔ́ nɔhɔ tɔ́na.
54005001	Uumi ɔɔ́nɔ́, mbɔ́kɔ elunyí yɛ́ ɔnɔ́mɔcɔ́ ŋa kɛ́la asana a yaabɛ́, eti wuúci kákálɛ́na na nyɛŋána nyikime, mbá wuúci hɔ́ŋɔ́náka háyɛ ɔɔtɛ́. Lébéke bɛnɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ háyɛ bɔnɔ́ɔnyia a banɔ́mɔcɔ́.
54005002	Hɔ́ŋɔ́náka bilunyí bí beénjú háyɛ bɔɔnyia, indíkíné ci beénjú háyɛ bɔnɔ́ɔnyia e beénjú tɔ́na; nyɛkɛla eényí nyikime á bámɔ́kɔ́na nyɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
54005003	Sókóbíki ne nyikéke bisíké bí beénjú a bɛ́áŋa taaká cí bisíké.
54005004	Mbá mbɔ́kɔ esíké a yɛ́mɔtɛ́ áŋa na baáná ta anyía banana a bá bɔ́ŋa bakɔmákánɔ́, bá ŋa bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔ cáŋa aákɔ́nɛ́na ɔlɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na bíábɔ́ bibíényi, bé biíbi sókóbíki anyía híáná bíábɔ́ bibíényi ŋe bú beébe tétényíki buáyá. Nyɛkɛla eényí ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
54005005	Esíké a yááŋa ɔlɔbɔ́nɔ́ taaká esíké, yiíyi tɛ́ka na ɔɔcɔ wu o wuúci sókóbíki, esíké eéyé áŋa ɔháyánɔ́ mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; u ŋeé wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na mɔɔ́sɛ́ mekime ne nebutúé na nabuɔ́sɛ́ anyía wé wuúci ɔɔ́lɛ́ta.
54005006	Asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, esíké eyí olíhe ú ɔmɛsɛ́ a yánáŋa o obíléníne áŋa ewéénú, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía yɛ́ ŋa húánáná yɔɔ́sɔ.
54005007	Bɛsana eébí ɔ́ɔ nyɛmána wu owoókísíki baacɔ eébé anyía ta ɔɔcɔ ti beébe kákálɛ́na.
54005008	Yááŋa anyía ɔɔcɔ ewú u ti ŋé sókóbi bááyɛ́ baacɔ hɔlákáhɔ́láka bá ciayɛ́ ciíbe ma bɛ́sáŋɔ́na olumitinine ú Yésus, wáŋa ɔɔbɛ́ ɔ ɔhɔla mu-ti-lumitinine bɛ́muátá.
54005009	Esíké ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ aamba ɔwɔɔ́ŋɔ ɔ ɔlɔŋɔ ú bisíké abɛ́ hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine ŋɔ yɔɔ́lɔ ŋá nyɛmána yɛ́ ɔ cáŋa bá na tuɔŋɔ etíne átátɔ́, yiíyi yɛ́ ŋɔɔ́ tɔ́nɔ́ hú nyɛtɔ́nɔ́ nyɛ́mɔtɛ́.
54005010	Yɛ́ ŋa nyɛmána yɛ́ ɔbá oónjú awɔ́ baacɔ ŋé bu lémbi nyíáyɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, wuúci u ŋeé sókóbíki bááyɛ́ baáná bɔmbányɛ, yɔ́ káháka bekenyí e úúye ooki, yɔ́ súáka akɔlɔ́ cé belumitinine Yésus, yɔ́ wɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ baacɔ e muuyé, yɔ́ kɛ́laka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana ekúlú ekime.
54005011	A asana ne bisíké a bɛ́ a yánáŋa indíkíné cí beénjú, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ láana anyía eti biíbi ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ e nufule, ananyía ɔcɔba nyɛtɔ́nɔ́ áŋa wu ɔ háná beébe bílénékíne buɔ́sɛ́, bɔ́ hámɔ́kɔ́na o olumitinine.
54005012	Mbɔ́kɔ bɛ́ ŋa kɛlaka aáná, bé ké biíbi kákálákɛ́na anyía bí ŋe kine ɔlátɛ́na cáábɔ́ esúŋe.
54005013	Asana a yɛ́mɔtɛ́ áŋa anyía mbɔ́kɔ o ŋoó biíbi ɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ, bɛ́ tɛ ká háná ɔ nyiɔ buólí, bío bíhélínyi o húle kanda hí eé meébe hí eé meébe, bɛ́ ɔ bá ne tukókó, bɛ́ táŋgɛ́na baacɔ, bɛ́ kɔɔ́náka bɛsana abɛ́ bɔ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔ bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔkɔɔnaka.
54005014	Yaátɛ́ asana nyiámɛ nyiléne áŋa anyía bisíké a bɛ́ a yánáŋa indíkíné cí beénjú ŋá nyɛmána bɛ́ ɔtɔ́nɔ́kɔ; bí bíénéke baáná, bí tétényíki maabɔ́ meébe ma baacɔ, ananyía ba-basɔ́-nuusi tɛ basɔ́ táŋɛ́na.
54005015	Yááŋa anyía bɛ́mɔtɛ́ bisíké na maá bɔ́ nánaka ohónyí, bɛ́ɔ látákɛ́na Sátan.
54005016	Mbɔ́kɔ mulumitinine e muénjú a mɔ́mɔtɛ́ áŋa ne bisíké bí beénjú a bɛ́áŋa a cíáyɛ́ ciíbe cɛ baacɔ, u ŋá nyɛmána wu o biíbi sókóbíki, u ti túéhínyi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine bɔlamɔ́ eébú. Aáná belumitinine ké bú sókóbíki bisíké bí beénjú a bɛ́áŋa taaká cí bisíké.
54005017	Bekendisi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine a bá ŋa bɔ́ nyiɔ búábɔ́ buólí bɔmbányɛ, hɔlákáhɔ́láka bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ e bé meé bú bíínjie muuyé ne o ohulinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ne o beébe eékúnyi bɛsana, bá ŋa nyɛmána bé o beébe kékéke bikúlú bífendí ɔ ɔhɔla bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bé etémbí.
54005018	Yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ a Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía: «Bá tɛ ŋɔ́ɔ́ yɔɔ́tɔ́kɛ́na káwɔ cɛ masáŋá ɛmɔ́má» yiíyi tɔ́na anyía «Munyiɔnɔ ŋá nyɛmána mu ɔnɔhɔkɛna a búáyɛ́ buólí.»
54005019	Atɛ caŋácáŋa olumitine asana ayɛ́ bá ɔsɔ́mɛ́na mukendisi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine a mumɔtɛ́, mbɔ́kɔ baacɔ béfendí ta bátátɔ́ tɛ ŋá bɔ́ háya ɛmbasɔ́.
54005020	Baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ cɔ́ba ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́, beébe bɔmɔ́kɛ́na ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ baacɔ bekime ananyía bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bé etémbí é búle ebú líkíme ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́.
54005021	Ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na eé buúse na bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne bú Yésus Kilís, ne bú bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a bɛtáfákánɔ́, ɛsɛ́: Látákɛ́na bɛsana eébí abɛ́ ɛ́ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ laákɛ́na. Atɛ kamɛ́na ɔɔcɔ asana anyía o ŋoó wuúci menyi, mbá á nyɛána mebeé.
54005022	Atɛ aáŋálɛ́na ɔ ɔtála ɔɔcɔ aabá a aatɔ́ o o wuúci télímínyi e nyilimíné hú anyía ɔyá ma yá. Atɛ aáláka bɔɔbɛ́ bɔ́ ɔɔcɔ; bítétényíki kuɔŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá ofúúménénú.
54005023	Nyɛána o búle múána hú menyífé, a múátɛ́tákɛ́na meluku a asana ne úúwe ɔkála ú nuuhú anyía a tɛ háná lɔ́kɔ́ma ɔkála a tɔɔna.
54005024	Maabɛ́ má baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋa lɛ́cana a miányɛ́ te bé ti ŋée beébe kélísi; mbá baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́, bá ŋa nyɛmána bá ɔ cáŋa beébe kélísíki, e elime eécí bá ŋa lɛca anyía bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛ́láka bɔɔbɛ́.
54005025	Híáná ambányɛ yí buólí ŋa lɛ́cana a miányɛ́ tɔ́na, te bé ti ŋé tényí e buúbu lɛca, bú tɛ á bá bú olimine ekúlú yeéŋí bunámbánɔ́ tɛ́ka ne obítóŋie a miányɛ́.
54006001	Belumitinine bekime a bá bɔ́ŋa bɛɔ́lɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔlɛcaka báábɔ́ baáŋá ne nyikéke nyikime a nyɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́amba, ananyía baacɔ ti sulísi te nyiínyi nyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ta bɛsana ebí tu ŋe sú eékúnyi baacɔ.
54006002	Mbɔ́kɔ báábɔ́ baáŋá eébé ŋa bɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Kilís, bɔ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔ bɔ́ nyɛmána bé o beébe bábákɛ́na, bá kɔɔnaka anyía bá bɔ́ŋa báábɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine. Mbá, bá ŋá bɔ nyɛmána bé o beébe nyiɔkɛna buólí ɔ ɔhɔla nyinyiɔ nyɛ́ buáyá anyía bá bɔ́ŋa belumitinine, bé beébe lénéke tɔ́na. Bɛsana eébí ɔ́ɔ nyɛmána wu oweékúnyíki baacɔ, é beébe oókísíki anyía bá kɛláka.
54006003	Mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ áŋa ne nyiékúnyi nyí etémbí, yó kine olumitinine ta bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana bí uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís, ta nyíásɔ́ nyiékúnyi a asana na ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́,
54006004	ɔɔcɔ oócí áŋa na bumálá; u ti ŋé menyi ta bɔkɔ bú etémbí, ɛ tɛ ŋáa bá hú na bɛhɔnɔnɔ na ɛsáká cí etémbí ne etémbí. Ciíci cí ŋe yiínjie baacɔ na bɛáká, na bɛhɔnɔnɔ, na muɔ́mbɔ́nána, na ɔbɛ́táá anyía bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ ŋeé beébe kɛláka bɔɔbɛ́.
54006005	Bé ŋe bú súŋunyinyi, bá tɛ tɔmbɔ, anyía ciibú ibíkéti áŋa ɛɛbɛ́: Bé ti túné menyi taaká. Bé ŋe bú keti yáakɛlá anyía, mbɔ́kɔ bá ŋa bɔ́ látɛ́na abɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na cé olumitinine, bá ŋa bɔ́ cɔ́baka ɔ ɔhɔ́máka mɔɔnyɛ́ meéŋí.
54006006	Aá taaká nyibíínjie ɔ ɔlátɛ́na olumitinine áŋa na yaandándá yɛ́ ɔhɔ́ma, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋeé bíléníne nyɛnamá nyɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma anyɛ́ wáŋa ne nyiínyi.
54006007	Yááŋa anyía tu ŋa sɔ́ faáya ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ aabá éfendí, híáná tu ká sɔ́ halɔ́mɔ́kɔ́na tɔ́na aabá éfendí.
54006008	Aáná mbɔ́kɔ tua sɔ́ŋa na bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíáka na bɔlaka bɔ́ ɔlaŋaba, nyɛnamá eényí ŋaá basɔ́ nyɛmána.
54006009	A aháŋá na baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ aamba bɔnɔ́mɛ buéŋí, Sátan áŋa wu o beébe kɔ́kɔ́náka, yɔ́ kɛla anyía bábɔ́ kuakɔnaka a yááyɛ́ abɔkɔ noómi, bé o búle bɛ́táá hú oléne bɛsana na bɛ́ buála na a bɛɛbɛ́ e bí ŋeé beébe súéténe ne e bunyímé ne o owé noómi.
54006010	Yááŋa anyía, oléne mɔɔnyɛ́ buéŋí ŋeé bíéne anamánamá ekime cá bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana. Aáná baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ e bé ŋe bú bíínjíékíne o oléne mɔɔnyɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́yuátáka olumitinine, cííbú ɛtɛ́má bɛ́nyíáka buéŋí a asana eéyé.
54006011	Ɔ́ɔ kuɔŋɔ́, munyiɔnɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, sámbáka bɛsana eébí bikime; bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na ekúlú ekime ɔbá atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ, é líhéke háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé léne, mbá á cɔbá ne buúse ne o olumitinine Kilís, ne o oléne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́, eéhíkínyínyi bɛsana, a aambáka mbuumu na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ tɔ́na.
54006012	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ láana anyía nuáka bɛmbányɛ bí biité bí olumitinine, mbá é tímbíé bɔmbányɛ yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime; yiíyi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋɔɔ́ yɔ́ɔ bɛ́tánɛ́na ekúlú ayɛ́ ú ŋɔ yɔ́ɔ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ, wɔ́ táŋáka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana ebí o ŋoó lumítíníne eé buúse bɔ́ bambasɔ́mbásɔ beéŋí.
54006013	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ laana ne eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Mulíhísi bɛnyɛ́ma bikime, ne eé buúse bú Yésus Kilís awɔ́ u ŋa táŋáka na taaká ikime eé buúse bɔ́ Kɔ́mɛ́na Bílat, ɛsɛ́:
54006014	Látákɛ́na bikotí bí olumitinine bikime e bufúúménénú noómi, baacɔ tɛ ɔ kákálɛ́na ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma a nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
54006015	U ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na a ambányɛ yí ekúlú ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá tána. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ oócí Alámakɛ́nda, wuúci hicéme hɛ́ bɔmbányɛ, Otéŋí u betéŋí bekime, Waáŋá u baáŋá bekime.
54006016	Wuúci bímuócí ú ŋe líhe bikúlú bikime, u ti wé; u ŋe límine aá yaandándá yí eese ayɛ́ ɔɔcɔ tɛ a bá wu obíkósíti né yiíyi. Ta ɔɔcɔ ti ŋé wuúci lɛca, ta ɔɔcɔ tɛ ŋáá bá wu o wuúci lɛca tɔ́na; wuúci u ŋeé téŋínyi ekúlú ekime, wuúci baacɔ ábɔ́ nyɛmána bé onyemiki, híáná yááŋa.
54006017	Láákɛ́na ɛnɔ́mɛ cɛ́ baacɔ anyía cí ti bíbéétíki, cɛ́ tɛ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ a bɔnɔ́mɛ, anyía búáŋa bú ɔsɔla. Mbá cɛ́ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bímuócí anyía ú ŋa basɔ́ iínjie bɛnyɛ́ma bikime biéŋí anyía tuésú biíbi bílénékíne.
54006018	Ciíci laákɛ́na anyía cɛ́á kɛláka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana biéŋí, cɛ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na na bɔnɔ́mɛ buéŋí a ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛkɛla nyɛ́ bɛsana. Cɛ́ ŋá nyɛmána cɛ́ ɔbá ne nuubo, cí iínjíékine bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bɛnyɛ́ma.
54006019	Mbɔ́kɔ cɛ́ ŋaá kɛla aáná, cɛ́ ŋa bɛ́bátɛ́nɛ́na taaká cɛ bɔnɔ́mɛ a bɔ́ tɛ ŋáá mana e bikúlú a bɛ́ ŋa fáakɔna; aáná cɛ́ káá bá na taaká ci olíhe.
54006020	Timoté, tétényíki bɔmbányɛ bɔkɔ ebú bó ŋo yóo cuméke, mbá á sámbáka ne tukókó tú etémbí ne etémbí e tú ŋe nuusi olumitinine, ne isuŋí e cí ŋo tóŋínyi omenyi a wɔ́mɔtɛ́ awɔ́ ú tɛ á bá taaká.
54006021	Yááŋa anyía búmɔtɛ́ baacɔ ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́táá báyɛ bá bɔ́ŋa na nyɛnamá nyí omenyi eényí; buátɛ́ bɔkɔ bá tɛ ŋá háná ebú lumitinine bɛsana ebí tu ŋe sú lumitinine. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sayábákɛ́naʼo !
55001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma u Yésus Kilís, e nyitélímínyi anyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi teliminyi anyía yámɛ bá muhulinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma a yɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca olíhe awɔ́ u ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́tánɛ́na anyía tua sɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís.
55001002	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ wɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, kuɔŋɔ́ Timoté, uumi ɔɔ́nɔ́ u ɔtɛ́má. Na ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís bɔ́ kuɔŋɔ́ sáyabakɛna, bɔ́ ɔ bɛ́cáma mahana, bó o wiínjie mbuumu ɔɔ́wɔ ɔ ɔtɛ́má noómi.
55001003	I ŋeé mi iínjie Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti ɔɔ́wɔ a asana. I ŋeé mi wuúci nyiɔnɔ ne híími hɛcɔɔ́cɔ́ e hifúúménénú a hɛ́áŋa ɔ ɔtɛ́má háyɛ cíími sɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ ŋe bú wuúci nyiɔ́kɛ́na. Ekúlú ekime eyí í ŋe mí wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na, ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ bɛ́táá ne nebutúé na nabuɔ́sɛ́.
55001004	Ɛ naŋa yámɛ bɛ́tááka bíɔ́wɔ bɛlɛlá ebí o ŋoó hémúkúnyi, ɛcaná cɛ ɔ kuɔŋɔ́ lɛ́cɔtɔna cío mi nyióyo ɔ ɔtɛ́má, anyía yémi bílénéke buéŋí.
55001005	I ŋeé mi iínjie Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bitéŋíti ɔɔ́wɔ a asana anyía ɛ ŋa háná mɛ́ bɛ́táá anyía ɔ ŋɔɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus Kilís taaká taaká. Olumitinine oócí ŋaa cáŋacáŋa ɔ bá na ɔ ɔtɛ́má ú ciɔwɔ ɛnyɛɛ́nɔ́ Loyis na ɔ ɔtɛ́má ú ɔɔnyia Énis. I ŋe mí menyi ɔɔ́mɛ ɔ ɔtɛ́má anyía wáŋa tɔ́na nɔ́ɔ́wɔ.
55001006	Yaátɛ́ asana ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ laana tɔ́na anyía bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na ɔkɛla na makɛ́nda mekime bɔkɔ abɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋó yóo cuméke ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ tála aabá a aatɔ́.
55001007	Yááŋa anyía tɛ́ cáŋa elilé yɛ́ ɔbɛ́naanɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ naŋa waá basɔ́ iínjíékíne, mbá u ŋá basɔ́ iínjie Elilé yí ne ciéhíhi ne olénéke bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ ne injiŋé a cɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ ɔɔ́lɔ a ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na.
55001008	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ atɛ lɔ́kɔ́máka aatɔ́ ɔlama owoókísi baacɔ asana yí uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá, ta yáámɛ asana yɛ́ bɛ́muátá yaŋɔ́ ooci awɔ́ ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná a yááyɛ́ asana; mbá a makɛ́nda amá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋó yóo wiínjie, eéhínyínyi ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé ɔlɔŋɔ na yaŋɔ́ a asana na Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma.
55001009	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ nohi. U ŋaá basɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ anyía túásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na bifúúménénú bɛ́ baacɔ; tɛ́ cáŋa a asana na bíásɔ́ bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ abɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, mbá hú anyía na nyíáyɛ́ nyɛtákɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana na yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo. U ŋaá kɛ́láka aáná e elime ci Yésus Kilís, ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋaá bá ɛ́cɛ u ti ŋe kéti na ɔmuaná na ɔmɛsɛ́.
55001010	Aámbáya ú maá basɔ́ tóŋínyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ nuubo eénú a nyɛfaaya nyɛ́ muasɔ́ Munohi Yésus Kilís. Wuúci u ŋeé menyisi owé, yó tóŋgínyi a Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma anyía tu tɛ ká sɔ́ fɔ́nɔ́, mbá tu ká sɔ́ bá na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime.
55001011	Yaŋɔ́, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé mi télímínyi ne muhulinyi baacɔ Ɛsɔ́ma na ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma anyía yémi hulíkínyi baacɔ bɛsana eébí, i beébe biíbi eékúnyíki.
55001012	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma nyɛnamá nyí muuyé eenyi; mbá ta híáná, ɛ tɛ ŋá mɛ lɔ́kɔ́ma aatɔ́ ɔlama, ananyía i ŋe mí menyi ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá, yaŋɔ́ tɔ́na na mɔŋɔlɛ́ anyía wáŋa na makɛ́nda me otétényíki bɔkɔ ebú u ŋe mí cuméke ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma buɔ́sɛ́ etéebú abɔ́ u ká ká hálɔ́mɔ́na.
55001013	Hulíkínyi taaká taaká cɛ́ bɛsana bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ háyɛ i ŋo mí o biíbi hulíkínyi, mbá e bíínjie ne o olumitinine ne o oléne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́; bɛsana eébí ŋeé hule e nyimónjóló anyɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa ne Yésus Kilís.
55001014	Tétényíki Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma eéyé ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋo yóo cúméke, a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé a yɛ́áŋa e cíísú ɛtɛ́má noómi.
55001015	Kuɔŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá o ŋoó menyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ anyía belumitinine bekime bé ekéti yí iisí yɛ́ Asi na maá bɔ mɛ bɛ́yuátáka; ne Fisɛlɛ na Ɛlɛ́mɔ́sɛ́n á bɔ́ŋa ɔ ɔlɔŋɔ ú baacɔ oócí.
55001016	A aháŋá ne Onésífɔɔl, u naŋa waá mɛ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ bikúlú a bɛ́mɔtɛ́. U tɛ ŋá lɔ́kɔ́ma aatɔ́ ɔlama eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ a asana ayɛ́ ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná. Otéŋí a Waáŋá é wuúci sáyábákɛ́na na ciayɛ́ ciíbe cɛ baacɔ áyá.
55001017	Ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋgaá faáya aaha o Lóom, u ŋe bíínjíé o o húle mɛ áamba na makɛ́nda, yɔ́ kɔ mɛ kuana haála ahɛ́ ɛ ŋaá mɛ bá.
55001018	Uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá é wuúci sáyábɛ́na a buɔ́sɛ́ ebú u kéé kélísíki baacɔ. Kuɔŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá, o ŋoó menyi bɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔhɔla baacɔ bekime moólí emé Onésífɔɔl ŋaá mɛ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ, ekúlú ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bá ɛ Ɛfɛ́ɛsɛ.
55002001	Yaátɛ́ asana, kuɔŋɔ́ uumi ɔɔ́nɔ́, bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na na makɛ́nda ɔ ɔtɛ́má a yaála yí nuubo yí nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís.
55002002	Bɛsana abɛ́ ɔ ŋɔɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka yémi hulikínyí baacɔ buáyá eé buúse bɔ́ bambasɔ́mbásɔ beéŋí, biíbi húlíkínyi ná taaká cɛ́ baacɔ cí etémbí a cíáŋa cí omenyi oweékúnyi baacɔ bé etémbí tɔ́na.
55002003	Mbɔ́kɔ muuyé ŋɔ yɔ́ɔ kuana, eéhínyínyi ɔlɔŋɔ na yaŋɔ́ háyɛ ambányɛ yí ecénji yí Yésus Kilís.
55002004	Ɔɔcɔ okime ewú e yoofíne e bucénji naŋa wa yáámbáka obíléníne ciayɛ́ síkíne ci buólí; buátɛ́ bɔkɔ u tɛ ŋá háná a háya uuye ɔtɛ́má a bɛsana bí olíhe bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ bí etémbí ne etémbí.
55002005	Bá tɛ á bá bɔ́ námaka ɔɔcɔ a wáŋa e biseŋinyinyi bɛ́ ɔtɛ́tá, mbɔ́kɔ u tɛ ŋá látɛ́na bɔmbányɛ bikotí bí biseŋinyinyi.
55002006	Munyiɔ esíéné e mú ŋe hiite muuyé muéŋí ɔ ɔnyiɔ buólí ŋá nyɛmána mu ɔcaŋácáŋa ɔnyíá bɛnyɛ́ma bí esíéné.
55002007	Hákɛ́na bɛsana eébí abɛ́ ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ laana ɔɔ́wɔ ɔ mɔsɔŋɛ́ noómi; yááŋa anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá kó yóo wiínjie injiŋé ci o biíbi lɔ́kɔ́máka bikime bɔmbányɛ.
55002008	Atɛ bɛ́hɔ́ya Yésus Kilís, ɔɔcɔ u yiíbe yí Otéŋí Táfit; u ŋaá háányua e biwéewé háyɛ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ŋaá kɔɔna. Yiíyi i ŋe mí hulínyi baacɔ.
55002009	A asana na Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma eéyé ɛ ŋa mɛ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná, bɔ́ mɛ ɔ́ɔ́tɔ́kɔ́kɔ na macanja háyɛ ɔŋána. Mbá ta híáná, bá tɛ á bá bá ɔwɔɔ́tɔ́kɔ́kɔ Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na macanja anyía baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ti yiíyi hulísi.
55002010	Aáná i ŋe mí eéhínyínyi bɔkɔ bukime eébú, anyía baacɔ abá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá táfáka ábɔ́ bɔ́ŋɔ bɔmbányɛ, ananyía bábɔ́ bá tɔ́na na nyɛnɔhɔ e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís ɔlata ne nuúmi nú ekúlú ekime.
55002011	Buhúnyi eebu áŋa taaká cɛ buhúnyi; búáŋa anyía: Mbɔ́kɔ tu ŋe sú wé ɔlɔŋɔ ne wuúci, tu ké sú líhéke tɔ́na ɔlɔŋɔ ne wuúci.
55002012	Mbɔ́kɔ tu ŋe sú eéhínyínyi muuyé, tu ké sú téŋgínyi ɔlɔŋɔ ne wuúci tɔ́na. Mbɔ́kɔ tu ŋe sú wuúci bínéŋítínyi, wuúci tɔ́na u káá basɔ́ bínéŋítínyi.
55002013	Mbɔ́kɔ tu ti ŋé su nyióyísínyi cíísú ɛndána nááyá, wuúci u ŋó nyióyísínyi cííyé ɛndána bikúlú bikime, ananyía u tɛ a bá wu ɔlɔbɔ u ti nyióyísínyi nyíáyɛ́ nyɛkɔɔna.
55002014	Bɛsana eébí ɔ́ɔ nyɛmána wu ɔhálɔ́mɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na ɔlaana baacɔ bekime, e beébe oókísíki eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ɔ ɔnyɛanaka na ɛsáká na ɛŋɛ́ndɛ́ŋɛ́ cí etémbí ne etémbí cɛ́ bɛcambɛ́tɛ́, anyía bɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ ta bɔkɔ. Mbá bí ŋe nuési ɛtɛ́má cɛ́ baacɔ e bé ŋe bú biíbi bɛ́lɔ́kɔ́ma.
55002015	Bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na ɔnyiɔnɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ buólí háyɛ ú ŋe léne; buúbu nyiɔkɔ a nyɛnamá anyɛ́ ɔ tɛ ɔ́ bá wu ɔlɔ́kɔ́máka aatɔ́ ɔlama, e eékúnyíki baacɔ taaká cɛ́ bɛsana háyɛ yɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́ámba.
55002016	A asana ne tukókó tú etémbí ne etémbí e tú ŋeé nuusi olumitinine, tuútu sámbáka, anyía baacɔ e bé ŋe bú tuútu kɛla ŋa bɔ́ cɔ́ba haaca ne olumitinine.
55002017	Nyíábɔ́ nyiékúnyi ŋo yóofinine baacɔ háyɛ ebéli a yɛ́ ŋɔ yɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́lɔ ɔɔcɔ omehú ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma e yuúhé. Ne Iméné ne Filɛ́t á bɔ́ŋa ɔ ɔlɔŋɔ ú baacɔ eébé.
55002018	Bá na maá bɔ́ nyɛánaka taaká ci ohónyí, bé nénísíki baacɔ bɔ́mɔtɛ́, ekúlú eyí bé ŋe bú eékúnyi bá kɔɔnaka báyɛ nyɛhaanyua nyí biwéewé na maá bɛ́kɛ́láka buáyá.
55002019	Mbá ta híáná, bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa taaká, bɛ́ tɛ ŋá bɛ́nyɔkɔtɔna; bíáŋa háyɛ tukúse tú ciíbe e tú ti ŋe bínyienyi. Bɔ́ ŋɔ yɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ eé tukúse eétú, báyɛ: «Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé menyi bááyɛ́ baacɔ». Bɔ́ háná ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ báyɛ: «Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa kɔɔna anyía wáŋa ɔɔcɔ u Otéŋí a Waáŋá, wa aáŋíá ɔkɔlɔ́ ɔ ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́».
55002020	Tɛ́ cáŋa hú bɛtáyá bɛ́ ɔnyíákɛ́na a bɛ́áŋa bɛtábɔ́nákánɔ́ ne kóolo ne eléŋú yɛ́ mɔɔnyɛ́ bá náŋa bá kuanaka eé ciíbe cɛ ɛnɔ́mɛ cɛ ɔɔcɔ; bá náŋa bá kuanaka tɔ́na a bɛ́áŋa bɛtúákánɔ́ na maatɛ́ na a bɛ́áŋa bɛmáákánɔ́ na nɔɔma. Bá ŋa bɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a bɛmbányɛ ekúlú yɛ́ maŋanda, a bɛ́mɔtɛ́ bá bɛ́kɛ́lákɛ́na bikúlú bikime.
55002021	Híáná, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋe bítétényi ofúúménénú, yó bíkíilie bɔɔbɛ́ eébú, u káá bá háyɛ bɛtáyá bɛ́ ɔnyíákɛ́na a bɛmbányɛ abɛ́ bá ŋa bɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a taaká cɛ buɔ́sɛ́. Aáhá Síkíne kéé wuúci háya a maabána anyía waáta ɔɔcɔ ŋeé wuúci ɔ́ɔ́lɔ; wáŋa hoóhi ne o wuúci nyiɔkɛna buólí a bɔmbányɛ bukime.
55002022	Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, sámbáka bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana bikime e bí ŋe bíléníne bɛnɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ; mbá a látákɛ́na na nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a nyɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́, ne olumitinine, ne nulénéne, ne mbuumu ɔlɔŋɔ na baacɔ eebe e bé ŋe bú nyemi Otéŋí a Waáŋá ne efúúménénú yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má.
55002023	Ekúlú ayɛ́ baacɔ ŋe bú súŋunyinyi na bɛsana bɛ́ buála bí etémbí ne etémbí, atɛ háya nyiɔ́wɔ nyuúté hɔ́á, anyía isuŋí eécí ŋeé héléníne ɛsáká.
55002024	Yááŋa anyía munyiɔnɔ mu Otéŋí a Waáŋá tɛ ɔ́mɔ nyɛmána mu ɔsááka na baacɔ, mbá mu ŋá nyɛmána mu o beébe lénéke bekime, muúmu ambányɛ yí muékúnyi ne oweéhínyínyi ɔ ɔtɛ́má.
55002025	Ekúlú ayɛ́ baacɔ ŋe bú muúmu nuusi, mu ŋá nyɛmána mu o beébe eékúnyíki ne ehúúménénú yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ekime; muúmu na mɔŋɔlɛ́ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa wu o beébe iínjie makɛ́nda ma ɔbɛ́kákálákɛ́na maabɔ́ maabɛ́, mbá bá sɔ́mba ɔkɔlɔ́ eé meéme; bó menyukune taaká.
55002026	Aáná bá ká bɔ́ hálɔ́mɔ́kɔ́na aá ciabɔ́ciabɔ́, bɔ́ bɛ́hɔɔkɔ e tukolí atɔ́ Musɔ́mɛ́na ŋaá bá ɛ́cɛ mú me beébe ɔɔ́tɔ́kɔ́kɔ anyía bábɔ́ kɛlaka háyɛ mu ŋeé léne.
55003001	Menyi anyía bikúlú a bɛɛbɛ́ káá bá ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ me elime;
55003002	yááŋa anyía baacɔ ká bɔ́ bá ne buhibé, bé lénéke mɔɔnyɛ́ buéŋí, bá kɛ́laka bumálá, bé bíbéétíki, bé fénékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bá kɛ́lakɛna bíábɔ́ bibíényi aatɔ́ ɔnata; bá ká bɔ́ bá na tɔŋákɔ, bé ti kéké bɔkɔ bú okotí.
55003003	Bá ká bɔ́ bá na bɛnatákánɔ́ bɛ́ ɛtɛ́má, bá tɛ bɛ́cáma ɔɔcɔ mahana, bé oótóko bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́; bá ká bɔ́ bá na nyɛŋána, bé tékeseke baacɔ, bé liŋekine baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana.
55003004	Bé ké búle ebú túé bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́, beébe hú tulóbi ne tulóbi, ɛtɛ́má inyíóyókónú na bumálá hú mbiɔ́kɛ, bé lénéke osoomo ú ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci ɔ ɔhɔla Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
55003005	Bé ké búle abɔ́ hɔ́á baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ látɛ́na abɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na cí olumitinine, mbá bé ti lumitíne anyía makɛ́nda ma Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa ma ɔkɛla anyía bébú líhéke háyɛ ú ŋe léne. Ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ laana anyía limine haaca na baacɔ eébé.
55003006	Baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ bé uubú ɔlɔŋɔ naŋa bé hule ebú oofokine eé meébe, bé eékíkínyi beénjú bá bɔtɔhɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ anyía bé lumítekine maabɔ́ mehúnyi. Beénjú eébé ne meé bú oofine ɔ ɔkɛla anamánamá cá bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana ekime e cé ŋeé beébe bíléníne ɛ ɛtɛ́má.
55003007	Bé ŋe bú léne ɔwaákɔ́nɛ́na bɛsana; asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, bá tɛ ŋá bɔ́ háya bɛɛtɔ́ o omenyi taaká cɛ́ bɛsana.
55003008	Buáyá, na Sáanɛs na Sámbɛlɛs ŋe bú núúsíki Moyís; híáná baacɔ eébé ŋe bú nuusi taaká. Bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá tɔ́na ne injiŋé, bá bɛ́tááka hú bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana, úúbú olumitinine ti ŋéé beébe ɔɔ́lɔ́ ta bɔkɔ.
55003009	Mbá bá tɛ ŋá bɔ́ cɔba ne buúse; búábɔ́ buála kéé bítóŋínyi a baacɔ háyɛ bé ŋe menyi buáyá buála bɔ́ na Sáanɛs na Sámbɛlɛs.
55003010	Mbá kuɔŋɔ́, o ŋoó menyi bɔmbányɛ na nyiámɛ nyiékúnyi, na yáámɛ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, na anyána ɛ́ náŋa yámɛ bɛ́tááka, i lumitekinine, na anyána i ŋe mí eéhínyínyi, i lénéke bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́, na anyána i ŋe mí oónyísínyi nyiámɛ nyɛkɔɔna.
55003011	O ŋoó menyi tɔ́na anyána bé ŋe mi tékéséke, míɔ lɛcaka muuyé. Muuyé mɔ́ háányɛ́ ne indekese cɛ́ háányɛ́ ɛ tɛ ɔ́mɔ wɔɔ́ndɛ́mánána na a bálɛ́ka cɛ Antióse, ne ci Ikóniyom ne ci Lisitɛ́lɛ e? Mbá ta híáná, Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé mi kétúnyíki e muuyé eémú mukime.
55003012	Aá taaká, baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ áamba olíhe na e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís, na háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé léne, ká bɔ́ ɔɔ́ndɛ́mákánána ne indekese ciéŋí.
55003013	A aháŋá na baŋána na baacɔ bá mabɛ́lɛ́áka, bé ké búle abɔ́ cɔ́ba ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́, bá ká bɔ́ nanaka ohónyí; bó nénisiki tɔ́na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bé etémbí.
55003014	Ɔɔ́wɔ a aháŋá, cɔbá ne buúse ɔ ɔlátɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ ɔ ŋɔɔ́ waákɔ́nákɛ́na, wó biíbi lumitinine ne uúwe ɔtɛ́má okime, anyía o ŋoó menyi bɔmbányɛ bɔ́ɔ́wɔ beékúnyi.
55003015	Yááŋa anyía o otúme ɔɔ́wɔ a bunɔ́sɛ́, o ŋoó menyi Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ e cifúúménénú; cí ŋo yóo wiínjie injiŋé anyía ɔ́ɔ bá ne olíhe ananyía ɔ ŋɔɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus Kilís.
55003016	Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ikime a ciɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ ŋaá bɛ́ɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ na makɛ́nda me Elilé yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; cɛ́ ŋɔ yɔɔ́lɔ ne o oweékúnyi baacɔ taaká, ne o otélímínyi na anana na bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́, ne o oweékúnyi baacɔ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a nyɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́,
55003017	ananyía munyiɔnɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na na bɔkɔ bukime e uúyé ɔtɛ́má noómi. Buúbu bú ŋe wuúci bɛ́ámbɛ́na anyía waá kɛlaka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana.
55004001	Ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na eé buúse na bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne bú Yésus Kilís, wuúci u kéé kélísíki baacɔ na a bɔɔ́sɔ ne e bewéékúnénú, na asana yɛ́ nyíáyɛ́ nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na na yɛ́ búáyɛ́ Butéŋí anyía:
55004002	Hulíkínyi baacɔ bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, hɛɛ́nyákɛ́nɛ́na o biíbi huli e bikúlú bikime, te e bikúlú a bɛmbányɛ te e bikúlú a bɛɛbɛ́. Kɛláka anyía bé biíbi lɔ́kɔ́máka bɔmbányɛ, beébe kákálákɛ́na ekúlú ayɛ́ bá bɔ́ŋa a nyɛnana, beébe kíndísíki ɔ ɔkɛla bɔmbányɛ, é beébe eékúnyíki ne ehúúménénú yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má.
55004003	Yááŋa anyía bikúlú a bɛ́mɔtɛ́ ŋa fáakɔna abɛ́ baacɔ tɛ ká háná ebú léne ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma nyiékúnyi nyɛ́ taaká cɛ́ bɛsana, mbá bé ké búle ebú bíléníne bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́. Aáná bá ká bɔ́ bándáka ɛlɔŋɔ cí beékúnyi e bé ŋe bú beébe eékúnyi bɛsana abɛ́ cáábɔ́ eetú ŋeé bíléníne ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma.
55004004	Bá tɛ ká háná ebú lumitine ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma taaká, mbá bé ké búle abɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma tuhélúméke tɔ́ buáyá atɔ́ baacɔ ŋe bú beébe bíkétínyi.
55004005	Mbá kuɔŋɔ́, cɔbá ne buúse a ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a bɔkɔ bukime, lumitine ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé, hulíkínyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma, mbá e nyióyísínyi ɔ ɔnyiɔ buɔ́wɔ buólí bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ.
55004006	Aá yaŋɔ́ʼo, ya mɛáŋa háyɛ bɔkɔ abɔ́ bá ma bɛ́sámbɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne buúbu; yáámɛ́ ekúlú yí owé a yáaŋa hoóhi.
55004007	Ya mɛ́ŋa ɔnuákánɔ́ bɛmbányɛ bí biité bí olumitinine, míɔ kɔɔ́háma a nyɛmana nyɛ́ ɔtɛ́tá, mío tétényíki olumitinine.
55004008	Aámbáya, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ maá mɛ bátɛ́nɛ́na bɛnamá ɔ Ɔmuaná anyía ya mɛ́ŋa ɔkɛlákánɔ́ bɛsana a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́. Otéŋí a Waáŋá, Mukélísi baacɔ aá taaká ikime, wuúci u kéé mi iínjiekine bɛnamá eébí buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ u káá basɔ́ kélísíki. Mbá tɛ́ cáŋa hú yaŋɔ́ bímuócí u káá námaka, u káá námaka tɔ́na eebe bekime e bé me bú bíínjie o wuúci táta.
55004009	Aambáka ohónyí wú o tényí faáya náámɛ.
55004010	Yááŋa anyía Tɛ́mas na maá mɛ bɛ́yúata anyía olíhe ú ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci ŋe wuúci bíléníne; aáná u ŋé súéte a Tɛsaloníke. Kɛlɛsans wuúci u ŋa cɔba a Kalasi, Tite ŋé súéte a Talamasi.
55004011	Hú Lúkas bímuócí wáŋa aaha na yaŋɔ́. Ekúlú ayɛ́ ɔ kɔ́ɔ́ faáya, héléne Malɛ́kus anyía wáŋa wu ɔ mɛ ɔɔ́lɛ́ta e buólí.
55004012	Ɛ ŋá mɛ tɔ́ma Tisíke ɛ Ɛfɛ́ɛsɛ.
55004013	Ɔ nyiɔ́wɔ nyɛfaaya, a hɔlɛna a Tɔlɔwás o ooki ú Kalibus, mbá é mi héléníne búámɛ bɔlaka bú nyiike ebú i ŋeé mi síke hɔ́á. Héléne tɔ́na tufule, hɔlákáhɔ́láka eetu a tɔ́ bá naŋa bɔ́ yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ a bɛɔfɔ bɛ́ ɛnyama.
55004014	Alɛkɛsándɛlɛ mutúnétúne áŋa ɔ mɛ kɛlákánɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́ buéŋí; Otéŋí a Waáŋá kéé wuúci namaka háyɛ yɛ́ á nyɛmána a nyíáyɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na.
55004015	Wuúci bíkékényi tɔ́na, anyía u ŋe nuúsiki buéŋí nyíásɔ́ nyiékúnyi.
55004016	Ekúlú yí buúse ayɛ́ ɛ ŋá mɛ talɛmɛna a nyɛkála, ta ɔɔcɔ tɛ ɔ́mɔ kɔɔ́ mɛ ɔɔ́lɔ; bekime ŋa bɔ́ mɛ bɛ́yúataka. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ é beébe nyɛánákɛ́nɛ́na nyɛkɛlaka eényí.
55004017	Mbá ta híáná, Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋaá bá hoóhi na yaŋɔ́, yó mi kíndísíki buéŋí anyía yémi hulíkínyi baacɔ bɔmbányɛ bíáyɛ́ bɛsana, bɛ́ ɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákána e eetú cá baacɔ bekime a bá tɛ ábɔ́ bá Besuif. U ŋeé mi kétúnyíki e nyuúté nyí iŋgoyó.
55004018	I ŋe mí menyi anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá kéé mi kétúnyíki tɔ́na a bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana bikime; u kéé mi tétényíki, yó kó mi oofinyi ɔ Ɔmuaná eeyé e Butéŋí. Wuúci tuasɔ́ nyɛmána tu owiínjíékíne nuúmi bikúlú bikime. Híáná yááŋa.
55004019	Óo mi téŋgínyi ne Bilisíle na Akílas, ne ciíbe cɛ Onésífɔɔl.
55004020	Ɛlásɛt ŋɔ lɔbɔ ɔɔ́ Kɔlɛ́ɛntɛ. I ŋeé mi síke Tolofime eé Milɛ́ wɔɔ́ ɔkɔnɔkɔ.
55004021	Aambáka ohónyí wú o tényí faáya aaha ɛ́cɛ ekúlú yí buume ti ŋeé túme. Ne Ebulus, ne Butɛns, ne Línus, ne Kolodía ŋe bú o téŋí, na báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé etémbí bé olumitinine tɔ́na bekime.
55004022	Otéŋí a Waáŋá é tétényíki uúwe ɔtɛ́má. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sayábákɛ́naʼo.
56001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, munyiɔnɔ mɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ ɔ wɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu. Ya mɛ́ŋa ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma u Yésus Kilís. Ɛ ŋaá mɛ ɔ́ɔ́lɔ baacɔ abá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋɔɔ lɔ́tɔ́kɔ́, anyía bé lumítékíníne mbá bé menyi taaká cɛ́ bɛsana. Bɛsana eébí ŋo tóŋínyi anyána bébú líhéke háyɛ bú ŋe bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́,
56001002	bɔ́ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ɔɔ́ yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́tánɛ́ná olíhe oócí ɛ́cɛ u ti ŋe kéti na ɔmuaná na ɔmɛsɛ́, u naŋa u ti é néŋéne.
56001003	Ɛ́makɛ́la ekúlú á nyɛmána, nyɛnambɔnɛna baacɔ eényí yááyɛ́ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma; yiíyi eéyé ú ŋe mí cuméke; i ŋe mí yiíyi hulinyi baacɔ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, muasɔ́ Munohi, u ŋaá mɛ tɔ́má.
56001004	Yaŋɔ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ wɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, kuɔŋɔ́ Tite taaká ci uumi ɔɔ́nɔ́ anyía basɔ́ bekime béfendí tu ŋa sɔ́ háyá mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus Kilís. Na ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne muasɔ́ Munohi Yésus Kilís bá ɔ sayábákɛ́na, bé o wiínjíékíne mbuumu ɔ ɔtɛ́má noómi.
56001005	Ɛ ŋa cáŋa emí o síke aá Kɛlɛtɛ na anyía óo cikílíékíne bɛsana a bɛ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ bá bicikílíékínénú, ne óo húle otélímíkínyi tɔ́na bekendisi tuɔ́bɔ tú belumitinine a bálɛ́ka hú ikime a cɛ́áŋa ne tuútu, háyɛ i ŋe mí o weékúnyíki.
56001006	Mukendisi belumitinine ŋá nyɛmána mu olíhéke tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma na ɔɔcɔ; muúmu mɔbátɛ́nánɔ́ oónjú hú ɔmɔtɛ́, baáná hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus, bé líhéke háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe léne; baacɔ bekime menyukune anyía bá tɛ ŋá bɔ́ kɛla bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana, bé muúmu kékéke.
56001007	Yááŋa anyía mukendisi belumitinine áŋa munyiɔnɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; yaátɛ́ asana muá nyɛmána mu ɔbá tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma, muúmu tɛ́ka ne enyite, te ne tuliŋéliŋe, muúmu tɛ́ka amúána meluku, ta anua bitule, mu tɛ nyíáná ɔɔcɔ e menjiŋé tɔ́na.
56001008	Mbá mu ŋá nyɛmána mu ɔkáháka bɔmbányɛ baacɔ e uúyé ooki, mu lénéke ɔkɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana; muúmu ne injiŋé a aatɔ́, muúmu atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ, muúmu mufúúménénú eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ne oweéhínyínyi ɔ ɔtɛ́má, mu bítétényíki bɛsana.
56001009	Mu ŋá nyɛmána mu obíínjie na makɛ́nda ɔ ɔlátɛ́na ambányɛ yí nyiékúnyi eyí bé ŋeé muúmu eékúnyíki, aáná muáŋa mu ɔbá tɔ́na na makɛ́nda me okíndísíki bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ ne nyiínyi, mu tóŋgínyi bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ anyía baacɔ e bé ŋe bú núusi nyiékúnyi eényí á bɔ́ŋa a nyɛnana.
56001010	Yááŋa anyía baacɔ beéŋí á bɔ́ŋa na aatɔ́ ɔnata, bé ŋe bú néŋe baacɔ tɔ́na na bɛsana bɛ́ buála a bɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ. Bá bɔ́ŋa hɔlákáhɔ́láka ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ ci belumitinine Yésus a bá ŋa bɔ́ aamba anyía belumitinine bekime ŋá bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔbɛ́ácáka.
56001011	Bá ŋá bɔ́ nyɛmána bé o beébe kuéyíki eété anyía bé ŋe bú túŋulinyi baacɔ bekime bé meébe ma baacɔ a mɔ́mɔtɛ́, bé ŋe bú eékúnyi bɛsana a bɛ́ tɛ ŋá nyɛmána anyía bábɔ́ nyíákɛ́na baacɔ e menjiŋé.
56001012	Aáná ɔɔcɔ a wɔmɔtɛ́ u Kɛlɛtɛ awɔ́ u ŋaá bá muabɔ́ muhémúnyi bɛsana ŋa kɔ́ɔ́náka ɔsɛ: «Baacɔ bá Kɛlɛtɛ ábɔ báka ne munéŋéne ekúlú ekime, bá ŋa bɔ́ sáama háyɛ ɛnyama cí biciké, beébe ne butise, bá bɛ́tááka hú ɔnyíá.»
56001013	Asana ayɛ́ ú ŋaa kɔ́ɔ́náka áŋa taaká; buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, búle beébe oókísíki ne esise ekime anyía bá látákɛ́na bɔmbányɛ bɛsana bí olumitinine.
56001014	Bá tɛ háná bíínjie na ɔ ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma na ɔ ɔlátɛ́na tuhélúméke tɔ́ buáyá tú Besuif, bá tɛ háná látɛ́na esúŋe cá baacɔ e bé ŋe bú kínéke ɔlátɛ́na taaká.
56001015	Bɔkɔ bukime áŋa bufúúménénú a baacɔ a bá bɔ́ŋa befúúménénú. Ta bɔkɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ tɛ á bá bufúúménénú a baacɔ a bá tɛ abɔ́ bá befúúménénú; na ciabɔ́ injiŋé ne hííbú hɛcɔɔ́cɔ́ hɛ́ ɔtɛ́má ŋeé beébe nyɛkɛtɛna hú ɔ ɔkɛla bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana, bá tɛ lɔ́kɔ́ma aatɔ́ ɔlama.
56001016	Bé ŋe húlé ábɔ́ bɛ́kɔɔna anyía bé ŋe bú menyi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, yiíye anyía bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana abɛ́ bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛla ŋo tóŋínyi anyía bé ti ŋé bú wuúci menyi buúse bukime. Bá bɔ́ŋa na aatɔ́ ɔnata, bá kɛ́laka bɛsana e bí ti ŋé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, beébe tɛ́ka na makɛ́nda ma ɔkɛlaka asana a yambányɛ ta hú ɔ́mɔtɛ́.
56002001	Mbá ɔɔ́wɔ a aháŋá, eékúnyíki baacɔ bɛsana a bɛ́áŋa háyɛ ambányɛ yí nyiékúnyi ŋa yáamba.
56002002	A laakɛna bilunyí bɛ́ banɔ́mɔcɔ́ anyía bá nyɛánáka olóŋólóŋó, bá bámɔ́kɔ́na na ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, aáná baacɔ ké búle ebú beébe kéke; bá bámɔ́kɔ́na ne injiŋé a bɛɛtɔ́, bé bíínjíékíne na makɛ́nda o olumitinine noómi, ne o oléne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́, ne o oweéhínyínyi tɔ́na bɛsana.
56002003	Laákɛ́na tɔ́na bilunyí bí beénjú anyía bíé líhéke ambányɛ yí olíhe e yí ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bé ti oótóko bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́, bá tɛ bɛ́cáŋáka bɛɔ́lɛ́ bí meluku; bá ŋá bɔ́ nyɛmána bé owiínjíékíne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bɛmbányɛ bí ilébé,
56002004	anyía bébú eékúnyíki indíkíné cí beénjú na anyána bá bɔ́ŋa bé olénéke na báábɔ́ banɔ́mɛ na báábɔ́ baáná,
56002005	na anyána bá bɔ́ŋa bá ɔbá ne injiŋé a bɛɛtɔ́, bó bítétényi ɔ ɔkanda ú nɔháatɛ́. Bá ŋa bɔ́ nyɛmána bé obíínjie ɔ ɔkɛla masɔ́ma me ciíbe, beébe na bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ ɛtɛ́má, bá lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na báábɔ́ banɔ́mɛ anyía ɔɔcɔ tɛ bábɛ́na Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
56002006	Lébéke tɔ́na bɛnɔ́kɔ́ anyía bá bámɔ́kɔ́na ne injiŋé a bɛɛtɔ́
56002007	a bɛsana bikime. Kuɔŋɔ́ tɔ́na, kɛláka hú bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana, anyía mbá baacɔ ké búle abɔ́ ɔ látɛ́na a nyɛkɛla; eékúnyíki baacɔ nyiékúnyi a nyɛ́ á nyɛmána.
56002008	Bɛsana ebí o ŋoó weékúnyi á bámɔ́kɔ́na taaká, tɛ́ka ne buhúnyi bɔ́ ɔbábákɛ́na; aáná baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ áamba ɔ basɔ́ táŋɛ́na ká bɔ́ bá na aatɔ́ ɔlama, beébe tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma hɛ́ ɔ basɔ́ túme.
56002009	Laákɛ́na bɛɔ́lɛ́ anyía bá lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na ekúlú ekime báábɔ́ baáŋá a bɛsana bikime, bá kɛ́laka bɛsana e bí ŋeé bíléníne baáŋá eébé, bé ti suŋúnyínyi ne beébe,
56002010	bé ti beébe hiitékíne bɛnyɛ́ma a nyɛnamba; mbá, bá ŋá bɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔkɛlaka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana e bí ŋo tóŋínyi báábɔ́ baáŋá anyía bá bɔ́ŋa baacɔ bɔ́ mɔŋɔlɛ́. Aáná baacɔ ké bú kékéke bɛsana ebí tu ŋe sú éékúnyi, biíbi bɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, muasɔ́ Munohi.
56002011	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa námbɔ́nɛ́na baacɔ anyía yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo, a yááŋa indíné cɛ nyɛnɔhɔ, áŋa eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ bekime.
56002012	Yááyɛ́ yaála yí nuubo eéyé ŋaá basɔ́ eékúnyi anyía túásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na ne injiŋé a bɛɛtɔ́, túɔ́ nyɛánáka ɔlátɛ́na na aabɛ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, na bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci; tu kɛlaka bɛsana a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ e bí ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a hɛɛya eehi.
56002013	Túé líhéke aáná, tu tátáka na mɔŋɔlɛ́ yaandándá yɛ́ buɔ́sɛ́ bú obíléne eébú; buúbu muasɔ́ Munohi Yésus Kilís ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na a núáyɛ́ nuúmi; wáŋa ciasɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a wáŋa waáŋá.
56002014	U ŋaá fááya, yó koó bíínjie wuúci bɛ́muátá a yáásɔ́ asana anyía wá basɔ́ háŋɔ́náka a buɔ́lɛ́ bɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́, yɔ́ basɔ́ fúúmínyi a búáyɛ́ buúse, túɔ́ bɛ́cáŋáka bááyɛ́ baacɔ e bé me bú bíínjie o búle kɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana.
56002015	Bɛsana eébí ɔ́ɔ nyɛmána wu o búle laana baacɔ, é beébe lébéke ne biíbi, é beébe oókísíki na bɔɔcɔ abɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋo yóo wiínjíé. Eti lumítíne anyía ɔɔcɔ ɔ́ɔ bábákɛ́na.
56003001	Bítéésíki belumitinine bekime anyía bá lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na ne betéŋínyi bunɔŋɔ na kɔ́mɛ́na áyá, bá kɛláka bɛsana ebí bé ŋe bú beébe laana, bé lénéke o búle kɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana bikime.
56003002	Bé ti óóto ɔɔcɔ, bá tɛ aamba ɛsáká, beébe mbuumu cɛ́ baacɔ na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, bé líhéke e mbuumu na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́.
56003003	Yááŋa anyía ta basɔ́ tɔ́na, tu ŋa sɔ́ bá buáyá tɛ́ka ne injiŋé, basɔ́ na bɛɛtɔ́ ɔnata, basɔ́ benyíménú taaká ci ohónyí; tu ŋa sɔ́ bá bɛɔ́lɛ́ bɛ́ bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana a bɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ hámɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má, tu líhéke a nyɛŋána noómi, basɔ́ na yaáká yí eése, tu bébékíne baacɔ, tu liŋekenene basɔ́ na basɔ́.
56003004	Mbá ekúlú ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, muasɔ́ Munohi, ŋeé tóŋínyi na yááyɛ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, ne nyiléne enyí u ŋeé léne baacɔ buéŋí,
56003005	u ŋaá basɔ́ nóhíki etémbí ne etémbí; tɛ́ cáŋa anyía tu ŋa sɔ́ kɛ́láka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana, mbá u ŋaá basɔ́ nóhíki anyía u ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́cáma mahana, a nyɛsua anyɛ́ u ŋaá súáka maasɔ́ maabɛ́, yó fúúmíkínyi cíísú ɛtɛ́má ne menyífé a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé, anyía túésú bíbíénútúne yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí nyibíbíéne, túɔ́ bá na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe.
56003006	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ iínjíé Efúúménénú yí Elilé, yó yiíyi nyíóyísi e cíísú ɛtɛ́má hú mbiɔ́kɛ e elime cɛ muasɔ́ Munohi Yésus Kilís,
56003007	anyía mbá túásɔ́ bá na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ma ɔbɔ́ŋɔ yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime; u ŋaá basɔ́ bóósíki, yɔ́ kɛ́la anyía túásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ eéyé eé buúse.
56003008	Mehúnyi eémé áŋa taaká cí mehúnyi. Bú ŋeé mi bíléníne anyía óo woónyísíkínyi ɔlaana baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía bé búle kɛ́la bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana. Yááŋa anyía ɔkɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana áŋa ɔmbányɛ, ú ŋɔ yɔɔ́lɔ baacɔ bekime.
56003009	Ta híáná, sámbáka isuŋí cí etémbí ne etémbí a cɛ́ ŋa lɛca ɔfana eénye cá baacɔ bá tɔnyɛ́nɔ́, sámbáka tɔ́na isuŋí a cɛ́ ŋa lɛca bikotí bí Moyís; atɛ sááka na baacɔ i isuŋí ikime eécí. Bɛsana eébí áŋa etémbí, bɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ baacɔ.
56003010	Ɔɔcɔ éé héléne etuŋulinyi a yɛ́ ŋa kɛla anyía belumitinine aálɔ́nákána, wuúci óókísi bikúlú bífendí, e elime eécí wuúci baká.
56003011	Kuɔŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá, o ŋoó menyi anyía nyɛnamá nyɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eényí a yáaŋa nyɛbɛ́áhɛ́nánɔ́ e eciké noómi, nyɛ́ ŋa cɔ́ba ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́, bɛsana abɛ́ u ŋa kɛla tóŋgínyi anyía wáŋa a nyɛkua noómi.
56003012	Isíʼo Tite, ɛkákɛ́la yámɛ́ ɔ tɔ́mɛ́na Aatɛ́mas ta anyía Tisíke, mbá a bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na ɔfaaya, á ka mɛ́ kuana a Nikobolis; ɛ ŋaá mɛ bɛ́táá anyía hɔ́á i ké ké mi limine ekúlú yí buume.
56003013	Aambáka ohónyí wú ɔwɔɔ́lɛ́ta na Sɛ́nas muékúnyi bikotí na Abólos a asana ne úúbú ɔkanda, anyía bɔkɔ ti beébe bɛ́ámbɛ́na.
56003014	Belumitinine bá Kɛlɛtɛ ŋá bɔ́ nyɛmána tɔ́na bá ɔbɛ́hákɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi anyána bá bɔ́ŋa bé o búle kɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana ɔ ɔwɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ baacɔ abá bɛnyɛ́ma ŋeé beébe bɛ́ámbɛ́na. Aáná nyíábɔ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na káá bá na nyiɔ́lɔ nyiéŋí.
56003015	Baacɔ bekime a bá bɔ́ŋa aaha na yaŋɔ́ ŋe bú o téŋí. Téŋíki báásɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine bekime. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sayábákɛ́naʼo.
57001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, ɛ ŋaá mɛ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ nufule eenu. Ya mɛ́ŋa eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná a asana yí Yésus Kilís; na yaŋɔ́ ne uusú onyíinyí Timoté tú ŋa sɔ́ ɔ wɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, kuɔŋɔ́ yáásɔ́ ekendinyi yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má Filemɔ́ŋ awɔ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ nyiɔ buólí bɔ́mɔtɛ́.
57001002	Tu ŋa sɔ́ ɔɔ́ŋɛ́na tɔ́na ne uusú onyíinyí e woónjú Abiya, na Alésibe yáásɔ́ ekendinyi yí biité, na hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine Kilís a hɛ́ náŋa hɛ́á bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ oówo eé ciíbe.
57001003	Na cíásɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís bá banɔ́ sáyábákɛ́na, bá banɔ́ iínjiekine mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi.
57001004	Filemɔ́ŋ, ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ ɔ bɛ́táá, i wuúci iínjíékíne bitéŋíti ɔ yɔ́ɔ́wɔ asana,
57001005	anyía ɛ ŋaá mɛ lɔ́kɔ́máka bé bíkétíki anyía o ŋoó léne baháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ bekime, a hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ tɔ́na né Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus.
57001006	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ báta Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía wá kɛla anyía nyɛlatana anyɛ́ ɔ ɔ́ŋa na basɔ́ o olumitinine noómi á kɛla anyía túésú ményi bɔmbányɛ bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime abɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa ne biíbi o olíhe ewú tu ŋe sú líhe a asana ne Kilís.
57001007	Onyíinyí, ɛ ŋaá mɛ bá háyɛ nyitíne nyí bilúŋe, ɔtɛ́má yɔ́ mɛ kua a tɔɔna noómi a asana ne nyiléne enyí o ŋoó léne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ belumitinine, e beébe kíndísíki ɛtɛ́má.
57001008	Yaátɛ́ asana ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía ya mɛ́ŋa na makɛ́nda ma ɔ kuɔŋɔ́ laana bɔkɔ a bɔmbányɛ abɔ́ ɔ́ɔ nyɛmána wu ɔkɛlaka e nyimónjóló anyɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa ne Kilís,
57001009	bú ŋaá hɔ́la o mi bíléníne anyía yámɛ ɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na a asana a yɛ́mɔtɛ́ anyía o ŋoó léne baacɔ: Yaŋɔ́ Bóol, elunyí yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ, yaŋɔ́ oócí aámbáya eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná a asana ne Yésus Kilís,
57001010	ɛ ŋaá mɛ́ ɔ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na a asana ne Onesime, uumi ɔɔ́nɔ́ ewú i ŋe mí bíéne né Yésus Kilís, yaŋɔ́ eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná.
57001011	Wuúci u tɛ ɔ́mɔɔ́ bá wu ɔ yɔ́ɔ wɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ buúse bukime, mbá aámbáya wáŋa na nyiɔ́lɔ nyiéŋí aá basɔ́ bekime béfendí.
57001012	Ícíoci í me mí hélúmúnyi ɔ kuɔŋɔ́ tɔ́mɛ́na. Wáŋa háyɛ úúmi ɔtɛ́má.
57001013	Ɛ ŋáa mɛ bá we olénéke anyía wɔ́ɔ lɔ́bɔ aaha na yaŋɔ́, u mɛ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ ɔɔ́wɔ a aháŋá ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ ya mɛ́ŋa aaha eé ciíbe cɛ ɛcaná a asana na Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma.
