59001020	Yááŋa anyía ekúlú ayɛ́ ɔɔcɔ ŋá lɔ́kɔ́ma hilóbi, u tɛ ŋáá kɛ́la bɛsana e bí ŋé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
59001021	A yaátɛ́ asana, ánɔ nyɛanáka ɔkɛla na bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ na anamánamá cá bɛsana cá nyɛŋána. Énu bílóósíki eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, núó lumitinine bíáyɛ́ bɛsana abɛ́ u ŋa háya e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi; biíbi bɛ́áŋa bɛ́ ɔ banɔ́ nóhiki.
59001022	Nuti bínéŋéke banɔ́ bɛ́muátá ɔ ɔlɔ́kɔ́máka bɔ lɔ́kɔ́máka Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, mbá énu biíbi látákɛ́na.
59001023	Yááŋa anyía ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋa lɔ́kɔ́ma bɔ lɔ́kɔ́ma Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, u ti biíbi látɛ́na, ŋaá hɔ́á ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋa bɛ́lɛ́ca buúse o oólí háyɛ búáŋa.
59001024	Ekúlú ayɛ́ ú ma bɛ́lɛ́cáka buúse aáná, u ŋá hɔ́la, yɔ́ bɛ́hɔ́ya ɔ ɔbɛ́hɔ́ya háyɛ búáyɛ́ buúse áŋa.
59001025	Mbá ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋa yáakɔ́nɛ́na bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, u biíbi óónyísíkínyi ɔlátɛ́na, tɛ́ cáŋa hú bɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka, mbá u bɛ́hɔ́ya e elime, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kéé wuúci sayabakɛna a bɛsana bikime abɛ́ u ŋa kɛ́la. Yááŋa anyía bikotí eébí áŋa tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma, bɛ́áŋa bɛ́ ɔ basɔ́ kátɔ́náka a bɔɔbɛ́.
59001026	Mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋa bɛ́táá anyía wáŋa mulumitinine mbá u ti tétényi nyíáyɛ́ nyuúté ɔ ɔtáŋa bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana, u ŋe bínéŋe. Yááŋa anyía u ŋa kɔ́ɔna ɔsɛ u ŋaá látɛ́na bikotí bí olumitinine, mbá bɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔ́ɔ́lɔ ta bɔkɔ.
59001027	Taaká ci efúúménénú yí olumitinine eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ awɔ́ ú tɛ á bá ne ehíŋe, ícíoci wáŋa anyía: Na ɔwaamba ohónyí ú otétényíki ne cuuné cɛ́ banásɛ́ ne bisíké bí beénjú e muuyé, ne obíkíilie bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci o otibítífíle.
59002001	Baláamɛ, banɔ́ ebé nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís a wáŋa ne nuúmi ɔ ɔhɔla, nɔtɛ kɛlákɛ́na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ mebeé.
59002002	Túá kɔɔ́na anyía baacɔ béfendí me bú oofine ekúlú ɔ́mɔtɛ́ aanɔ́ a nyɛbɛ́bándána. Ɔmɔtɛ́ eé beébe ɛnɔ́mɛ cɛ ɔɔcɔ, na nɔbánda nú kóolo a hɛnɔɔ́nɔ́ hɛ́ ɔɔbɔ́, na bɛlaŋa bɛ́ mɔɔnyɛ́ meéŋí aá cɛɛ́tɔ; a wɔmɔtɛ́ hɛsɔ́kásɔ́ka hɛ́ ɔɔcɔ, ne bilunénú bɛ́ bɛlaŋa.
59002003	Aáná, mbɔ́kɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ aá banɔ́ ŋeé kéke ɔ ɔhɔla ɔɔcɔ u bɛlaŋa bɛ́ mɔɔnyɛ́, yó wuúci laana ɔsɛ: «Taatá, limíne aaha e nyilimíné nyɛ́ bɔɔcɔ eenyi.» Mbá u laana hɛsɔ́kásɔ́ka hɛ́ ɔɔcɔ ɔsɛ: «Kuɔŋɔ́, baabá eeye, ká ka tálɛ́mɛ́na ehenyíé», ta anyía «Ká ka bɛ́nyɔ́kɔ́lɛ́ána ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ehenyíé»;
59002004	mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ aá banɔ́ ŋáá kɛ́láka aáná, tɛ́ka ɛ́cɛ anyía u ŋa kɛ́lɛna bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ mebeé e? Tɛ́ka mutáfána eémú muáŋa e mú ŋé húle a bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ ɛbɛ́táá e?
59002005	Benyíinyí bá ɔtɛ́má, yááŋa anyíaʼo, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá táfáka eebe a bá bɔ́ŋa tɔsɔ́kásɔ́ka eé buúse bɔ́ baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci anyía bábɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na ɛnɔ́mɛ o olumitinine eeyé eé buúse, mbá bé oofine eeyé e Butéŋí abɔ́ u ŋaá bɛ́tánɛ́ná baacɔ e bé ŋé bú wuúci léne.
59002006	Mbá ta híáná banɔ́, nu ŋa nɔ́ bábɛ́na basɔ́kásɔ́ka. Yaŋɔ́ ɛsɛ ɛnɔ́mɛ cɛ́ baacɔ náŋa cɛ́ á banɔ́ tékeseke, cɛ́ banɔ́ télímíkínyi a akála e?
59002007	Ɔ́kɔ, tɛ́ka beébe tɔ́na naŋa bábɔ́ cáŋgɛna yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yí nyiínyi eeye yí belumitinine Kilís ayɛ́ bá ŋaá banɔ́ iínjie e?
59002008	Ɛ́ɛ, nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la bɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔlátɛ́na okotí a yɛ́ á hɔ́la bikotí bikime. Yiíyi yɛ́áŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ a Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ noómi anyía: «Lénéke sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ háyɛ ciɔwɔ cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ bɛ́muátá».
59002009	Mbá, mbɔ́kɔ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ mebeé, nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la bɔɔbɛ́ anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bɔnɔkɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
59002010	Yááŋa anyía, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋa látɛ́na bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bikime ŋé kúféténe hú o okotí ɔmɔtɛ́, wa yáaŋa na nyɛkua e bikotí bikime eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
59002011	Yááŋa anyía hú waáta ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ awɔ́ u ŋá kɔ́ɔ́na anyía: «Atɛ kandáka tusɔmɔ», hú wuúci tɔ́na ú ŋaa kɔ́ɔna anyía: «Ta hú ɔwɔɔ́nɔ ». Aáná, ta hú ɔkanda tusɔmɔ ɔ́ɔ kandáka, ta hú ɔwɔɔ́nɔ ɔ́ɔ wɔɔ́nɔ ɔɔcɔ, ɔ́ mɔɔ́ caŋgɛna bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
59002012	Yaátɛ́ asana, na a bɛsana abɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la na a bɛsana bikime abɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ táŋa, énu menyí anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ kélísíki e bikotí a bɛ́áŋa bíɔ basɔ́ kátɔ́naka a bɔɔbɛ́.
59002013	Mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ tɛ ŋá bɛ́cáma bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ mahana, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tí ké wuúci bɛ́cáma mahana ekúlú eyí u kéé wuúci kélísíki. Mbá, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋa bɛ́cáma bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ mahana, u tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ nyɛ́mana wu olíkíméke nyɛkála.
59002014	Baláamɛ, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ ŋá kɔ́ɔ́na bɔ kɔɔna ne nyuúté anyía wáŋa mulumitinine Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, wuúci tɛ́ka ne mekilíkínyí, bú ŋɔ yɔ́ɔlɔ aátɛ́ e? Anyána nyɛnamá nyí olumitinine eényí áŋa nyí o wuúci ɔɔ́lɛ́ta e?
59002015	Yáakɛlá mulumitinine a mumɔtɛ́ áŋa aáhá a muáŋa onuti etémbí, muúmu tɛ́ka tɔ́na na bɔkɔ bú ɔnyíáka mɔɔ́sɛ́ mekime;
59002016	mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ aá banɔ́ é muúmu laána anyía: «Oóʼo, a cɔba bɔmbányɛ; bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na ɔbɔ́ŋɔ na bɛlaŋa na bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá», mbá u ti muúmu iínjíé bɛnyɛ́ma e bí ŋe muúmu bɛ́ámbɛ́na, bú ŋɔ yɔɔ́lɔ aátɛ́ e?
59002017	Híáná tɔ́na olumitinine áŋa; mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋá kɔ́ɔ́na bɔ kɔɔna anyía wáŋa ne olumitinine ɔ ɔtɛ́má, wuúci tɛ́ka ne mekilíkínyí, olumitinine oócí áŋa owéénú buúse bukime.
59002018	Asana ɔmɔtɛ́, ɔɔcɔ a wɔmɔtɛ́ áŋa wu ɔlaana sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ anyía «O ŋoó lumitinine, mbá yaŋɔ́ ya mɛ́ŋa ne mekilíkínyí». I ké mi wuúci bɛ́káma ɛsɛ́: «Mi tóŋínyi uuwe olumitinine awɔ́ ú tɛ á bá ne mekilíkínyí, mbá yémi o tóŋínyi maamɛ mekilíkínyí e mé ŋe húle e uumi olumitinine».
59002019	Ɔ nɔŋɔ oó lumitekine anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa hú wuúci ɔmɔtɛ́. Búáŋa bɔmbányɛ aáná; ta bɛɛbɛ́ bí bililé ŋe bú lúmitine tɔ́na aáná, bá ndándamaka ne bulíkílíki.
59002020	Mbá kuɔŋɔ́, yaála yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ ! Ɔ ŋɔɔ́ waámba anyía yémi o tóŋínyi anyía olumitinine awɔ́ ú tɛ a bá ne mekilíkínyí tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ buúse bukime e?
59002021	Bɛ́táá asana yɛ́ Abɛ́laham ciasɔ́ sɔ́kɔ́nɔ́, anyána Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaa kɛ́la anyía wá bá atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eeyé eé buúse anyía u ŋa sɛ́ wé wuúci bɛ́sámbɛ́na uuyé ɔɔ́nɔ́ Isak.
59002022	Ɔ ŋɔɔ́ lɛca anyía ne olumitinine ne mekilíkínyí ŋe bú kendikinyi e? Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ mekilíkínyí ŋo nyióyísínyi bɔmbányɛ uúye olumitinine.
59002023	Aáná yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ anyía: «Abɛ́laham ŋaá háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé wuúci hiíte háyɛ atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eeyé eé buúse, yó wuúci lɔ́ŋɛ́ta anyía yááyɛ́ ekendinyi.»
59002024	Menyí bɔmbányɛ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá kɛla anyía ɔɔcɔ okime á bá atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eeyé eé buúse a asana na maayɛ́ mekilíkínyí ɔlata tɔ́na ne uúye olumitinine.
59002025	Bɛ́táá tɔ́na asana yɛ́ Láháb, okendí u oónjú. U ŋeé tétényíki ɛndɔ́ma cí Besuif a cɛ́ ŋgaá hámá e uuyé ooki, yó beébe káha, u ŋé beébe óólísi o ohónyí wú etémbí. Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaa kɛla anyía wá bá atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eeyé eé buúse anyía maayɛ́ mekilíkínyí.
59002026	Aáná yááŋa anyíaʼo, háyɛ cɛɛ́tɔ ikime a cɛ́ tɛ á bá tɔ́na na hɛtányɛ́ áŋa iwéénú, híáná tɔ́na olumitinine okime awɔ́ ú tɛ á bá ne mekilíkínyí áŋa owéénú.
59003001	Baláamɛ, bú tɛ a bá bɔmbányɛ anyía núánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na beéŋí o oweékúnyi baacɔ, anyía basɔ́ ebé tú ŋe sú eékúnyi bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́, bá káá basɔ́ kélisiki na nyɛŋána ɔ ɔhɔla baacɔ bé etémbí.
59003002	Basɔ́ bekime, tu naŋa tuásɔ́ nánaka anamá ekime. Mbá, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ a wɔmɔtɛ́ ti ŋéé bífúnjúlítíne asana ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋaá táŋa, wáŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ, u tɛ á bá na hɛkɔma; wáŋa na ɔtɛ́má wú obítétényíki bɔmbányɛ wuúci okime.
59003003	Ɛ naŋa tuasɔ́ hákɛ́na hiléŋúléŋú e nyuúté nyɛ́ ciátɛ cɛ ambala anyía cɛ́ a basɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na. Aáná tua sɔ́ŋa tú o ciíci kendiki háyɛ tu ŋe sú léne.
59003004	Ánɔ lɛ́ca tɔ́na sitíme; ta cɛ á yááŋánáka anyána, ta nyɛnamá nyí ehúne nyɛ́ yaátɛ́ é ciíci nyɛkɛtakɛna, ɛ naŋa bé ciíci kendiki haála hekime ehé bé ŋe léne anyía cí é súéte hú na hɛnyɛ́mányɛ́má hɛ́ hɔ́á noómi.
59003005	Híáná yááŋa tɔ́na na nɔbɛ́mbɛ, núáŋa hɛláŋáláŋa a cɛɛ́tɔ cɛ ɔɔcɔ. Asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, nú náŋa núá sánáka ɛŋɔ́nɔ a bɛsana abɛ́ nú náŋa núá kɛlaka. Ánɔ bɛ́táá tɔ́na anyía ciaŋalaŋanda ci oocó ɛ́mɔtɛ́ naŋa cɛá mána oluli yaandándá yɛ́ atúalɔ́, hú táákɔ !
59003006	Yááŋa anyía nɔbɛ́mbɛ áŋa iŋetí ci oocó, nú me límine aasɔ́ a cɛɛ́tɔ noómi eé buúse bɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́; nɔ́ ŋa cáŋɛna cɛɛ́tɔ ikime, nú lúliki olíhe okimekime ú ɔɔcɔ. Oocó oócí ŋeé húle a nɔɔfia nú oocó a wɔ́áŋa bɛ́muátá noómi.
59003007	Ɔɔcɔ áŋa na makɛ́nda me otétényíki anamá cá ɛnyama cí biciké ikime, cí wuúci lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na, ne cé tunonyí, na cá mɔɔ́hɔ, na cá tuɔfɔ́ tɔ́ nuɔmɔ́ nɔ́ makɛ́lɛ́ áyá; wa yáa báka o otétényi aáná.
59003008	Mbá ta ɔɔcɔ ti ŋé tétényi núáyɛ́ nɔbɛ́mbɛ ta buɔ́sɛ́ anyía núe wuúci lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na. Nɔbɛ́mbɛ áŋa nɔɔbɛ́, nú ti ŋé límine mbuumu; núáŋa nunyíóyónú na hɛlɔkɔ a hɛ́ ŋɔ yɔɔ́nɔ́nɔ.
59003009	Na nɔbɛ́mbɛ ɛ náŋa tuesú nyémikinyi ciasɔ́ Síkíne Otéŋí a Waáŋá; ne nuúnu tɔ́na tu ŋe sú íinjie inyomí a baacɔ abá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe kétíki a cíáyɛ́ ihúényínyí.
59003010	Nyuúté nyɛ́mɔtɛ́ e nyí ŋe nyémi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nyiínyi tɔ́na nyí ŋe hémúnyi inyomí. Baláamɛ, tɛ́ cáŋa aáná !
59003011	Hicéme tɛ a kɛ́la hí o hemúkúnyi ekúlú ɔ́mɔtɛ́ ne menyífé a mambányɛ e mé ŋoo sóomo, ne menyífé a maabɛ́ a má ŋaá nua.
59003012	Baláamɛ, indíné ci butoli tɛ ŋáá háá tɔlɔndɔ, te indíné cɛ bɔhásɔ́ tɛ háá bitoli. Hicéme hí menyífé a mááŋa na makɛ́lɛ́ tɛ a bá hí ohémúkúnyi menyífé a má tɛ a kɛla na makɛ́lɛ́.
59003013	Mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ a wɔmɔtɛ́ aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ áŋa ne injiŋé ne omenyi, wé tóŋínyi baacɔ aná na ciayɛ́ injiŋé a yááyɛ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, ne úúyé obílóosi ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ tɔ́na.
59003014	Mbá, mbɔ́kɔ nua nɔ́ŋa na hiɔkɔtɛ́má na ɔtɛ́má ú bɛhɔnɔnɔ, nuti bíbéétíki anyía nua nɔ́ŋa ne injiŋé na ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, nɔtɛ sɔ́mbáka bɛfala e bí ŋe nuusi taaká.
59003015	Nyɛnamá nyí injiŋé eényí ti ŋéé húle ɔ Ɔmuaná, mbá nyí ŋeé húle ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́. Nyɛ́áŋa nyɛ́ baacɔ bé imehú, nyí ŋeé húle a bɛɛbɛ́ bí bililé.
59003016	Yááŋa anyía haála hekime ahá na hiɔkɔtɛ́má na ɔtɛ́má ú bɛhɔnɔnɔ áŋa, ne hikókó áŋa hɔ́á nyɛnamá nyikime na anamánamá cá bɛsana a cɛɛbɛ́ tɔ́na.
59003017	Mbá ɔɔcɔ a wáŋa ne injiŋé e cí ŋe húle ɔ Ɔmuaná tɛ á bá aáná; wáŋa ofúúménénú, na ɔtɛ́má mbuumu; wáŋa ehúúménénú yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ, u fanakɛna bɛsana, u bɛ́cámáka bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ mahana, u naŋa wáá kɛ́laka bɛsana a bɛmbányɛ; wuúci tɛ́ka te ne mebeé ta na tɔbɛ́mbɛ túfendí.
59003018	Baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ aamba anyía mbuumu á bámɔ́kɔ́na ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ baacɔ naŋa bébú míékine buohó bɔ́ atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yí olíhe e mbuumu noómi.
59004001	Aátɛ́ yí ŋe héléne na ɛcálɛ na ɛsáká aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ e? Ɔ́kɔ, tɛ́ka ɛbɛ́táá a cɛɛbɛ́ a cɛ́ ŋá nua ciíci ne ciíci aanɔ́ ɛ ɛtɛ́má e?
59004002	Bɛnyɛ́ma a bɛ́mɔtɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ hámɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má mbá nu ti ŋé nu biíbi bɔ́ŋɔ: Yaátɛ́ asana nua nɔ́ŋa hoóhi na ɔwɔɔ́nɔ́kɔ́nɔ́nɔ. Nua nɔ́ŋa na ɛcaná ɛ ɛtɛ́má a bɛnyɛ́ma a bɛ́mɔtɛ́, mbá nu tɛ anɔ́ bá na makɛ́nda me o biíbi bɔ́ŋgɔ́na; yaátɛ́ asana nu ŋa nɔ́ sáá ɛsáká, nu nuaka macálɛ. Nu tɛ anɔ́ bá nu ɔbɔ́ŋɔ bɔkɔ, anyía nu tɛ ŋá nɔ́ báta ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
59004003	Mbɔ́kɔ nu ŋa nɔ́ báta, u tɛ banɔ́ iínjie; yááŋa anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ báta bɔɔbɛ́, anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ aamba ɔbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na bɛnyɛ́ma eébí bikime háyɛ bú ŋaá banɔ́ bíléníne e cíínú ɛtɛ́má.
59004004	Banɔ́ bakanda tusɔmɔ eebe ! Nu ŋe nú ményi bɔmbányɛ anyía ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ á táka bukendinyi na bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ áŋa muliŋine mɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Aáná ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa látɛ́na bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ a yáaŋa o oliŋine Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
59004005	Tɛ́ cáŋa etémbí yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ anyía: «Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé léne buéŋí Elilé ayɛ́ u ŋaá basɔ́ iínjie, u yiíyi kɛlakɛna yɔɔtɛ.»
59004006	Mbá ta híáná, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ bóósi buéŋí ɔ ɔhɔla; yááŋa yɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ tɔ́na anyía «Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé núusi baacɔ e bé ŋe bú bíbééti, mbá u ŋo bóósi eebe e bé ŋe bú bílóosi ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́.»
59004007	Yaátɛ́ asana ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Énu nuusiki Musɔ́mɛ́na, aáná mu káá banɔ́ cábakɛna haaca.
59004008	Énu bíkósíki ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, aáná u kéé bíkósíti tɔ́na náánɔ́. Banɔ́ bakɛla maabɛ́ abá nua nɔ́ŋa ne ibíkéti ífendí, ánɔ bɛ́súáka aabá, cé fúúméne; ánɔ aáŋíáka maabɛ́ e ciínú ɛtɛ́má noómi.
59004009	Ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́máka ɛtɛ́má ɔnua, núé limékíne a bɛcala, nɔ lɛlaka tɔ́na. Nɔtɛ háná cɛ́ca, mbá ánɔ lɛláka. Nɔtɛ háná bíléne mbá ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́máka ɛtɛ́má ɔnua.
59004010	Énu bílóósíki eé buúse bú Otéŋí a Waáŋá, aáná u káá banɔ́ béétíki.
59004011	Banɔ́ báámɛ benyíinyí, nuti ótókónóno banɔ́ na banɔ́. Ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ŋo yóoto sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ ta anyía u ŋe wuúci bábɛ́na, hú bikotí ú ŋo yoóto, u biíbi bábákɛ́na tɔ́na. Yááŋa anyía, mbɔ́kɔ ɔ ŋɔɔ́ bábɛ́na bikotí, ɛ́cɛ o ti ŋóo biíbi látɛ́na; o ŋoó biíbi bábɛ́na bɔ́ bábɛ́na.
59004012	Hú Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bímuócí u ŋe télímínyi bikotí, wuúci bímuócí tɔ́na wáŋa wu okélísíki baacɔ, wuúci bímuócí wáŋa na makɛ́nda me o beébe nohiki, te me o beébe ɔ́ɔ́nɔ́kɔ. Mbá kuɔŋɔ́ anáʼo, ɔ ŋɔɔ́ bɛ́táá anyía ɔ ɔ́ŋa aányɛ́ awɔ́ ɔ ŋɔɔ́ bábɛ́na sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ e?
59004013	Ɛ́náʼo, aá banɔ́ baacɔ abá nú ŋa nɔ́ kɔ́ɔna anyía ta hɛ́nánɔ, ta nɔɔyá nu ká nɔ́ cɔ́baka o okolímekine a bálɛ́ka a cɛ́mɔtɛ́ hiɔŋɔ hikimekime ɔ ɔkɔkɛla onduné, nɔ́ hɔ́máka mɔɔnyɛ́ meéŋí;
59004014	mbá aá banɔ́, aányɛ́ u ŋe ményi nɔɔyá e? Uúnú olíhe áŋa aátɛ́ e? Uúnú olíhe áŋa háyɛ olúkúlúku a wáŋa wáá hámɔ́kɔ́na hikúlúkúlú, wɔ́ mána.
59004015	Yaátɛ́ asana nu ŋá nɔ́ nyɛ́mána nú ɔkɔɔnaka anyía mbɔ́kɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé lénéke, yɔ́ banɔ́ iínjie olíhe ɔcaha, nu ká nɔ́ kɛlaka bɔkɔ eebu, ta anyía ebunyíé.
59004016	Aá taaká nu ŋe nú bíbééti, nɔ táŋáka na bumálá bukime; nyɛkɛlaka eényí áŋa nyɛɛbɛ́.
59004017	Yááŋa anyíaʼo, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋe ményi bɔmbányɛ abɔ́ wá nyɛmána wu ɔkɛlaka mbá u ti buúbu kɛlá, u ŋaa kɛla bɔɔbɛ́.
59005001	Ɛ́náʼo, aámbáya, banɔ́ ɛnɔ́mɛ cɛ́ baacɔ ! Ánɔ lɛláka, nu hákɛ́na mukéké a asana ne muuyé amɔ́ nu ká nɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ndɛ́mákánána.
59005002	Búánɔ́ bɔnɔ́mɛ bukime káá cáŋiaka, bíánɔ́ bɛlaŋa bíó fíikeke.
59005003	Maanɔ́ mɔɔnyɛ́ kéé yééŋéke; yeéŋe eéyé áŋa ɛmbasɔ́ cɛ yáánɔ́ aabɛ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na; yí ŋe lúli cíínú imehú háyɛ oocó. Nú ma nɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na ɔbánda bɔnɔ́mɛ ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ eeme a má yáaŋa me nyibíóndísínyi.
59005004	Núo kíneke ɔnama báánɔ́ bɔnyiɔ bisíéné. Ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́máka háyɛ bá ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́bɔ́cɔ́bɔ. Mukéké mɔ baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ bándákɛ́na bíánɔ́ bɛyɔyɛ́ má kaá háma hí e eetú cé Otéŋí a Waáŋá u ɛlɔŋɔ cí biité.
59005005	Nu ŋe nú líhéké ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ na a bɔnɔ́mɛ na a ambányɛ yí olíhe noómi, nu bílénéke, nu bɛ́lɔ́fáka bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bɛ́ ɔnyíá, nu tɔ́lɔ́kɔ háyɛ bitúké bɛ́ ɔwɔɔ́nɔ́kɔ a maŋanda.
59005006	Nu ŋa nɔ́ bɔ́nɔ́sɛ́áka baacɔ, beébe tɛ́ka na ɔnána, nuó beébe ɔ́ɔ́nɔ́kɔ, beébe ta ɔbɛ́hɔ́nɔ́nɔ.
59005007	Baláamɛ, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ láana anyía énu ééhíkínyínyi aáná ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma a nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá. Ánɔ lɛcá hibílícínyínyí na munyiɔ esíéné, mu naŋa mu yeéhíkínyínyi, mɔ́ tátáka anyía na tɔbɔ́lá tú buúse ne tú elime á nááka, tú oónyísíki bɛnyɛ́ma mbá mu bá na bɛmbányɛ́kɛ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔyɛ́.
59005008	Banɔ́ tɔ́na énu ééhíkínyínyi, énu limíne bonyíóyónú ne ciéhíhi anyía nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá a yáaŋa o obíkósi.
59005009	Baláamɛ, ánɔ nyɛánáka ɔsɔ́mɔ́nɔ́nɔ banɔ́ na banɔ́ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ banɔ́ túme hɛkɔma, ánɔ lɛcá mukélísi bɛsana a yáaŋa e buúse bú ehenyi.
59005010	Baláamɛ, ánɔ bɛ́tááka behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a bá ŋa bɔ́ táŋáká eé nyiínyi nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá, énu beébe hɔ́áka; bá ŋa bɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká muuyé, bó weéhíkínyínyi.
59005011	Tu ŋa sɔ́ kɔ́ɔna anyía baacɔ e bé ŋe bú ééhíkínyínyí aáná á bɔ́ŋa bambányɛ. Nu na maá nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka asana yí Sóob anyána u ŋe yééhíkínyínyi muuyé na anyána Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋa kɛ́la anyía múáyɛ́ muuyé é bíóndísínyi a bɔmbányɛ. Yááŋa anyía Otéŋí a Waáŋá áŋa na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, u ŋa bɛ́cáma baacɔ bekime mahana.
59005012	Baláamɛ, ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́ma asana a yɛ́mɔtɛ́ eeye a yɛ́ a hɔ́la bɛsana bikime: Nɔtɛ súátákɛ́na, te eé nyiínyi nyɛ́ Ɔmuaná, ta nyɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́, te eé nyiínyi nyí etémbí a nyɛ́mɔtɛ́. Énu búle kɔ́ɔna hú anyía «Ɛ́ɛ» mbɔ́kɔ «Ɛ́ɛ»; ta anyía «Eéʼeé» mbɔ́kɔ «Eéʼeé»; aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ káá banɔ́ túme hɛkɔma.
59005013	Mbɔ́kɔ muuyé ŋá hámɛ́na ɔɔcɔ aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́, wá bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; mbɔ́kɔ obíléne wé wuúci kuana, wá hákɛ́nɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ maŋana me nyinyemi.
59005014	Mbɔ́kɔ ɔkɔnɔ wé wuúci tímbie, wɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ bekendisi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine, bé wuúci bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́nɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bé wuúci feéfíki ɔsɔŋɔ eé nyiínyi nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
59005015	Ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na mɔŋɔlɛ́ kɔ́ɔ́ yɔ́ɔ́lɛ́ta ɔkɔnɔ́kɔ́nɔ; Otéŋí a Waáŋá kéé wuúci ééŋúnyísi, yó wuúci nyɛanɛnɛna tɔ́na, mbɔ́kɔ wáŋa ɔkɛlákánɔ́ maabɛ́.
59005016	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ láana anyía, énu búle bɛ́kɔ́tɔ́nɔ́nɔ maanɔ́ maabɛ́ banɔ́ na banɔ́, nu bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɔ́nɔ́nɔ tɔ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ banɔ́ na banɔ́; aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ ééŋúnyísíki cíínú ɛkɔnɔ. Ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na ú atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa na makɛ́nda ma ɔkɛlaka bɛandándá bɛ́ bɛsana.
59005017	Éli ŋaá bá ɔɔcɔ háyɛ basɔ́; ú ŋaá bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na ɔtɛ́má okime anyía nɔbɔ́lá ti túné naa; aáná tuɔŋɔ tɔ́tátɔ́ ne ekélékéti ŋa hɔ́láka nɔbɔ́lá tɛ naanɛ́na ɔmɛsɛ́.
59005018	E elime eeci, u ŋe túné bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɔ́kɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía nɔbɔ́lá á háná túmútúne ɔnaa; aáná ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná ŋee néésíki tɔbɔ́lá, yó túmutúne ohéyísi bɛnyɛ́ma.
59005019	Baláamɛ, mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ ŋa nána taaká ci ohónyí ú Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, mbá sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ é ke wuúci hálámánána ɔ háná látɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́,
59005020	énu menyí anyía ɔɔcɔ oócí awɔ́ ú má ka hálámánána sɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ aá taaká ci ohónyí ú Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ me kétúnyi mɔkɛla maabɛ́ o owé, yɔ́ kɛ́la tɔ́na anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á nyɛánákɛ́nɛ́na maabɛ́ meéŋí.
60001001	Yaŋɔ́ Bíel, ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma u Yésus Kilís, yaŋɔ́ ɛ ŋaá mɛ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, banɔ́ eebe abá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá táfáka feeké. Bá ŋaá banɔ́ sélísíki, aámbáya nua nɔ́ŋa biliminyi e bikéti bí iisí bí butéŋí bú Lóom. Bɛ́áŋa anyía na Bɔ́ŋ, na Kalasi, na Kabatɔs, na Asi, ne Bitini.
60001002	Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ táfáká buáyá háyɛ u ŋaá tákákɛ́ná a makɛ́nda ma yááyɛ́ Elilé anyía nuánɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na Yésus Kilís, tɔ́na anyía nuánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na bifúúménénú bɛ́ baacɔ e elime cɛ maayɛ́ manɔ́ŋɔ́ a má ŋaá hámɔ́kɔ́ná. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sayábákɛ́na, mbá u banɔ́ iínjíékíne mbuumu ciéŋíníŋíniʼo !
60001003	Túé nyemíki aná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Síkíne ci uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís ! U ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́cámá mahana ekúlú eyí u ŋeé kúmbútúne úúsú olíhe e elime cɛ nyɛhaanyua nyí Yésus Kilís e biwéewé. Yaátɛ́ asana tua sɔ́ŋa bá háyánɔ́ taaká cɛ mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá a má tɛ káá mana ta buɔ́sɛ́.
60001004	Tu ŋe sú ményi tɔ́na anyía tu ká sɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na na makɛ́nda ma ɔbɔ́ŋgɔ́na bɛnyɛ́ma abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe tétényínyi bááyɛ́ baacɔ. Bíáŋa bɛnyɛ́ma a bɛ́ tɛ á bá bɛ́ ɔcaŋiaka, te obítífíle, mbá te onyímísi núábɔ́ nɔhɛka. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ biíbi tétényínyi a búáyɛ́ bunɔŋɔ.
60001005	Wuúci wáŋa na makɛ́nda ma ɔ banɔ́ tétényíki anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma ayɛ́ u káá banɔ́ námbɔnɛna ɔkɔmba ooci a wá yáaŋa ɔ ɔfaakɔna a nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí Yésus.
60001006	Énu bílénéke buéŋí aná a asana na bɛnyɛ́ma eébí, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía aámbáya nua núáŋa ɔ ɔlɛca anamánamá cá mɔkɔkɔnana.
60001007	Yááŋa anyía mɔkɔkɔnana eémú ŋɔ yɔ́ɔ́kɛ́tɛ́na makɛ́nda me úúnú olumitinine. Ɔ́kɔ, tɛ́ka kóolo áŋa bɔkɔ a bɔ́ naŋa bú á cáŋiaka e? Ta híáná, bá náŋa bé é ciíci námbáka o oocó, anyía bé é menyí mbɔ́kɔ cɛ́áŋa ifúúménénú. Híáná tɔ́na yááŋa ne úúnú olumitinine; u ŋa hɔ́la kóolo buéŋí. Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, bé ŋeé wuúci ɔ́ɔ́kɛ́tɛ́na anyía bé é menyi mbɔ́kɔ wáŋa wɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́. Aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kéé yóómísíki olumitinine oócí, yó wuúci iínjie nuúmi, yó wuúci ciekinyi a buɔ́sɛ́ ebú Yésus Kilís kéé bítóŋínyi a baacɔ.
60001008	Banɔ́ nu tɛ ŋá nɔ́ lɛca Yésus ta buɔ́sɛ́; mbá ta híáná, nu ŋe nú wuúci léne, ta ayɛ́ nu ti ŋé nú wuúci lɛca aámbáya nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá. Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, nu ŋe nú bíléne ne nuúmi nuéŋí a nyɛnamá anyɛ́ ɔɔcɔ tɛ á bá wu omenyi otóŋínyi ne mehúnyi me nyuúté.
60001009	Ɛ́cɛ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ maá banɔ́ nóhiki, nua núáŋa aná na bɛnamá ebí úúnú olumitinine ŋaá bá wá yaámbaka.
60001010	A asana na bɛnamá eébí, behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ cáŋa ɔbataka, bɔ́ wáambaka bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ anyía bébú yiíyi menyí. Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ bé ŋe bú hémúkúnyínyí baacɔ asana yɛ́ yaála yí nuubo ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ bóosikinyi.
60001011	Elilé yí Kilís ŋaá cáŋacáŋa o beébe tóŋgínyi anyía Kilís káá lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé, mbá u bɔ́ŋɔ nuúmi e elime. Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ bá ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na omenyi ne e ekúlú yɛ́ háányɛ́ bɛsana eébí káá bɛ́kɛ́láka na anyána bɛ́ káá bámɔ́kɔ́na.
60001012	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋoó tóŋgínyí bááyɛ́ behémúnyi bɛsana eébé anyía bɛsana ebí bé ŋe bú hémúnyi ti ŋéé beébe lɛca beébe bɛ́muátá, mbá bɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lɛ́ca. Aámbáya behulinyi baacɔ Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ biíbi laákɛ́na. Bá ŋa bɔ́ táŋáká a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé e yí ŋeé húle ɔ Ɔmuaná ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ta bíáyɛ́ bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma bɛ́muátá áŋa na ɛcaná cí o biíbi menyukune.
60001013	Yaátɛ́ asana, ánɔ hákɛ́na ɛtɛ́má ɔ ɔnyiɔnɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ buólí, nɔtɛ hɛ́táka hiiné; ánɔ hákɛ́na tɔ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ mekime a yaála yí nuubo ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ bóosikinyi e ekúlú eyí Yésus Kilís kéé bítóŋínyi a baacɔ.
60001014	A asana ayɛ́ nua nɔ́ŋa baáná bá ɔlɔ́kɔ́mána, nɔtɛ háná látɛ́na bɛsana bɛ́ buáyá a bɛ́ ŋaá bá bɛ́ á banɔ́ hámɔ́kɔ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má ekúlú ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na a búánɔ́ bundímé noómi.
60001015	Mbá, i iŋetí cɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Ooci awɔ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́, wuúci wáŋa ofúúménénú, ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na bifúúménénú bɛ́ baacɔ a bɛsana bikime abɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la.
60001016	Yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ a Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía: «Ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na bifúúménénú bɛ́ baacɔ háyɛ yaŋɔ́ bɛ́muátá ya mɛ́ŋa ofúúménénú.»
60001017	Ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nu naŋa nuenú wuúci lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ anyía: «Taatá». A yaátɛ́ asana, núánɔ́ nyɛmána nú o búle wuúci nyemi na ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na e ekúlú ekime a yɛ́ maá banɔ́ lɔ́bɛna anyía nua nɔ́ŋa biliminyi aaha ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci. Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé kélísi baacɔ bekime a maabɔ́ mekilíkínyí. U tɛ á bá ne mebeé.
60001018	Nu ŋe nú ményi nyɛnamá nyí bilíoŋí anyɛ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ háŋɔ́náká ne nyiínyi ɔ buɔ́lɛ́ bɔ́ abɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na cé etémbí ne etémbí ecí cíínú sɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ eékúnyíki. U tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ banɔ́ háŋɔ́náka ta na mɔɔnyɛ́, te ne kóolo, anyía bilíoŋí eébí naŋa bɛ́ á cáŋɛaka.
60001019	Mbá u ŋaá banɔ́ háŋɔ́náka na manɔ́ŋɔ́ me Kilís bɛ́muátá a má á hɔla bɔkɔ bukime. Bé ŋeé wuúci sɔ́mbɛ́na háyɛ ɔɔ́nɔ́ u ɛtɔ́mbá. U ŋaá bá tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma, tɛ́ka na hɛkɛ́bɛ́lɛ;
60001020	wuúci Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá cáŋa ɔlɔtɔ ɛ́cɛ u ti ŋe kéti na ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔmuaná, yó wuúci banɔ́ tóŋínyi a asana yáánɔ́ e bikúlú bí elime eebi.
60001021	Nu ŋa nɔ́ hɔ́lɛna eeyé e elime ɔ ɔháya mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; u ŋeé héényi Yésus e biwéewé anyía wé wuúci iínjíé nuúmi. Aáná nu ŋe nú lúmitinine, nu hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
60001022	Nua núáŋa bifúúménénú bɛ́ baacɔ anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ látɛ́na taaká cɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a nyɛnamá enyí nu ŋé nu léne báánɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine. Énu lénékénéne aná na ɔtɛ́má okime.
60001023	Yááŋa anyía nú ti ómo nú bíbíénútúkúne né síkíne a cɛ́ naŋa cíé wéékúne, mbá nú me nú bíbíénútúkúne e elime a makɛ́nda me buohó e bú ti ŋéé fíke ta buɔ́sɛ́; buúbu búáŋa buɔ́sɔ ekúlú ekime a makɛ́nda ma Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Bɛ́áŋa bɛɔ́sɔ ekúlú ekime, bí tí we.
60001024	Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá kɔ́ɔna cɛ́sɛ: «Baacɔ bekime á bɔ́ŋa i iŋetí ci bihuti a bɛ́ ŋaá kɔ́ta, núábɔ́ nɔhɛka áŋa i iŋetí cɛ bɛsama e bí ŋe yémbunue, bɛ́ɔ́ kúakɔna ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́,
60001025	mbá Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé líhe bikúlú bikime.» Bɛsana eébí áŋa Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká.
60002001	A asana eyí nú me nú bíbíénútúkúne, ánɔ nyɛánaka aná ɔkɛla anamá ekime na cá aŋána ne cé menjiŋé ne cé muótóno. Ánɔ nyɛánáka ɔbá na tɔbɛ́mbɛ túfendí, na yaáká yí eése áyá.
60002002	Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ bílénékíne háyɛ mabána naŋa meé bílénékíne iŋéné. Aáná nu ká nɔ́ kɔ́maka eé biíbi, mbá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ banɔ́ nóhiki buúse bukime,
60002003	ananyía nua núáŋa o omenyi anyía wáŋa na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má.
60002004	Énu bíkósíki né Otéŋí a Waáŋá, wuúci wáŋa nukúse e nú ŋé yiínjíéne olíhe. Nuúnu bafalɛfa ciíbe ŋe bú óómbóko, mbá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé nuúnu lɔtɔ́, yɔ́ lɛ́ca anyía nuáŋa taaká cɛ bɔkɔ a bɔ́ á hɔlaka bɛnyɛ́ma bikime.
60002005	Banɔ́ tɔ́na, nua núáŋa i iŋetí ci imbiŋe a cɛ́áŋa na taaká ci olíhe. Énu oofókíne aná ɔ ɔfalɛfa ú ciíbe cɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, haála ahá yááyɛ́ Elilé ŋe límine, anyía mbá nuanɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na ɔlɔŋɔ ú beluli nyiínjie e befúúménénú a bá ŋá bɔ́ hɔ́lɛna né Yésus Kilís ɔ ɔnyiɔnɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ buólí na ɔtɛ́má okime.
60002006	Yááŋa anyía Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaa kɔ́ɔna cɛ́sɛ: «Ánɔ lɛcá, ya mɛ́ŋa ɔlɔtɔ́nɔ́ ambányɛ yí nukúse a nɔ́ á hɔ́laka bɛnyɛ́ma bikime, mío nuúnu túméke eé ciíbe ci Síyon; aáná ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋaá háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ eé nuúnu tɛ́ káá lɔ́kɔ́ma aatɔ́ ɔlama ta buɔ́sɛ́.»
60002007	Banɔ́ abá nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ eé nuúnu, énu menyí anyía nukúse eénú áŋa taaká cɛ bɔkɔ a bɔ́ á hɔ́laka bɛnyɛ́ma bikime. Mbá bú tɛ́ á bá aáná ná baacɔ a bá tɛ ŋá bɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ eé nuúnu, anyía yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ anyía: «Nukúse anɔ́ bafalɛfa meébe ŋe bú óomboko anyía báyɛ núáŋa nɔɔbɛ́, nuúnu núáŋa taaká ci nukúse a nɔ́ maá bɛ́túáhɛ́na ciíbe».
60002008	Yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ tɔ́na anyía: «Nukúse eénú ŋeé kúfítínyi baacɔ, nú beébe kuusiki ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́.» Bé ŋe bú kúféténe eé nuúnu, bá kúakɔna ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ anyía bá tɛ ŋá bɔ látɛ́na Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Feeké Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá sɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́na aáná.
60002009	Mbá, aá banɔ́, nua nɔ́ŋa hɛnyɛ́nɔ́ ahɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋɔɔ́ lɔ́tɔ, banɔ́ beluli nyiínjie e bé ŋe bú lúlinyi Otéŋí a Waáŋá bɛnyɛ́ma. Nua núáŋa tɔ́na efúúménénú yɛ́ bunɔŋɔ a yɛ́ ŋaá bɛ́lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. U ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́tɔ́kɔ́ anyía nuénú húlíkínyi baacɔ bɛmbányɛ́kɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana abɛ́ u ŋaá kɛlaka, ananyía u ŋaá banɔ́ aáŋíáka o olíhe ú ibíne noómi, yɔ́ banɔ́ hákɛ́na e uúyé olíhe ú eese noómi.
60002010	Buáyá, nu tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ nɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na búáyɛ́ bunɔŋɔ; mbá aámbáya, nua núáŋa bááyɛ́ baacɔ bá bɛ́muátá. Buáyá, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ banɔ́ bɛ́cáma mahana, mbá aámbáya, ú maá banɔ́ bɛ́cáma mahana.
60002011	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, banɔ́ abá nua nɔ́ŋa biliminyi, banɔ́ tɔ́na bekenyí ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci, ɛ ŋaá mɛ banɔ́ báta anyía ánɔ sɔ́mba ɔkɔlɔ́ a bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́ bikime a bɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ hámɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi, anyía bí ŋeé núusi hɛtányɛ́ hɛ́ ɔɔcɔ.
60002012	Mbá énu tóŋgínyi ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ ci be-ti-menyí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ananyía ta bábɔ́ banɔ́ kákálákɛ́na anyía báyɛ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛla bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́, bábɔ́ lɛcáka yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, aáná bé ké bú iínjíékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ nuúmi buɔ́sɛ́ ebú u kéé bítóŋínyi náábɔ́.
60002013	A asana ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá, ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na butéŋí bukime bú baacɔ, te otéŋí a waáŋá u bunɔŋɔ,
60002014	mbá ta kɔ́mɛ́na acɛ háányɛ́ acɛ́ bá tɔ́ma, anyía bé ŋeé beébe tɔ́ma. Bá ŋaá tɔ́ma kɔ́mɛ́na na ɔ ɔbɔ́nɔ́sia bakɛla maabɛ́ ne o olémbi bakɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana.
60002015	Yááŋa anyía bú ŋe bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na é húéke eété cé be-ti-menyí bɔkɔ.
60002016	Énu líhéke yáaŋa i iŋetí cɛ baacɔ a bá bɔ́ŋa baháŋɔ́nákánɔ́, mbá nɔtɛ bɛ́tááka anyía nyíánɔ́ nyilimíné nyɛ́ baháŋɔ́nákánɔ́ ŋaá banɔ́ iínjie makɛ́nda ma ɔkɛlaka nyɛŋána. Eéʼeé, énu líhéke i iŋetí cɛ bɔnyiɔnɔ bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
60002017	Énu kékéke ɔɔcɔ okime, nu lénéke báánɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine; énu béétíki Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, nu lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na tɔ́na otéŋí a waáŋá u bunɔŋɔ.
60002018	Aá banɔ́, bɔnyiɔnɔ, ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na cíínú síkíne cí buólí cɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ ne nyikéke nyikime; tɛ́ cáŋa hú né eeci a cɛ́áŋa na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, cɛ́ tɛ banɔ́ bɛ́kátɛ́na; mbá ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na tɔ́na eeci a cɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ bɛ́kátɛ́na.
60002019	Yááŋa ambányɛ yɛ́ asana o oweéhínyínyi muuyé amɔ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́ma etémbí ne etémbí a asana na nyɛlɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na anyɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, anyía aáná bú ŋeé wuúci bíléníne.
60002020	Nuúmi a númɔtɛ́ tɛ á bá ná ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋaá lɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé a bɔɔbɛ́ abɔ́ wáŋa ɔkɛlákánɔ́. Mbá mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋe yeéhínyínyi ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma muuyé anyía u ŋa kɛla bɔmbányɛ, búáŋa ambányɛ yɛ́ asana eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
60002021	A asana eéyé u ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ. Yááŋa anyía Kilís bɛ́muátá ŋaá lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé etémbí ne etémbí a yáánɔ́ asana anyía aáná bú ŋeé bílénékíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, yɔ́ banɔ́ síkíne hibílícínyínyí eéhí ananyía núánɔ́ látákɛ́na cááyɛ́ abaná.
60002022	Yááŋa anyía, ú tɛ ŋaá kɛ́la bɔkɔ a bɔɔbɛ́ ta buɔ́sɛ́, híáná tɔ́na ú tɛ ŋáá sɔ́mba afala ta buɔ́sɛ́.
60002023	Bé ŋeé wuúci ɔɔ́mbɔ́náká mbá, wuúci te ohélúmúnyínyi ɔɔcɔ bɔsálɔ́; ta ayɛ́ bé ŋeé wuúci kélíkí cɛɛ́tɔ, u ti ómó síse ta ɔɔcɔ, mbá u ŋa bɛ́nyɛ́ána a aabá cá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Mukélísi bɛsana a mutálɛ́mánánɔ́.
60002024	Ekúlú eyí bé ŋeé wuúci aátákɛ́ná ɔ ɔmbásá, u ŋaá lɔ́kɔ́máká muuyé aáyá a cɛɛ́tɔ a asana na máásɔ́ maabɛ́, ananyía mbá túásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na bewéénú a bɔɔbɛ́, mbá bɔɔ́sɔ a atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yí olíhe. A asana na maayɛ́ mooki, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ nua nɔ́ŋa baáŋɔ́núákánɔ́.
60002025	Yááŋa anyía nu ŋa nɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na háyɛ ɛtɔ́mbá e cí ŋe húle é ndéŋele, mbá aámbáya Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ maá banɔ́ hálámánána né Musókóbi bitúké; muúmu mú ŋaá banɔ́ sókóbi.
60003001	Híáná tɔ́na, banɔ́ beénjú bá ɔtɔ́nɔ́, hú naányɛ́ á lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na ɔnɔ́mɛ u bɛ́muátá. Wá bámɔ́kɔ́na na ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na a nyɛnamá anyɛ́ anyía, ta u tɛ ŋáá táŋɛ́ta, wé bísúétíne ɔnɔ́mɛ, ɔnɔ́mɛ oócí yó lumitinine Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, mbɔ́kɔ wáŋa mu-ti-lumitinine.
60003002	Báánɔ́ banɔ́mɛ bá bɛ́muátá ká bɔ́ lɛ́caka na anyána nyíánɔ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na áŋa nyifúúménénú na anyána nu ŋe nú beébe lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na.
60003003	Nua nɔ́ŋa beénjú bá ɔtɔ́nɔ́. Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, nɔtɛ aambáka nyɛnɔ́kɔ́ nyɛ́ ciɔ́sɛɔ́sɛ́; nyɛ́áŋa anyía: Ne tuhúnyi a tɔnuákánɔ́, na bɛalɔ́ bí kóolo, na bɛmbányɛ́kɛ́ bɛ́ bɛlaŋa.
60003004	Mbá ánɔ aambáka nyɛnɔ́kɔ́ nyɛ́ ɔtɛ́má; nyiínyi nyɛ́ tɛ ŋá mána, anyía nyí ŋeé húle e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi a cɛ́áŋa mbuumu, ciíci isiotóto. Nyɛnɔ́kɔ́ eényí tɛ ŋá cáŋía ta buɔ́sɛ́, nyɛ́áŋa ambányɛ yɛ́ bɔkɔ e yí ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ɔ ɔhɔla bɔkɔ bukime.
60003005	Híáná bifúúménénú bí beénjú bɛ́ ɔtɔ́nɔ́ bɛ́ buáyá ŋaá bá na nyɛnɔ́kɔ́ eényí, bá ŋa bɔ́ hákɛ́na mɔŋɔlɛ́ ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bá lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na báábɔ́ banɔ́mɛ bá bɛ́muátá.
60003006	Híáná Sáala, oónyí u Abɛ́laham, ŋaá bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na. U ŋaá lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na ɔnɔ́mɛ, u wuúci lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ anyía «Taatá». Mbɔ́kɔ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana, tɔ́na manɔ́ŋɔ́ tɛ ŋáa banɔ́ sɔ́mbásɔ́mba, nua nɔ́ŋa háyɛ bááyɛ́ babɔ́la aámbáya.
60003007	Banɔ́ tɔ́na banɔ́mɛ, hú naányɛ́ e líhéke ne uuyé oónyí, u menyukune anyía beénjú ŋe tényí ábɔ́ kása. Énu beébe kékéke anyía bá ŋa bɔ́ nyɛ́mána bá ɔbɔ́ŋɔ olíhe awɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋé yíinjie baacɔ ɔlɔŋɔ na banɔ́. Ánɔ kɛláka aáná, mbá ta bɔkɔ tɛ káá bɛ́kɛ́ŋɛ́lɛ́ána e úúnú ɔbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na.
60003008	Ɛ ŋaá mɛ aamba obíóndísínyi ɔ banɔ́ wɔɔ́ŋɛ́na anyía ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na na nyɛbɛ́táá nyɛ́mɔtɛ́, ne nulénéne númɔtɛ́, énu lénékéne banɔ́ na banɔ́ anyía nua nɔ́ŋa benyíinyí, ánɔ bá tɔ́na na ɔtɛ́má ú mahana, ne nyibílóosi nyɛ́ ɛtɛ́má.
60003009	Nuti hélúmúkúnyínyi bɔɔbɛ́ a bɔɔbɛ́, mbá ta bɔsálɔ́ a bɔsálɔ́. Nu ŋa nɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔbataka yáaŋa Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía wá sáyábákɛ́na baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ kɛla bɔɔbɛ́; a asana eéyé Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ, ananyía mbá wá banɔ́ sáyábákɛ́na háyɛ u ŋaá banɔ́ bɛ́tanɛna.
60003010	Yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ a Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía: «Ɔɔcɔ ewú u ŋeé léne olíhe na ambányɛ yí olíhe na mɔɔ́sɛ́ me obíléne, wé bíkékényíki anyía u ti búle táŋa aabɛ́ yɛ́ ɔtáŋa, u tɛ sɔ́mbáka bɛfala;
60003011	wá nyɛána ɔkɛla maabɛ́, mbá wé búle kɛ́la bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana, u bíínjíékíne ɔwaamba mbuumu ekúlú ekime,
60003012	ananyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa lɔ́kɔ́ma ɛbɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na cɛ́ bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ; cááyɛ́ eése tɛ ŋá hátɔna náábɔ́, mbá Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé túme bakɛla maabɛ́ elime.»
60003013	Aányɛ́ wáŋa na makɛ́nda ma ɔ banɔ́ tékeseke mbɔ́kɔ nua núáŋa bebíínjíénú ɔ ɔkɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana e?
60003014	Mbɔ́kɔ yɛ́ ŋáá háma anyía núánɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé asana na yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, yááŋa ambányɛ yɛ́ asana. Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ, nuti líkíméke baacɔ; cíínú injiŋé tí nyimukune.
60003015	Mbá énu nyemíki e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi Kilís, Otéŋí a Waáŋá. Ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na ekúlú ekime hoóhi na ɔbɛ́kámáka baacɔ bekime a bá ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ bícónyi a asana na mɔŋɔlɛ́ amá nua nɔ́ŋa ne meéme.
60003016	Ekúlú eyí nu ŋe nú beébe hembuline mɔŋɔlɛ́ eémé, ánɔ kɛ́láka ne osiotóto yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má, nu beébe kékéke; túánɔ́ tɔcɔɔ́cɔ́ tɔ́ ɛtɛ́má tɛ́ banɔ́ kákálɛ́na, ananyía baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ óóto, bá bábákɛ́na yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na e nyimónjóló ne Kilís ábɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka aatɔ́ ɔlama.
60003017	Yááŋa ambányɛ anyía ɔɔcɔ á lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé a bɔmbányɛ abɔ́ u ŋaá kɛ́la, mbɔ́kɔ bú ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ɔ ɔhɔla anyía wá lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé a asana na bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana abɛ́ u ŋá kɛla.
60003018	Yááŋa anyía, Kilís bɛ́muátá ŋeé wé ekúlú ɔ́mɔtɛ́ e bikúlú bikime a asana na maabɛ́ ma baacɔ; wuúci atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ u ŋe keé wééné a yáánɔ́ asana, banɔ́ bakɛla maabɛ́, ɔ ɔkɛla anyía wá banɔ́ súétékéne ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Bé ŋeé wuúci ɔ́ɔ́nɔ, yó wé háyɛ ɔɔcɔ okime, yɔ́ háányua o owé a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé.
60003019	A makɛ́nda mé Elilé eéyé, u ŋe keé húlíkínyi te bililé a bɛ́ á báka bɛfɔ́kákɛ́nánɔ́ a bunɔŋɔ bú biwéewé Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma.
60003020	Yááŋa anyía, bililé bɛ́ baacɔ eébí ŋaá cáŋa ɔkɛlakɛna Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ aatɔ́ ɔnata buáyá, ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋaá bá we yeéhíkínyínyi, u beébe tátáka ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ amá Nɔ́a ŋaá bá waá túáka hikóló. Hikóló eéhí hɛ́ ŋaa kɛlá anyía hú baacɔ bánámányɛ́ ɔ́ nɔhɔ́kɔ o owé ú menyífé.
60003021	Menyífé eémé ŋaá bá hibílícínyínyí hí obíótíne awɔ́ u ŋaá banɔ́ nohi tɔ́na aámbáya. Obíótíne oócí tɛ ŋá sua bɔ sua bihíŋe bí elime cɛ cɛɛ́tɔ; mbá wáŋa nyibíínjie anyɛ́ ɔɔcɔ ŋé bíínjie ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne efúúménénú yɛ́ hɛcɔɔ́cɔ́ hɛ́ ɔtɛ́má a asana eyí Yésus Kilís ŋaá háányúá e biwéewé.
60003022	Yésus oócí ŋaá báátáka, yɔ́ hálɔ́mɔ́na ɔ Ɔmuaná. Wáŋa limine a aháŋá yɛ́ ɔɔbɔ́ ú manɔ́mɛ ú Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; hɔ́á ú ŋee téŋínyi ne bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma, ne metéŋí, ne bililé bɛ́ makɛ́nda bí etémbí bikime áyá.
60004001	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́, háyɛ Kilís ŋaá lɔ́kɔ́máká muuyé a ciayɛ́ cɛɛ́tɔ, banɔ́ tɔ́na ánɔ hákɛ́na a bíánɔ́ bɛɛtɔ́ anyía nu ká nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé. Yááŋa anyía, ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ ú maa lɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé aáyá a cɛɛ́tɔ tɛ ŋá háná á kɛ́la bɔɔbɛ́ buúse bukime.
60004002	Yááŋa anyía, ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ e me meé wuúci lɔbɛna anyía wé líhéke ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́, wé líhéke háyɛ bú ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, tɛ́ cáŋa háyɛ olíhe awɔ́ ú naŋa wé bílénékíne baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́.
60004003	Yááŋa anyía, nú me nú húliki yáánɔ́ ekúlú yeéŋí o olíhe háyɛ be-ti-menyí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Nu ŋa nɔ́ bá nuanɔ́ kɛ́laka bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́ a bɛ́ ŋaá bá bɛ́ á banɔ́ hámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má: Na ɔmúána meluku, na aabɛ́ yɛ́ ɔnyíá, ne ohíólo meluku, ne onyemi bɛbɔ́kɔ́bɔ́kɔ bí bunyímé.
60004004	Mbá aámbáya, be-ti-menyí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ eébé á búáŋa ɔ ɔ banɔ́ kéké buéŋí anyía nu tɛ ŋá háná anɔ́ kɛ́la bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ eébí ɔlɔŋɔ ne beébe mbá, bá ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ óóto, bá banɔ́ ɔɔ́mbɔ́náka.
60004005	Mbá, asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, bá ká bɔ́ bɛ́kámáka a bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana eébí buɔ́sɛ́ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, anyía wáŋa hoóhi na ɔsɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na na bɔɔ́sɔ ne bewéékúnénú bɛsana.
60004006	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ bé ŋgeé húlíkinyi tɔ́na te biwéewé Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma ananyía bébú líhéke ekúlú ekime háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé léne a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía u ŋeé beébe kélísíkí buáyá ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci háyɛ u ŋeé kélísi baacɔ bekime bá ɔmɛsɛ́.
60004007	Nyɛmana nyɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ a yáaŋa hoóhi. Ánɔ bámɔ́kɔ́na aná ne injiŋé a bɛɛtɔ́, nɔtɛ hɛ́táka hiiné ananyía nu ŋa nɔ́ nyɛ́mána nu o búle bɛ́cɔ́kɔ́lɛ́na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
60004008	Asana yí buúsebuúse ayɛ́ núánɔ́ nyɛ́mána nú omenyi áŋa anyía énu lénékéne buéŋí banɔ́ na banɔ́, anyía a núánɔ́ nulénéne noómi maabɛ́ meéŋí tɛ ŋáá lɛ́cana.
60004009	Ánɔ káháka baacɔ bɔmbányɛ, nuti bícúcúlékíne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ a bá ŋa bɔ́ faáya náánɔ́.
60004010	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋoó boo buéŋí. U ŋoo bóosi ɔɔcɔ okime, hú naányɛ́ háyɛ u ŋe léne oboosi. Háyɛ bɛmbányɛ bí bekendisi yaála yí nuubo yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ánɔ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ na yaála yí nuubo eéyí.
60004011	Mbɔ́kɔ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe yiínjíe ɔɔcɔ aá banɔ́ makɛ́nda me ohulikinyi bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ bɛsana, wé beébe hulíkínyi hú bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Mbɔ́kɔ makɛ́nda ma ɔnyiɔkɛna bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ buólí, wé beébe nyiɔ́kɛ́na a makɛ́nda amá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé wuúci iínjie ananyía, a bɛsana bikime baacɔ ébú nyémíki Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bá hɔ́lákɛ́na ne Yésus Kilís. Wuúci wáŋa ne nuúmi na makɛ́nda ekúlú ekime. Híáná yááŋa.
60004012	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, mɔɔhɔ amá nu ŋa nɔ́ bɛ́nyíá tɛ banɔ́ kékísi, anyía tɛ́ cáŋa asana e yikenyí yááŋa,
60004013	mbá énu bílénéke aná anyía nu ŋe nú hiíte nuafa i indekese ci Kilís ananyía, ekúlú ayɛ́ núáyɛ́ nuúmi kéé bítóŋínyi a baacɔ, nu ká nɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na ne obíléne onyíóyókónú hú mbiɔ́kɛ e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi.
60004014	Yááŋa ambányɛ yɛ́ asana mbɔ́kɔ baacɔ ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ ɔɔ́mbɔ́na anyía nua nɔ́ŋa baacɔ bé Kilís, ananyía Elilé yí nuúmi, Elilé yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, áŋa náánɔ́.
60004015	Baláamɛ, bú tɛ á bá bɔmbányɛ anyía ɔɔcɔ aá banɔ́ é hiíteke indekese anyía u ŋɔ́ yɔ́ɔ́nɔ ɔɔcɔ, ta anyía u ŋe yeébe bɔkɔ, ta anyía u ŋgó yoófine a bɛsana e bí ti ŋe wuúci lɛca, ta anyía tɔ́na u ŋaá kɛla aabɛ́ yɛ́ asana yí etémbí. Eéʼeé !
60004016	Mbá, búáŋa bɔmbányɛ buéŋí anyía ɔɔcɔ é hiíteke indekese anyía wáŋa kilísíten. Ekúlú eyí u hiíte indekese eécí, u tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ nyɛmána wu ɔlɔ́kɔ́máka aatɔ́ ɔlama mbá, wé nyemíki bu nyemiki Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a asana ne nyiínyi nyí Kilís.
60004017	Yááŋa anyía ekúlú má kaá háma ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ yɔ́ cɔba o okélísíki baacɔ, mbá yɔ́ cɔ́ba o otúme a makɔlɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ baacɔ bá ciayɛ́ ciíbe. Kokóokó ! Mbɔ́kɔ náásɔ́, bááyɛ́ baacɔ, nyɛkála á nyɛmána nyí otúmíne, anyána yɛ́ káá bá aná na bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ a bá tɛ ŋá bɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́mɛ́na Ambányɛ yɛ́ Ɛsɔ́ma yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ e?
60004018	Yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ a Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ anyía: «Mbɔ́kɔ bú ŋaa náta buéŋí anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ é nohíki bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ bɛ́ baacɔ, mbá anyána aná na baŋána na bakɛla maabɛ́ e?»
60004019	Yaátɛ́ asana, baacɔ e bé ŋe bú híite indekese anyía bú ŋé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ aáná, ábɔ́ nyɛmána bá ɔcɔbaka ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ bɛsana; mbá bé iínjíékíne cííbú ilíhe ikimekime né Muketi bɛnyɛ́ma bikime; muúmu mu ŋoó nyióyísínyi cííyé ɛndána.
60005001	-
60005002	Aámbáya aná, ɛ ŋaá mɛ́ banɔ́ kíndísi, banɔ́ bekendisi tuɔ́bɔ tú belumitinine ɛsɛ́: Énu sókóbíki bɔmbányɛ belumitinine abá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ iínjiekine, nu beébe sókóbíki i iŋetí ci besókóbi bitúké. Ya mɛ́ŋa tɔ́na mukendisi hiɔ́bɔ hí belumitinine, yaŋɔ́ tɔ́na ɔmbasɔ́mbásɔ u indekese ecí Kilís ŋeé hiítéke. Na yaŋɔ́ na banɔ́, tu ká sɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na na nuafa e nuúmi nú Kilís anɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kóó tóŋínyi baacɔ. Énu sókóbíki belumitinine, tɛ́ cáŋa e yeékínyi ɔ ɔmuaná mbá e nyiléne noómi háyɛ bú ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; tɛ́ cáŋa ɔ hɔ́mákɛ́na mɔɔnyɛ́, mbá na ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má.
60005003	Nuti beébe bémbíki tɔ́na, mbá yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na á bámɔ́kɔ́na hibílícínyínyí ehí belumitinine ŋa bɔ́ látɛ́na.
60005004	Aáná, ekúlú eyí Yésus Kilís káá fááya, wuúci awɔ́ u ŋaá basɔ́ sókóbi basɔ́ bekime, u káá banɔ́ hákɛ́na bɛtamba bí nuúmi a bɛ́ á hɔ́laka bɛnamá bikime; biíbi bí ti ŋé bío ta buɔ́sɛ́.
60005005	Híáná tɔ́na, banɔ́, na bɛnɔ́kɔ́ na babɔ́la, ánɔ lɔ́kɔ́mákɛ́na bekendisi belumitinine a cáánɔ́ oóndímínyínyi cá mɔɔ́sɛ́ mekime, nu bílóósíki, nɔ nyiɔkɛna bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ anyía yááŋa yɔɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ anyía: «Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ á bá elime na baacɔ e bé ŋe bú bíbééti. Mbá u ŋoo bóosi baacɔ e bé ŋe bú bílóósi eeyé eé buúse.»
60005006	Énu bílóósíki aná eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ a wáŋa na makɛ́nda mekime, ananyía wá banɔ́ béétíki ɛ ɛndána acɛ́ u ŋaá táná.
60005007	Ánɔ cɔbákána cíínú ɛmbɛ́cɔbɛ́ ikime ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ananyía wuúci u ŋaá banɔ́ sókóbi.
60005008	Cíínú injiŋé tɛ banɔ́ nyímúkúne a bɛɛtɔ́; nɔtɛ hɛ́táka hiiné anyía muanɔ́ munuusi, ɛ́cɛ Musɔ́mɛ́na baacɔ́, ŋe húlé á naŋála, u banɔ́ tékítéki háyɛ iŋgoyó e cí ŋé húme cɛ aambaka bɔkɔ bɔ́ ɔlahɔnaka.
60005009	Ánɔ ɔɔ́nɔ́kɛ́na o olumitinine noómi, nɔtɛ bɛ́nyɛ́ánɛ́na anyía wá banɔ́ yáka. Nu ŋe nú menyi anyía híáná tɔ́na bé ŋe tékéséke báánɔ́ benyíinyí bé olumitinine a bá bɔ́ŋa basaasíákánɔ́ ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ okime.
60005010	Nu ŋa nɔ́ cɔ́baka ɔ ɔlɔ́kɔ́máka muuyé hikétíkéti hí ekúlú, mbá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa indíné cɛ yaála yí nuubo ekime. Wuúci u ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ e nyimónjóló ne Yésus Kilís, anyía nuanɔ́ bɔ́ŋgɔ́na nuafa eeyé e nuúmi a nɔ́ tɛ káá mana ta buɔ́sɛ́. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ oónyínyísikinyi, yɔ́ banɔ́ kíndísíki, yɔ́ banɔ́ líminyisiki e elimíné a cááŋa cɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́.
60005011	Wuúci wáŋa na makɛ́nda e bikúlú bikime. Híáná yááŋa.
60005012	Sílas u ŋɔ yɔɔ́ŋɔ mehúnyi eeme eémi e nyiínyi. I ŋeé mi wuúci lɛca háyɛ onyíinyí a wáŋa obíínjíénú ɔ ɔnyiɔnɔ Yésus buólí. Mehúnyi eeme áŋa a asana na ɔ banɔ́ kíndísíki na ma ɔ banɔ́ háyɛ́na ɛmbasɔ́ anyía nua nɔ́ŋa bahákɛ́nánɔ́ bɛɛtɔ́ aá taaká cɛ yaála yí nuubo yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ noómi.
60005013	Belumitinine bá hiɔ́bɔ hɛ́ Bábilon ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ téŋi; Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé beébe táfáka háyɛ u ŋaá banɔ́ táfáka tɔ́na. Malɛ́kus tɔ́na, uumi ɔɔ́nɔ́, ŋaá banɔ́ téŋi.
60005014	Énu téŋginyinyi banɔ́ na banɔ́, nu bíémbíkinyinyi anyía nua nɔ́ŋa benyíinyí bé olumitinine. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ iínjíékíne mbuumu ɛ ɛtɛ́má, banɔ́ bekime abá nua nɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne Kilísʼo ! Híáná yááŋa.
61001001	Yaŋɔ́, Símon Bíel, munyiɔnɔ mu Yésus Kilís; yaŋɔ́ tɔ́na uuyé ɔɔcɔ u ɛndɔ́ma. Yaŋɔ́, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu, banɔ́ eebe abá nu ŋa nɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né Yésus Kilís, bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ háyɛ basɔ́. Wuúci wáŋa na ciasɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na muasɔ́ Munohi. U ŋaá kɛ́la anyía túásɔ́ háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ nááyá aáná basɔ́ bekime, anyía wáŋa ɔtálɛ́mánánɔ́.
61001002	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á banɔ́ sayábákɛ́na, mbá u banɔ́ iínjíékíne mbuumu ciéŋí ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi bikúlú bikime, anyía nu ŋe nú wuúci menyi, nu menyukune tɔ́na Yésus Kilís, uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
61001003	Yááŋa anyía makɛ́nda ma Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́lɔ ɔkɛlaka bɔkɔ bukime a bú á nyɛ́mana o olíhe a nyɛnamá e nyí ŋeé wuúci bíléníne. Yésus Kilís wuúci, u ŋa kɛ́la anyía túésú ményí Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Mu-basɔ́-lɔ́tɔ, anyía tuásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na bááyɛ́ baacɔ. U ŋaá kɛ́láka aáná o ohónyí wú ɔ basɔ́ tóŋínyi na núáyɛ́ nuúmi na yááyɛ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na.
61001004	Yaátɛ́ asana u ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́tánákɛ́ná na bɛmbányɛ́kɛ́ na bɛandándá bɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma. Ekúlú eyí nu ké nú biíbi hiiteke, nu ká nɔ́ bá na makɛ́nda a ma ŋaá banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́lɔ ɔ ɔsɔ́mba ɔkɔlɔ́ ɔ ɔkɛla bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ a bɛ́ ŋaá hámɛ́na baacɔ ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi, mbá nu hiiteke nuafa a ambányɛ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
61001005	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ ánɔ bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na buéŋí o osolinyi e úúnú olumitinine ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na; ánɔ latɛ́nɛ́na a ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na ɔ ɔmuaná omenyi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
61001006	O omenyi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ɔ ɔmuaná, ánɔ háya nyɛnɔ́mátána nyɛ́ bɛsana; a nyɛnɔ́mátána nyɛ́ bɛsana ɔ ɔmuaná, énu solínyi nyiéhínyínyi nyí muuyé; e nyiéhínyínyi nyí muuyé ɔ ɔmuaná, ánɔ latɛ́nɛ́na nyɛlátɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana bí olumitinine.
61001007	A nyɛlátɛ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana bí olumitinine ɔ ɔmuaná, ánɔ tála nulénéne nú benyíinyí; e nulénéne nú benyíinyí ɔ ɔmuaná, énu solínyi nulénéne nɔ́ baacɔ bekime.
61001008	Aáná, mbɔ́kɔ nua nɔ́ŋa na anamá cá bɛmbányɛ bɛ́ abɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na eécé ekime ceéŋí bikúlú bikime, cá káá banɔ́ ɔɔ́lɔ́kɔ buéŋí ɔ ɔnyiɔ buólí bú olumitinine; cé kóó tóŋínyi tɔ́na nyíánɔ́ nyimenyinyi ne Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís.
61001009	Mbá ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u tɛ á bá ne ceéce áŋa ne indímé, wáŋa ne bibúté. Ú maá bɛ́hɔ́ya anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé wuúci nyɛanɛna, yó fúúmínyi maayɛ́ maabɛ́ amá u ŋa kɛ́láka buáyá.
61001010	Yaátɛ́ asana aná, banɔ́ báámɛ benyíinyí, ánɔ bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na ekúlú ekime olíhe ambányɛ yí olíhe anyía nuénú oónyínyísíkínyi na nyɛ́ánɔ́ nyɛlɔ́ŋɔ na nyɛlɔtɔ anyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá banɔ́ lɔ́tɔkɔ; mbɔ́kɔ nu ŋa nɔ́ kɛ́la aáná, nu ti ké nú kúfétene ta buɔ́sɛ́.
61001011	Aáná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá banɔ́ káháka aabá ekime, yɔ́ banɔ́ oófikinyi e Butéŋí bú ekúlú ekime bú Yésus Kilís, ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá na muasɔ́ Munohi.
61001012	Yaátɛ́ asana ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ bítéési bɛsana eébí bikúlú bikime, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía nua núáŋa o o biíbi menyi, nu látákɛ́na bɔmbányɛ taaká acɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ aákɔ́nákɛ́ná.
61001013	-
61001014	I ŋe mí menyi anyía ya mɛáŋa hoóhi ne owé; aáná uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá ŋeé mi tóŋínyi. Buátɛ́ bɔkɔ búáŋa butálɛ́mánánɔ́ anyía yámɛ banɔ́ bítéésíki bɛsana eébí, ekúlú ekime ayɛ́ ya mɛ́ánáŋa o olíhe, anyía nu ti wéékúne cɛɛ́tɔ.
61001015	Yaátɛ́ asana ɛ ŋaá mɛ bɛ́kɛ́ndɛ́na ɔ banɔ́ láana bɛsana eébí aámbáya, anyía núé síké biíbi bɛ́tááka, ta yaŋɔ́ owéénú.
61001016	Yááŋa anyía tú ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ láákɛ́na anyána uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá Yésus Kilís ŋa kaá fááya na maayɛ́ makɛ́nda; tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ banɔ́ láakɛna na bɛmbányɛ bí tuhélúméke bí injiŋé cɛ baacɔ, mbá anyía cáásɔ́ eése cá bɛ́muátá ŋaá lɛ́cáka búáyɛ́ buáŋá.
61001017	Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋeé wuúci iínjíé nuúmi a nuáŋá e ekúlú eyí okelú ú búáyɛ́ buáŋá a bú á hɔ́la ŋaá lɔ́kɔ́mána, ú kɔɔnaka ɔ́sɛ: «Ooci áŋa uumí Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u ɔtɛ́má; nááyá ɛ́ maá mɛ háya úúmi obíléne okime.»
61001018	Waáta okelú oócí tu ŋa sɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka basɔ́ bɛ́muátá, ú húlúkúne ɔ Ɔmuaná, ekúlú ayɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ bá ɔlɔŋɔ ne Yésus e efúúménénú yɛ́ nɔkɔndɔ ɔ ɔmuaná.
61001019	Basɔ́, tu ŋa sɔ́ hɔ́la olumitine anyía mehúnyi me behémúnyi bɛsana áŋa taaká. Mehúnyi eémé núánɔ́ nyɛmána nú ohiite ekúlú o o meéme lɔ́kɔ́ma anyía maáŋa háyɛ lámba a cɛ́ ŋa nɔ́ma i ibíne noómi ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma ekúlú ayɛ́ ɔyá á yaáŋɔ́nuaka bɔmbányɛ mbá hinjoti hɛ́ alalɛ yɛ́ ɔyá é bítóŋínyi e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi.
61001020	Asana yí buúse ayɛ́ núánɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔ caŋa menyi áŋa anyía: Mbɔ́kɔ ɔɔcɔ ŋaá bɛ́kána ohembule a ciayɛ́ injiŋé cɛ bɛ́muátá bɛsana a bɛɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ ebí behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔ́naka, wáŋa a nyɛnana,
61001021	anyía te behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ti ómó bú hémúnyi bɛsana aá ciabɔ́ injiŋé cɛ bɛ́muátá, mbá bé ŋe bú biíbi hémúkúnyí a makɛ́nda me Efúúménénú yí Elilé.
61002001	Buáyá, behémúnyi bɛsana bá bɛfala ŋa bɔ́ bá bébú líhéke ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ baacɔ bé Islayɛ́l. Híáná tɔ́na, ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ a má ŋa fáakɔna beékúnyi bɛsana bá bɛfala ké bú líhéke tɔ́na aanɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́; bé ké bú óofikinyi e menjiŋé bɛɛbɛ́ bí eékúnyi bí onenisiki baacɔ. Bé ké bú bínéŋítíkínyi uubú Waáŋá ewú u ŋeé beébe háŋɔ́náká a bɔɔbɛ́ noómi. Bé ké bú bísúékíne o obísúékíne búábɔ́ bunyímé bɔ́ bɛ́muátá.
61002002	Baacɔ beéŋí ká bɔ́ látákɛ́na yáábɔ́ aabɛ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na yɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́; a asana na yáábɔ́ aabɛ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na eéyé baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ké bú fénékíne taaká ci ohónyí.
61002003	A asana ayɛ́ mɔɔnyɛ́ ŋaá hámɛ́na buéŋí ɔ ɔtɛ́má beékúnyi eébé, bá ká bɔ́ banɔ́ néŋéke na anamánamá cá bɛsana ɔ ɔ banɔ́ nyíákɛ́na. Mbá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na maá bɔ́sɔ́na yáábɔ́ asana feeké; wuúci yɔ́ cɔ́ba o o beébe menyisiki, tɛ́ka ne efule.
61002004	Yááŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔ nyɛ́anɛnɛna te bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma a bɛ́ ŋaá kɛ́láka bɔɔbɛ́; mbá u ŋeé biíbi aahákɛ́na bɛɔ́tɔ́kɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ a Talatáala, ɛ́cɛ anyía nɔɔfia nú tííme, haála ehé ibíne áŋa hú fííʼ; hɔ́á bɛ́ ŋaá táta nyíáyɛ́ nyɛbɔsɔna nyɛ́ bɛsana.
61002005	U tɛ ɔ́mɔ nyɛ́anɛnɛna tɔ́na bakɛla mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ bá buáyá, mbá u ŋeé beébe tɔ́mɛ́na yaandándá yí olondí. Olondí oócí ŋaá hɔ́mbáka, yó beébe ɔ́ɔ́nɔ́kɔ bekime. U ŋoó nóhi hú baacɔ bánámányɛ́. Nɔ́a, ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ awɔ́ u ŋaá bá wá láakɛna baacɔ anyía bé líhéke háyɛ bú ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ŋaá bá ɔ ɔlɔŋɔ ú bɛ́námányɛ́ eébí.
61002006	Híáná tɔ́na, u ŋeé lúliki buúse bukime bálɛ́ka cɛ́ na Sɔ́tɔm na Kɔmɔ́ɔlɛ anyía wéé tóŋínyi hibílícínyínyí a baacɔ bekime a bá tɛ ŋá bɔ́ látɛ́na Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
61002007	Ta híáná, u ŋá cáŋa onohi atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ Lɔt. Wuúci, ɔtɛ́má ŋaá bá wá bɛ́nyíáka buéŋí a asana ne ebébékénú yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na yɛ́ baŋána eébé.
61002008	Yááŋa anyía, atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eéyé ŋaá bá yé líhéke aabɔ́ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́, yɛ́ lɛcaka, yɛ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka mɔɔ́sɛ́ mekime bibébékénú bɛ́ bɛsana abɛ́ bá ŋa bɔ́ bá bábɔ́ kɛ́laka. Yááyɛ́ atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔtɛ́má bɛ́nyíáka ekúlú ekime a bɛsana eébí.
61002009	Nyɛkɛlaka nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá eényí ŋo tóŋínyi anyía u ŋeé ményi onohi baacɔ e bé ŋe bú wuúci látɛ́na ekúlú ayɛ́ baacɔ eébé á bɔ́ŋa e muuyé noómi. U menyukune tɔ́na otétísi bakɛla maabɛ́ anyía mbá u kéé beébe bɔ́nɔ́sɛ́áka a buɔ́sɛ́ bɔ́ nyɛbɔsɔna nyɛ́ bɛsana.
61002010	U ŋaá kɛ́la aáná hɔlákáhɔ́láka eebe a bá naŋa bábɔ́ kɛ́laka bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ e bí ŋe bíléníne imehú, bá bábákɛ́na Butéŋí bú Otéŋí a Waáŋá. Beékúnyi bá bɛfala eébé á bɔ́ŋa na ɛtɛ́má cɛáŋá, beébe na bɔsɛsɛ, bé ti líkíme ta ɔwɔɔ́mbɔ́na bililé bɛ́ Ɔmuaná e bí ŋeé líhe eé nuúmi noómi,
61002011	yiíye anyía te bililé bɛ́ masɔ́ma bɛ́muátá e bí ŋeé beébe hɔ́la buéŋí na a makɛ́nda ne e butéŋí ti ŋeé beébe sɔ́mɛ́na na masálɔ́ eé buúse bú Otéŋí a Waáŋá.
61002012	Mbá baacɔ eébé ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na háyɛ ɛnyama a cɛ́ tɛ á bá ne injiŋé; bé ŋeé ciíci ketíki hú anyía bá hatɛ́akɛ́na, bá ɔ́ɔ́nɔ́kɔ, cíɔ́ fɔnɔ́kɔ. Bá ŋa bɔ́ ɔɔ́mbɔ́na bɛnyɛ́ma e bé ti ŋé bú ményi. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ kéé beébe menyisiki buúse bukime, bɔ́ fɔ́nɔkɔ buúse bukime háyɛ ɛnyama eécí.
61002013	Aáná u kéé beébe namaka a asana na yáábɔ́ ɔkɔ́tɛ́mákánɔ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na. Bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana ŋeé beébe hámɛ́na ɔ ɔtɛ́má, bé bílénékíne o biíbi kɛla na ɛŋalaŋanda cɛ nabuɔ́sɛ́. Yááŋa asana yɛ́ na aatɔ́ ɔlama na mahana buéŋí a bɛfala abɛ́ bá ŋa bɔ́ sɔ́mba ekúlú eyí bé ŋe bú nyíényi maŋanda na banɔ́.
61002014	Cííbú ɛtɛ́má ŋeé beébe hámɛ́na hú ɔ ɔfianana beénjú; ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́ beébe bílénékíne ekúlú ekime. Bé ŋe bú bísúéne baacɔ a bá bɔ́ŋa na ɛtɛ́má ɛcɔ́ɔ́cɔ́, mɔɔnyɛ́ beébe hámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má buéŋí. Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne meé beébe lɔmɔkɔ.
61002015	Bá ŋa bɔ́ nyɛ́ana ɔlátɛ́na nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na nyɛ́ atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yí ohónyí; bó túme ɔlátɛ́na nyɛ́ aabɛ́ yí ohónyí nyí muhémúnyi bɛsana Balaam, ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bɔsɔ́ɔl. Wuúci, u ŋeé lénéke ɔhɔ́ma bɛnamá bɛ́ ɔkɔ́tɛ́mákánɔ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na.
61002016	Mbá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé wuúci kákálákɛ́na a yááyɛ́ aabɛ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, yɔ́ kɛla anyía abaŋabɛbɛa á táŋɛ́ta nááyá háyɛ ɔɔcɔ, ta yɛ́ cáŋa á bá anyía ɛnyama naŋa cɛ tɛ á táŋa. Yí ŋe menyisi aáná buála ebú muhémúnyi bɛsana eémú ŋaá bá waá kɛ́laka.
61002017	Aáná beékúnyi bɛsana bá bɛfala eébé á bɔ́ŋa háyɛ tucéme a tɔ́ tɛ á bá ne menyífé; beébe tɔ́na háyɛ bɛlɔndɔ́ ebí ehúne ŋe kéndi háyɛ yí ŋeé léne, nɔbɔ́lá tɛ naa. Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne meé beébe bátɛ́nɛ́na nyilimíné a haála ehé ibíne áŋa hú fííʼ.
61002018	Bá ŋa bɔ́ táŋa bɛandándá bɛ́ bɛsana bɛ́ buála a bɛ́ tɛ ŋɔ́ yɔɔ́lɔ. Aáná bá kɛlaka bɛsana bɛ́ mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ e bí ŋeé beébe hámɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi, bé ŋe bú tóndi baacɔ a bá ma bɔ́ bɛ́hɔ́ɔkɔ ɔ ɔbɛ́hɔ́ɔkɔ ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ ɔlɔŋɔ ú baacɔ bé bunyímé.
61002019	Bá ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́tánɛ́na baacɔ anyía bé ké bú líhéke a ciabɔ́ciabɔ́, yiíye anyía beébe bɛ́muátá bá bɔ́ŋa bɛɔ́lɛ́ bɛ́ maabɛ́ e me ŋeé beébe cɔbana e bunyímé. Yááŋa anyía, mbɔ́kɔ bɔkɔ a búmɔtɛ́ ŋɔ́ bɛ́ɔ́tɔ́kɔ́kɛ́na ɔɔcɔ, ɔɔcɔ oócí a yáaŋa yɔɔ́lɛ́ yɛ́ bɔkɔ eébú.
61002020	Yááŋa anyía bá na maá bɔ́ sɔ́mba ɔkɔlɔ́ o olíhe ú mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ ú ɔmɛsɛ́, anyía bé ŋe bú menyi ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá na muasɔ́ Munohi, Yésus Kilís. Mbá bá ŋa bɔ́ bɛ́nyɛ́ana ɔ háná hálɔ́mɔ́na o olíhe ú mɔnyɔ́kɔ́lɔ́ oócí; wuúci, ú ŋe beébe téŋgínyi tɔ́na. Aáná úúbú olíhe ú elime oócí a yáaŋa obébékénú ɔ ɔhɔla úúbú olíhe ú buúsebuúse.
61002021	Bú ŋaá bá bɔmbányɛ ɔ ɔhɔla náábɔ́ anyía bé ti menyi atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yí ohónyí na anyía bébú yiíyi menyi, bó túméke elime, bá tɛ látɛ́na efúúménénú yí okotí eyí bé ŋeé beébe hulíkínyi.
61002022	Asana e yí ŋeé beébe hámɛ́na ŋo tóŋínyi bɔmbányɛ ɛnjaba a cɛ́ ŋaá kɔɔna anyía: «Ɛɛbɔ́, na nyɛanyakaka, na nyɛhálɔ́mɔ́na ɔ ɔnyíá túáyɛ́ tuenyi»; «Ɛŋɔnáfá, na nyɛmana o ciíci bíékébi, na nyɛhálɔ́mɔ́na ɔ ɔkɔbɛ́tɔ́bɔ a nyɛndɔbɛ noómi.»
61003001	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, ánɔ lɛcá: Núámɛ nufule nɔ́ ɔláta eenu ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔɔ́ŋɛ́na. Eémi e tufule tukime túfendí, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ bítéésíki bɛsana a bɛ́mɔtɛ́ anyía yámɛ banɔ́ héényíki ɛtɛ́má, núánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na na mɔsɔŋɛ́ e mefúúménénú a bɛɛtɔ́.
61003002	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ aamba anyía núánɔ́ bɛ́tááka bɛsana ebí befúúménénú bé behémúnyi bɛsana bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa cáŋa ébú hulikinyi baacɔ e nyuúté nyɛ́ baacɔ buáyá. Ánɔ bɛ́tááka tɔ́na okotí eyí uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá, muasɔ́ Munohi, ŋaá basɔ́ húlikinyi e nyuúté nyɛ́ báánɔ́ baacɔ bá ɛndɔ́ma.
61003003	Ánɔ cáŋa omenyi bɔmbányɛ anyía ɔ mɔɔ́sɛ́ ma nyɛmana nyɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́, baacɔ ɔ bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ká bɔ́ fáakɔna, bá banɔ́ cɛ́cáka, bá kɛ́laka anamá cá bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́ bikime e bí ŋeé beébe hámɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má noómi,
61003004	bá kɔ́ɔnaka báyɛ: «Mbá ɛndána acɛ́ u ŋaá táná anyía u ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na ciíci ciényí aná e? Yááŋa anyía ɔ ɔtɔkɔ otúme ayɛ́ bíásɔ́ bísíkíne ŋe bú líheke, bíó wéékúne, ta bɔkɔ tɛ ŋaá hɛ́ŋɛ́na e nyilimíné. Bɛsana bikime a yánáŋa bɔkɔ búmɔtɛ́ o otúme ayɛ́ ɔhuálɔ́ ŋaá bɛ́bɔ́ta.»
61003005	A nyɛkɔɔna eényí, bé ŋe bú kíne omenyi anyía buáyá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé kétíki na ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔmuaná ne buhúnyi bɔ́ nyíáyɛ́ nyuúté; yó ketiki na ɔmɛsɛ́ ne menyífé, aáná ɔmɛsɛ́ áŋa hɔ́á a asana ne menyífé.
61003006	Híáná ne menyífé a ma ŋa hɔ́mbáka a yaandándá yí olondí, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá kátákɛ́ná ɔmɛsɛ́ awɔ́ ú ŋa cáŋa ɔbá.
61003007	Asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, na ɔmɛsɛ́ na ɔmuaná abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ lɛ́ca hɛ́nánɔ áŋa bɛnyɛ́ma ebí buhúnyi bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne meé tétísi anyía oocó kéé biíbi lulíki a buɔ́sɛ́ bɔ́ nyɛsɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́na nyɛ́ bɛsana ebú u kéé ményisiki bakɛla maabɛ́.
61003008	Mbá, banɔ́ baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, asana ayɛ́ nu tɛ ɔ́mɔ nɔ́ nyɛ́mana nú ɔbɛ́hɔ́ya áŋa anyía: A nyɛlɛca nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá, buɔ́sɛ́ búmɔtɛ́ áŋa háyɛ tɔ́sɛ́na cɛ́ tuɔŋɔ; tɔ́sɛ́na cɛ́ tuɔŋɔ áŋa háyɛ buɔ́sɛ́ búmɔtɛ́.
61003009	Yááŋa anyía u ti ŋe yéényísi onyíóyísínyi ciayɛ́ ɛndána háyɛ baacɔ ɔ bɔ́mɔtɛ́ ŋá bɔ́ bɛ́táá; mbá u ŋaá banɔ́ eéhínyínyi bu eéhínyínyi, anyía u ti ŋé léne anyía ɔɔcɔ ɔmɔtɛ́ é nyíme. U ŋeé léne yáaŋa anyía baacɔ bekime ɔ bɔ́ŋgɔ́na ohónyí wú ɔbɛ́kákálákɛ́na máábɔ́ maabɛ́, mbá bá sɔ́mba ɔkɔlɔ́ eé meéme.
61003010	Buɔ́sɛ́ bɔ́ nyɛkahálɔ́mɔ́na nyí Otéŋí a Waáŋá káá háma hú huasɛ, háyɛ weébi naŋa waá fáaya, ɔɔcɔ tɛ bɛ́tátá. Buɔ́sɛ́ eébú, ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná kéé séŋúlue hú fuab na yaandándá yí ekundí, oocó yó séŋúlísíki bɛnyɛ́ma bikime e bí ŋe iínjie eese ɛ ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná; na ɔmɛsɛ́ na bíáyɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime bɛ́ɔ mánɔ́kɔ́na hú táákɔ.
61003011	A asana na nyɛnamá anyɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime eébí á nyɛ́mana bí oséŋúlúeke aáná, nu ŋá nɔ́ nyɛmána nú ɔbámɔ́kɔ́na baacɔ abá na yáánɔ́ ambányɛ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na na nyíánɔ́ nyibíínjie o olumitinine áŋa bifúúménénú.
61003012	Tɛ́ka banɔ́ nú ŋa nɔ́ tátá, nu eeŋelikinyi fiaŋɔ nyɛkaáháma nyɛ́ buɔ́sɛ́ bú Kilís abɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ maá táfa e? Buɔ́sɛ́ eébú, oocó kéé lulíki ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná, ɔbála ú tɔbɛ́mbɛ tú oocó tú oséŋúlísíki bɛnyɛ́ma bikime e bí ŋe iínjie eese ɛ ɛŋɔ́lɔ́muaná.
61003013	Mbá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́tánɛ́na na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yɛ́ ɔmuaná na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́; hɔ́á bɛsana a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ áŋa ekúlú ekime, biíbi tu ŋa sɔ́ táta.
61003014	Yaátɛ́ asana, baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, a nyɛtáta anyɛ́ nú ŋa nɔ́ táta bɛsana eébí, ánɔ bɛ́kɛ́ndákɛ́na ɔbámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na befúúménénú tɛ́ka na hɛkɔma, banɔ́ e mbuumu noómi eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
61003015	Énu menyí anyía yaandándá yí nyiéhínyínyi yí uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá eéyé ŋaá banɔ́ iinjie ohónyí wɔ́ ɔnɔhɔkɔ banɔ́ bekime. A asana eéyé uusú onyíinyí u ɔtɛ́má Bóol ŋaá banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɛ́na tɔ́na i injiŋé acɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé wuúci iínjíé.
61003016	Híáná u naŋa wɔ yɔ́ɔ́ŋɔ́kɔ a túáyɛ́ tufule tukime ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋaá táŋá bɛsana eébí. Tufule eétú áŋa na bɛhaála a bɛ́mɔtɛ́ a bɛ́ ŋa náta ɔlɔ́kɔ́ma; biíbi eébí baacɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ a bá tɛ abɔ́ bá ne injiŋé, beébe tɛ́ka bé bíínjíénú o olumitinine, ŋe bú kótímísi nyɛlɔ́kɔ́ma. Híáná bá ŋa bɔ́ kɛla tɔ́na a bɛhaála bí etémbí bɛ́ Ciɔɔ́ŋɛ́ cɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. A nyíábɔ́ nyɛkɛlaka eényí, bé ŋe bú bísúéne búábɔ́ bunyímé bɔ́ bɛ́muátá.
61003017	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, a yáánɔ́ aháŋá nua núáŋa o omenyi bɛsana eébí, bá maá banɔ́ kúuneke biité. Yaátɛ́ asana, énu bíkékényíki aná, nɔtɛ bɛ́nyɛ́ána anyía baŋána eébé ábɔ́ banɔ́ nénísíki ohónyí na yáábɔ́ aabɛ́ yɛ́ nyɛbɛ́kɛ́lɛ́na, bɔ́ banɔ́ aáŋíáka mɔŋɔlɛ́ a mɔɔ́nɛ́nánɔ́ a maáŋa e cíínú ɛtɛ́má noómi.
61003018	Mbá ánɔ cɔ́cɔ́báka ne buúse, nu kɔmaka na a yaála yí nuubo noómi ne o omenyinyi ne Yésus Kilís, wáŋa ne uusú Otéŋí a Waáŋá na muasɔ́ Munohi. Nuúmi á bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na nááyá o otúme aámbáya ɔ ɔkɔɔ́háma bikúlú bikime, híáná yááŋa.
62001001	Tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ ɔɔ́ŋɛ́na nufule eenu a asana yí Buhúnyi e bú ŋe yiínjíéne olíhe. Bú ŋaá bá ɛ́cɛ nyitúme nyɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime tɛ ŋáá bá. Tu ŋa sɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka úúyé ɔtáŋa na cáásɔ́ eetú, túo buúbu lɛcáka na cáásɔ́ eése cá bɛ́muátá, túo buúbu kebeliki; cáásɔ́ aabá cío buúbu bítíséke.
62001002	Ekúlú ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé céŋísi Buhúnyi bú olíhe eébú ɔɔcɔ u cɛɛ́tɔ, yó buúbu tóŋínyi a baacɔ, tu ŋe sú buúbu lɛcáka. Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ bíkétínyi, tu banɔ́ húlikinyi asana yɛ́ yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime eéyé a yɛ́ ŋaá bá ne Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; aámbáya yɛ́ ma basɔ́ bítóŋínyi a miányɛ́.
62001003	Asana eéyé tu ŋa sɔ́ lɛ́cáka, túɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka; yiíyi eéyé tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ húlinyi tɔ́na anyía núánɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na e nyimónjóló na basɔ́ abá tua sɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló ne ne Síkíne ne ne uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ Yésus Kilís.
62001004	Basɔ́ bɛ́muátá, tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eébí ananyía mbá túásɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na háyɛ nyitíne nyí bilúŋe.
62001005	Ɛsɔ́ma acɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká né Yésus Kilís, ícíeci tu ŋa sɔ́ banɔ́ húlinyi: Cɛ́áŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa eese, ta bɔkɔ a búmɔtɛ́ bú ibíne tɛ a bá nááyá.
62001006	Mbɔ́kɔ tu ŋa sɔ́ kɔ́ɔna anyía tua sɔ́ŋa e nyimónjóló na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, basɔ́ hú ɔcɔba ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla bɛsana bí ibíne, ɛ́cɛ anyía tu ŋe sú néŋe baacɔ, tu ti líhe a taaká noómi.
62001007	Asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, mbɔ́kɔ tu ŋe sú líhe e eese noómi háyɛ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ wuúci bɛ́muátá ŋé líhe e eese noómi, tua sɔ́áŋa e nyimónjóló basɔ́ na basɔ́, manɔ́ŋɔ́ me uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ Yésus ŋaá basɔ́ fúúmínyi a búásɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́ bukime.
62001008	Mbɔ́kɔ tu ŋa sɔ́ kɔ́ɔna anyía tu tɛ asɔ́ bá bakɛla maabɛ́, tu ŋe sú bínéŋe basɔ́ bɛ́muátá; aáná taaká tɛ a bá náásɔ́ buúse bukime.
62001009	Asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, mbɔ́kɔ tu ŋa sɔ́ bɛ́kɔ́tɔ búásɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́ eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, wuúci bɛ́muátá u káá basɔ́ buúbu nyɛanɛnɛna, yó buúbu fúúmínyi bukime anyía wáŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ, u nyíóyísíkínyi úúyé ɔtáŋa.
62001010	Túásɔ́ kɔɔna anyía tu tɛ ŋá sɔ́ kɛ́la bɔɔbɛ́, tú me sú hélúmúnyi Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ɔfalafala, búáyɛ́ buhúnyi tɛ a bá a cáásɔ́ eetú buúse bukime.
62002001	Báámɛ baáná e, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eébí anyía nu tɛ kɛláka bɛsana a bɛɛbɛ́. Mbá, mbɔ́kɔ yɛ́ ŋɔ́ yɔ́ɔ hámɛ́na anyía kuɔŋɔ́ ɔɔcɔ a wɔmɔtɛ́ ɔ́ɔ kɛ́la asana a yaabɛ́, menyi anyía tua sɔ́ŋa na mɔkamɛna eé buúse bú Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; wuúci wáŋa Yésus Kilís, atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ.
62002002	Yááŋa anyía wuúci bɛ́muátá u ŋaá bɛ́sɔ́mbɛ́na háyɛ etúké anyía mbá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ á basɔ́ nyɛanákɛ́nɛ́na maasɔ́ maabɛ́; tɛ́ cáŋa hú maasɔ́ maabɛ́ bímuócí, mbá u ŋaá nyɛ́anɛnɛna tɔ́na maabɛ́ ma baacɔ bekime bá ɔmɛsɛ́ okime.
62002003	Mbɔ́kɔ tu naŋa tuasɔ́ látákɛ́na bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, bú ŋo tóŋínyi anyía tu ŋe sú wuúci menyi bɔmbányɛ.
62002004	Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ ú ŋa kɔɔna anyía u ŋeé wuúci menyi bɔmbányɛ, mbá u tɛ látɛ́na bíáyɛ́ bikotí áŋa na afala, taaká tɛ a bá nááyá buúse bukime.
62002005	Mbá yááŋa anyíaʼo, ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ ú ŋa látɛ́na bɛsana abɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋa kɔɔna, wuúci oócí u ŋé léne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ. A asana eéyé tu ŋe sú ményi anyía tua sɔ́ŋa balatákánɔ́ e nyimónjóló ne wuúci.
62002006	Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋá kɔɔna anyía u ŋee límine e nyimónjóló na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋá nyɛmána wu olíhéke i iŋetí ci olíhe ú Kilís bɛ́muátá.
62002007	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má e, okotí ayɛ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na aaha tɛ a bá yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí okotí. Mbá okotí yɛ́ buáyá yááŋa; yiíyi nú ŋe nú ményi o otúme e nyitúme nyí úúnú olumitinine. Okotí yɛ́ buáyá eéyé áŋa buhúnyi abɔ́ nú na maá nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máka.
62002008	Mbá ta híáná, okotí ɔ́ yɔɔ́sɔ yáaŋa ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na; yiíyi eéyé yí ŋé bítóŋínyi ne o olíhe ú Kilís ne e úúnú áyá. Yááŋa anyía ibíne á yáaŋa ɔ ɔmanɔkɔna; taaká ci eese á yáaŋa ɔ ɔnɔma.
62002009	Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋá kɔɔna anyía u ŋeé líhe ambányɛ yí olíhe e eese noómi mbá, u liŋekine uuyé onyíinyí á yánáŋa i ibíne noómi.
62002010	Yááŋa anyíaʼo, ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ŋeé léne uuyé onyíinyí, wuúci u ŋeé líhe ambányɛ yí olíhe e eese noómi; ta bɔkɔ a búmɔtɛ́ bú o wuúci kúfítínyi tɛ a bá nááyá.
62002011	Mbá ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ŋe líŋine uuyé onyíinyí ŋeé líhe i ibíne noómi. U ŋaá kánda i ibíne noómi, u ti menyí haála ahá u ŋa cɔ́ba ananyía ibíne meé wuúci kuusi indímé.
62002012	Banɔ́ báámɛ baáná e, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eebi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ maá banɔ́ nyɛ́ánakɛnɛna máánɔ́ maabɛ́ a asana ne Kilís.
62002013	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eebi, banɔ́, báámɛ be síkíne, anyía nu ŋe nú menyi ooci awɔ́ u ŋaá bá o otúme e nyitúme nyɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime. Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eebi, banɔ́, na bɛnɔ́kɔ́ na babɔ́la, anyía nú ma nɔ́ yáká ɔɔcɔ u menjiŋé.
62002014	Banɔ́ báámɛ baáná, ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eebi anyía nu ŋe nú menyi ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eebi, banɔ́, báámɛ be síkíne, anyía nu ŋe nú menyi ooci awɔ́ u ŋaá bá o otúme e nyitúme nyɛ́ bɛnyɛ́ma bikime. Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eebi, banɔ́, na bɛnɔ́kɔ́ na babɔ́la, anyía nua nɔ́ŋa na makɛ́nda o olumitinine noómi, Bɛsana bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé límine aanɔ́ ɛ ɛtɛ́má ekúlú ekime, nú ma nɔ́ yáká tɔ́na ɔɔcɔ u menjiŋé.
62002015	Banɔ́ bekime, nuti bíínjíékíne o oléne ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci ta bɛsana a bɛ́áŋa ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́. Yááŋa anyía, ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ŋeé bíínjie o oléne ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci ti ŋée léne Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ buúse bukime.
62002016	A bɛsana bikime bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci a bɛ́áŋa anyía: Na bɛsana bí imehú a bɛ́ ŋa basɔ́ hámɛ́na ɛ ɛtɛ́má, na yaáká yí eése, ne obíbééti awɔ́ baacɔ ŋe bú bíbééti na búábɔ́ bɔnɔ́mɛ; bí ti ŋé húle né Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, mbá bíáŋa bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́.
62002017	Énu menyi anyía ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci á yáaŋa ɔ ɔmana, na bɛsana a bɛ́ ŋa hámɛ́na baacɔ ɛ ɛtɛ́má áyá. Mbá, ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u náŋa waá látákɛ́na bɛsana e bí ŋeé bíléníne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé líhe bikúlú bikime.
62002018	Báámɛ baáná, bikúlú bí nyibíóndísínyi eebi tua sɔáŋa o olíhe. Ánɔ bɛ́tááka anyía bá ŋa banɔ́ láákɛ́na anyía e bikúlú eébí munuusi Kilís káá hámɛ́na baacɔ hú huasɛ. Yááŋa anyía benuusi Kilís ma bɔ́ háláka aámbáya; buátɛ́ bɔkɔ bú ŋo tóŋínyi anyía tua sɔáŋa o olíhe bikúlú bí nyibíóndísínyi.
62002019	Baacɔ eébé ŋa bɔ́ bá buáyá e úúsú ɔlɔŋɔ, bá ŋa bɔ́ hámɔ́kɔ́na anyía bɔ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔ bɔ́ bá taaká cɛ́ baacɔ cí uúsú ɔlɔŋɔ. Yááŋa anyíaʼo, mbɔ́kɔ bábɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na baacɔ bé úúsú ɔlɔŋɔ, keyé bá ŋa bɔ́ lɔ́bɔ́kɔ. Mbá bá ŋa bɔ́ hátɔ́kɔ́ná anyía búé bítóŋínyi o motóndóló anyía bɔ́ tɛ ɔ́mɔ bɔ́ bá taaká cɛ́ baacɔ cí uúsú ɔlɔŋɔ.
62002020	Mbá banɔ́, a yáánɔ́ aháŋá, nu ŋe nú ményi anyía Kilís na maá banɔ́ súkunekine Efúúménénú yí Elilé. Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ nua núáŋa o omenyi taaká, banɔ́ bekime.
62002021	Mbɔ́kɔ yaŋɔ́ ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na bɛsana eebi, bú tɛ á bá anyía nu ti ŋé nú ményi taaká; yááŋa hú anyía nuanua báka o omenyi taaká, nu menyukune tɔ́na anyía afala tɛ á bá yɛ́ ɔháma aá taaká noómi.
62002022	Ɛ́ɛ, aányɛ́ wáŋa ɔfalafala aná e? Ɔfalafala áŋa ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa kɔɔna anyía Yésus tɛ a bá Kilís. Wuúci wáŋa ɔfalafala, wuúci munuusi Kilís, u bínéŋítíkínyi ekúlú ɔ́mɔtɛ́ na ciasɔ́ Síkíne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ áyá.
62002023	Yááŋa anyía ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ŋé bínéŋítínyi Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé bínéŋítínyi tɔ́na Síkíne. Mbá ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa kɔ́ɔna anyía Yésus áŋa Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋe ményi tɔ́na Síkíne.
62002024	Yaátɛ́ asana núánɔ́ nyɛmána nú otétényíki bɔmbányɛ e cíínú ɛtɛ́má asana eéyé ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká e nyitúme nyí úúnú olumitinine. Mbɔ́kɔ nu ŋa nɔ́ cɔ́ba ne buúse o otétényi bɔmbányɛ e cíínú ɛtɛ́má asana ayɛ́ nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká e nyitúme nyí úúnú olumitinine, nu ké nú límine banɔ́ bɛ́muátá e nyimónjóló na Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ne Síkíne áyá.
62002025	Bɔkɔ ebú Kilís ŋaá basɔ́ bɛ́tánɛ́ná áŋa yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime.
62002026	Ɛ ŋa mɛ́ banɔ́ ɔ́ɔ́ŋɛ́na aáná a asana na baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ áamba ɔ banɔ́ nénisi ohónyí.
62002027	Mbá banɔ́, a yáánɔ́ aháŋá, Kilís na maá banɔ́ súkunine Efúúménénú yí Elilé; ɛ́ɛhɛ́ bú tɛ ŋá háná ɔyɔɔ́lɔ anyía bá banɔ́ eékúnyíki nyiékúnyi nyí etémbí. Yááŋa anyía Elilé eéyé ŋaá banɔ́ eékúnyi bɛsana bikime a bɛ́áŋa taaká, biíbi tɛ́ka bɛfala. Énu limíne e nyimónjóló nááyá háyɛ Elilé ŋaá banɔ́ eékúnyíkí.
62002028	Yaátɛ́ asana aná, banɔ́ báámɛ baáná, énu limíne e nyimónjóló ne Kilís, ananyía ekúlú ayɛ́ u ká ka hálɔ́mɔ́na, tu ká sɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́na o moyóyónó, tu tɛ lɔ́kɔ́ma aatɔ́ ɔlama eeyé eé buúse.
62002029	Ahɛ́ nu ŋe nú menyi anyía wáŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, énu menyí tɔ́na anyía ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa kɛ́la bɛsana a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ áŋa uuyé ɔɔ́nɔ́.
62003001	Huúúʼ ! Ánɔ lɛcá nyɛnamá nyí nulénéne anyɛ́ Taatá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ lénéké. U ŋaá basɔ́ lénéké buéŋí a nyɛnamá anyɛ́ u ŋa basɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ anyía bááyɛ́ baáná. Túé menyí aná anyía tua sɔ́ŋa taaká bááyɛ́; asana ɔ́mɔtɛ́, baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci ti ŋé bú menyi anyía tua sɔ́ŋa baáná bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, ananyía bó ti ómo bú ményi ciasɔ́ Taatá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62003002	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, aámbáya tua sɔ́áŋa baáná bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; bú tɛ ŋáá lɛ́cana bɔmbányɛ aátɛ́ tu ká sɔ́ bámɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na. Ta híáná, tu ŋe sú ményi anyía ekúlú eyí Kilís kéé bítóŋínyi náásɔ́, tu ká sɔ́ bá aá ciayɛ́ iŋetí, anyía tu ké sú wuúci lɛcaka háyɛ wáŋa.
62003003	Yááŋa anyíaʼo, ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋaá háya nyɛnamá nyɛ́ mɔŋɔlɛ́ eényí né Kilís ŋe bítétényi ofúúménénú i iŋetí ecí Kilís áŋa ofúúménénú.
62003004	Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u náŋa waá kɛ́laka bɔɔbɛ́ tɛ ŋá látɛ́na bikotí bɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́ áŋa ɔnɔkɔ okotí yɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62003005	Nu ŋe nú ményi anyía Yésus Kilís, awɔ́ bɔɔbɛ́ tɛ á bá nááyá buúse bukime, ŋaá faáya ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ɔ ɔkɔɔ́waáŋíaka maabɛ́.
62003006	Ɛ́ɛhɛ́ ɔɔcɔ okime e wé límine e nyimónjóló ne wuúci tɛ ɔ́mɔ́ nyɛmána wu ɔ háná kɛ́laka bɔɔbɛ́; mbá ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ a yánáŋa ɔ ɔcɔba ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́ ti ómó wuúci lɛca, te o wuúci menyi tɔ́na.
62003007	Banɔ́, báámɛ baáná, ta ɔɔcɔ tɛ banɔ́ néŋe. Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u naŋa waá kɛ́laka bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́ bɛ́ bɛsana áŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ i iŋetí ci Yésus Kilís, wuúci wáŋa atálɛ́mánánɔ́ yɛ́ ɔɔcɔ.
62003008	Mbá ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa cɔ́ba ne buúse ɔ ɔkɛla bɔɔbɛ́ áŋa na Musɔ́mɛ́na, ananyía muáŋa mɔkɛla maabɛ́ hí otúme e nyitúme. Aatɔ́ yɛ́ asana ayɛ́ Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá fááyɛ́na ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci eé yiíyi ŋaá bá anyía wá ka cáŋgɛ́na monyiókínyí ma Musɔ́mɛ́na mekime.
62003009	Ɔɔcɔ okime a wáŋa ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ ŋá háná a kɛ́la bɔɔbɛ́, ananyía nyɛbá nyɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa limine nááyá. U tɛ́ á bá wu ɔ háná cɔcɔbaka ne buúse a nyɛkɛla nyɛ́ bɔɔbɛ́ anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ áŋa cíáyɛ́ Síkíne.
62003010	Ɛ́náʼo, asana e yí ŋe yeélúnyi bɔmbányɛ na baáná bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ na bá Sátan áŋa anyía ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u tɛ ŋá kɛ́la bɛsana a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́, u ti léne tɔ́na uuyé onyíinyí, tɛ á bá ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62003011	Yááŋa anyíaʼo, asana ayɛ́ nú ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká e nyitúme nyí úúnú olumitinine áŋa anyía túésú lénékénéne.
62003012	Tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ nyɛmána tú ɔhɔ́áka Káyɛn; wuúci u ŋaá bá ɔlɔŋɔ na Sátan, ɔɔcɔ u menjiŋé, yɔ́ wɔ́ɔ́nɔ onyíinyí. Mbá nu ŋe nú menyi a asana ayɛ́ aátɛ́ u ŋeé wuúci ɔ́ɔ́nɔ e? U ŋeé wuúci ɔ́ɔ́nɔ anyía u ŋaá bá waá kɛlaka bɛɛbɛ́ bɛ́ bɛsana, onyíinyí áa kɛlaka a bɛtálɛ́mánánɔ́.
62003013	Baláamɛ, nɔtɛ hɔla okéke anyía baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci ŋa bɔ́ banɔ́ líŋíne.
62003014	Mbá basɔ́, tua sɔ́áŋa o omenyi aámbáya anyía tú ma sɔ́ bɛ́kátɔ́na o owé noómi, tú okowóofine o olíhe. Tu ŋe sú menyi aáná anyía tu ŋe sú léne báásɔ́ benyíinyí; ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ti ŋe léne onyíinyí a yánáŋa o owé noómi.
62003015	Ɔɔcɔ ewú u ŋe líŋíne onyíinyí áŋa muɔ́nɔ́ baacɔ; nu ŋe nú menyi anyía muɔ́nɔ́ baacɔ tɛ ŋáa bá na yɔɔ́sɔɔ́sɔ yí olíhe yí ekúlú ekime nááyá.
62003016	Bɔkɔ abɔ́ bɔ́ ŋɔɔ́ lɔ́ŋɔ anyía nulénéne, íbúebu aná Yésus Kilís ŋe keé iínjíé úúyé olíhe a yáásɔ́ asana. Basɔ́ tɔ́na tu ŋá sɔ́ nyɛmána tú owiínjíékíne cíísú ilíhe a bɛsana bɛ́ báásɔ́ benyíinyí.
62003017	Mbɔ́kɔ ɛnɔ́mɛ cɛ ɔɔcɔ a cɛ́mɔtɛ́ ŋa lɛ́ca uuyé onyíinyí áa yábáka bɔkɔ a bɔ́mɔtɛ́ mbá u ti wuúci bɛ́cáma mahana, anyána wáŋa wu ɔkɔɔna anyía u ŋeé léne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ e uúye ɔtɛ́má noómi e?
62003018	Banɔ́, báámɛ baáná, tu tɛ ɔ́mɔ sɔ́ nyɛmána tú ɔtáŋáka hú ne nyuúté ne nyuúté, tu kɔɔnaka anyía tu ŋe sú lénéne na báásɔ́ benyíinyí, mbá tu ŋa sɔ́ nyɛ́mána tú otóŋínyi núásɔ́ nulénéne a nyɛkɛla nyɛ́ bɛsana aá taaká noómi.
62003019	Aáná tu ké sú menyi anyía tua sɔ́ŋa baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kánda aá taaká noómi; cíísú ɛtɛ́má cíɔ hálɔ́mɔ́kɔ́na a tɔɔna ekúlú ayɛ́ tua sɔ́ŋa eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62003020	Te cíísú ɛtɛ́má á basɔ́ kákálákɛ́na, tu ŋe sú menyi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé ciíci téŋínyi, u menyukune tɔ́na bɛsana bikime.
62003021	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, aáná, mbɔ́kɔ cíísú ɛtɛ́má tɛ ŋá basɔ́ kákálɛ́na, tua sɔ́ŋa ne moyóyónó ɔ ɔtáŋáka eé buúse bɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62003022	U ŋaá basɔ́ iínjie tɔ́na bɔkɔ bukime ebú tu ŋe sú wuúci bata a asana ayɛ́ tu ŋá sɔ́ látɛ́na bíáyɛ́ bikotí, tu kɛlaka bɛsana e bí ŋé wuúci bíléníne.
62003023	Bikotí abɛ́ u ŋaá basɔ́ iínjíékíne anyía tuásɔ́ látákɛ́na áŋa anyía túá háya mɔŋɔlɛ́ né uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ Yésus Kilís, mbá tu lénékénéne háyɛ u ŋaá basɔ́ láakɛna.
62003024	Ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u ŋa látɛ́na bíáyɛ́ bikotí ŋeé límine e nyimónjóló na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɔ́na e nyimónjóló ne wuúci. Bɔkɔ a bɔ́ ŋa basɔ́ tóŋínyi anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋeé límine e nyimónjóló na basɔ́ áŋa Efúúménénú yí Elilé ayɛ́ u ŋaá basɔ́ iínjie.
62004001	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, nuti tényí lúmitine baacɔ a bá ŋa bɔ́ kɔ́ɔna anyía bá bɔ́ŋa ne Efúúménénú yí Elilé; mbá, ánɔ cáŋa beébe búlúnéke bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ ananyía núénú ményi mbɔ́kɔ bá bɔ́ŋa taaká ne Elilé e yí ŋeé húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Yááŋa anyía behémúnyi bɛsana bá bɛfala ma bɔ́ hála haála hekime.
62004002	Ánɔ lɛca anyána nua nɔ́ŋa nú omenyi anyía ɔɔcɔ áŋa ne Efúúménénú yí Elilé. Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋa kɔ́ɔna ɛ ɛkatɛ́katɛ́ cɛ baacɔ anyía Yésus Kilís ŋeé bíbíéné ɔɔcɔ áŋa taaká ne Elilé e yí húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62004003	Mbá ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ti ŋé lúmitinine anyía Yésus Kilís ŋeé bíbíéné ɔɔcɔ tɛ á bá ne Elilé e yí ŋe húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Elilé ayɛ́ wáŋa ne yiíye áŋa elilé yí munuusi Kilís; yiíyi nu ŋa nɔ́ lɔ́kɔ́máká anyía yɛ́ káá fáaya; aámbáya eeci yá yáaŋa aaha ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́.
62004004	Banɔ́ báámɛ baáná, aá banɔ́, nua núáŋa baáná bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́; nu na maa nɔ́ yákáka behémúnyi bɛsana bá bɛfala anyía Elilé a yááŋa náánɔ́ áŋa na makɛ́nda buéŋí ɔ ɔhɔla elilé a yááŋa á baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́.
62004005	Yááŋa anyía beébe bá bɔ́ŋa baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́; yaátɛ́ asana bá ŋa bɔ́ táŋa bɛsana bɛ́ ɔmɛsɛ́, aáná baacɔ bá ɔmɛsɛ́ ŋe bú beébe lɔ́kɔ́ma.
62004006	A yáásɔ́ aháŋá, basɔ́ tua sɔ́ŋa baáná bá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ŋé ményinyi na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, wuúci u ŋá lɔ́kɔ́ma bɛsana abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ kɔ́ɔna; ɔɔcɔ awɔ́ u tɛ á bá ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɛ ŋá lɔ́kɔ́ma bɛsana abɛ́ tu ŋa sɔ́ kɔɔna. Aáná tua sɔ́ŋa tú omenyi ɔwaálɔ́na ne Elilé yí taaká na yɛ́ nyɛnana.
62004007	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, túé búle lénéne basɔ́ na basɔ́ anyía nulénéne ŋeé húle ná Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́. Ɔɔcɔ okime náánɔ́ ewú u ŋeé léne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ áŋa ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, u ŋeé ményinyi ne wuúci.
62004008	Ɔɔcɔ okime ewú u ti ŋéé léne bɔsɔ́ɔ́kɔ́ ti ŋéé ményinyi na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ naŋa weé lénéke baacɔ.
62004009	Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ námbɔnɛna núáyɛ́ nulénéne ekúlú ayɛ́ u ŋaá tɔ́má hííyé hɛkɔŋɔ́ hí Ɔɔ́nɔ́ ɔ ɔmɛsɛ́, ananyía mbá túásɔ́ bá na taaká ci olíhe nááyá.
62004010	Asana e yí ŋó tóŋínyi nulénéne áŋa anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋa cáŋa ɔ basɔ́ léne, yɔ́ tɔ́ma uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ ɔ ɔkɔbɛ́sɔ́mbɛ́na a yáásɔ́ asana, mbá u basɔ́ nyɛ́ánakɛnɛna máásɔ́ maabɛ́; nulénéne eénú tɛ á bá anyía basɔ́ tú ŋa sɔ́ cáŋa olénéke Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62004011	Baláamɛ bá ɔtɛ́má, a asana ayɛ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá basɔ́ lénéke buéŋí aáná, ɛ́ɛhɛ́ basɔ́ tɔ́na túásɔ́ nyɛmána tú olénékénéne.
62004012	Énu ményi anyía ta ɔɔcɔ tɛ ŋa lɛ́ca Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ háyɛ wáŋa; ta híáná ekúlú eyí tu ŋe sú lénéne basɔ́ na basɔ́, tua sɔ́ŋa limine e nyimónjóló ne wuúci, nulénéne anɔ́ ú náŋa waá basɔ́ lénéke áŋa nunyíóyónú náásɔ́ bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ.
62004013	Bɔkɔ a bɔ́ ŋa basɔ́ tóŋínyi anyía tua sɔ́ŋa balatánɔ́ e nyimónjóló na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, wuúci tɔ́na ɔlatánɔ́ e nyimónjóló na basɔ́ áŋa anyía: U ŋaá basɔ́ iínjíé yááyɛ́ Elilé.
62004014	Basɔ́ bɛ́muátá tu ŋa sɔ́ lɛ́cáka na cáásɔ́ eése anyía Taatá Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋaá tɔ́ma uuyé Ɔɔ́nɔ́ o okonóhi baacɔ bekime bá ɔmɛsɛ́; aáná tu ŋe sú húlinyi baacɔ anyía asana eéyé áŋa taaká.
62004015	Ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u ŋá kɔ́ɔna anyía Yésus áŋa Ɔɔ́nɔ́ u Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ ŋee límine e nyimónjóló na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɔ́na e nyimónjóló ne wuúci.
62004016	Basɔ́ bɛ́muátá tu ŋe sú ményi, tu lumitekinine anyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ náŋa waá basɔ́ lénéke; wáŋa nulénéne. Aáná ɔɔcɔ okime awɔ́ u náŋa weé líhéke e nulénéne noómi ŋeé límine e nyimónjóló na Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́, Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ tɔ́na e nyimónjóló ne wuúci.
62004017	Bɔkɔ a bɔ́ ŋaá basɔ́ tóŋínyi anyía tu ŋe sú léne Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ bɔmbányɛ bɔmbányɛ áŋa anyía tu ti ké sú líkímeke ta bɔkɔ buɔ́sɛ́ abɔ́ Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ káá sɔ́mbɔ́tɔ́kɔ́nɛ́na baacɔ bɛsana. Úúsú olíhe ú ɔmɛsɛ́ ooci áŋa i iŋetí ci olíhe ú Yésus Kilís.
62004018	Bulíkílíki tɛ á bá e nulénéne noómi, mbá taaká taaká ci nulénéne ŋeé menyisi bulíkílíki ɔ ɔtɛ́má. Yááŋa anyíaʼo, ɔbá ne bulíkílíki ɔ ɔtɛ́má ŋeé hémbule anyía bɔ́nɔ́sɛa áŋa cɛ́ ɔbá hɔ́á; aáná ɔɔcɔ okime a wáŋa ne bulíkílíki ɔ ɔtɛ́má tɛ ŋá lɔ́kɔ́ma injibí ci nulénéne nú Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́.
62004019	A náásɔ́, tua sɔ́ŋa ne nulénéne ɛ ɛtɛ́má ananyía Bandɔ́mɛsɛ́ u ŋaá cáŋa ɔ basɔ́ léne.
